text: Contact Email: For any inquiries, support, or partnership opportunities, please email support@hodltoken.net.
Official Website: Visit https://hodltoken.net for detailed information, updates, and resources related to $HODL.
Social Media: Follow $HODL on Twitter (@hodltoken), Telegram (@hodltoken_official), and Discord (discord.gg/hodltoken) for the latest news and community discussions.
Community Support: Join the official $HODL Telegram group for real-time support and community interaction.
Bug Reports & Technical Issues: Please report bugs or technical problems via the GitHub repository at https://github.com/hodltoken/hodl-token/issues.
Business Inquiries: For collaboration, sponsorships, or media requests, contact business@hodltoken.net.
Official Announcements: All official announcements and updates are published on the Medium blog at https://medium.com/hodltoken.
Security & Audits: $HODL smart contracts are audited and security reports are available on the official website under the 'Security' section.
Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ): For common questions about $HODL, visit the FAQ section on https://hodltoken.net/faq.

Q: What is $HODL?
A: $HODL is a decentralized finance (DeFi) token designed to reward its holders with BNB. It uses a 5% transaction tax to fund a reward pool, which is redistributed to holders on a weekly basis. The token also integrates NFTs and play-to-earn mechanics to enhance engagement.

Q: How do BNB rewards work?
A: Every time $HODL is bought, sold, or transferred, a 5% tax is applied. This tax accumulates in a reward pool which is periodically converted to BNB. Holders can then claim their share of BNB rewards through the HODL dashboard.
Tokenomics of $HODL: 5% transaction tax applied on each trade, with 3% redistributed to holders as BNB rewards, 1% allocated to liquidity pool, and 1% used for development and marketing.

The $HODL token applies a 5% transaction tax on every buy, sell, or transfer. Of this tax, 3% is redistributed weekly as BNB rewards to token holders, 1% goes to the liquidity pool to stabilize price, and 1% funds marketing and platform development.
The total supply of $HODL tokens is 100,000,000 (100 million). This supply is fixed and fully circulated, with no new tokens minted, helping to maintain scarcity and value for holders.
BNB rewards are accumulated from the 3% portion of the transaction tax and distributed weekly. Users can claim rewards through the official HODL Dashboard by connecting their wallet.
HODL Hands® NFTs are limited edition collectibles that can be staked to earn $HODL tokens and provide additional benefits in the Gem Fighter gaming ecosystem.
Gem Fighter is a play-to-earn game where players use NFT characters to battle, level up, and earn $HODL rewards. The game supports staking and marketplace features.
The $HODL smart contracts have undergone formal audits. The liquidity is locked until January 2280, and the core team is KYC-verified to ensure transparency and security.
$HODL tokens are used for earning BNB rewards, staking NFTs, and accessing various DeFi and gaming features within the ecosystem.

Q: Where can I buy $HODL?
A: $HODL can be purchased on decentralized exchanges (DEXs) listed on the official website. When buying, users should set their slippage to 6% to account for transaction taxes. Detailed instructions are available on the platform.

Q: What is the HODL Dashboard?
A: The HODL Dashboard is a web interface where users can monitor their investment performance and claim BNB rewards. It shows key data such as current holdings, claim history, and pool status. This tool is essential for engaging with the ecosystem.

Q: What are HODL Hands® NFTs?
A: HODL Hands® are a limited edition NFT collection designed to integrate with the HODL ecosystem. They allow users to stake NFTs to earn $HODL tokens or other benefits. These NFTs also tie into the Gem Fighter gaming system and have unique artwork.

Q: What are Gem Fighter NFTs?
A: Gem Fighter NFTs are characters in the Gem Fighter play-to-earn game. Players can battle, level up, and earn $HODL rewards using these NFTs. They also support staking and marketplace interactions within the broader HODL ecosystem.

Q: What is the HODL Play-to-Earn platform?
A: The platform includes a suite of blockchain-based games where users can earn rewards. By participating in games like Gem Miner or Crypto Slash, players can collect coins, dodge hazards, and increase their $HODL earnings. Rewards are real and integrated with the token system.

Q: What games are available on HODL?
A: Games currently offered include Gem Fighter, Crypto Slash, Solitaire, Gem Miner, Coin Catcher, and Moonshot. Each game features different mechanics but shares the goal of earning tokens or rewards. They are browser-based and accessible via the HODL app or website.

Q: Is there a HODL mobile app?
A: Yes, the HODL app is available for Android and will soon be available on iOS. The app centralizes the platform's features, including trading, NFTs, dashboards, and games. It’s designed to simplify interaction with the HODL ecosystem.

Q: What features are available in Lite vs Pro mode?
A: Lite Mode is tailored for beginners with a simplified interface and essential functions. Pro Mode provides advanced features for experienced users, such as analytics, tracking tools, and deeper financial insights. Users can toggle between modes based on preference.

Q: How is security handled?
A: HODL emphasizes military-grade encryption and platform security. Liquidity is locked until January 2280, which protects against rug pulls. The team is also doxxed and KYC verified, adding another layer of trust.

Q: Who are the partners behind $HODL?
A: HODL is supported by a network of contributors and developers. The team has undergone KYC verification, and partnerships include DEX aggregators, NFT marketplaces, and DeFi platforms. Collaboration helps strengthen the project's ecosystem and trust.

Q: What makes $HODL unique?
A: $HODL combines DeFi mechanics, NFTs, and gaming into one platform. It offers automatic BNB rewards, unique NFTs, a play-to-earn game suite, and a mobile app. The integration of these features makes it more dynamic than typical reflection tokens.

Q: How has $HODL performed so far?
A: Over 20,000 BNB has been claimed by users, and the platform has more than 23,000 holders. It has achieved a market cap of over $3 million and maintains a locked liquidity pool of over $300k. These stats highlight strong adoption and community engagement.

Q: What audits or verifications exist?
A: HODL’s smart contracts have undergone a formal audit. Additionally, the team has been KYC-verified, and its liquidity is locked through 2280. These measures help ensure platform integrity and investor protection.

Q: How can I view real-time charts and prices?
A: You can view live price movements and trading activity through DEX Screener, which is linked from the official site. These tools offer real-time analytics and trading volume across various pairs. Users can track HODL’s performance 24/7.

Q: What is the origin of the term 'HODL'?
A: 'HODL' began as a typo for 'hold' and has since become a popular crypto meme. It symbolizes the strategy of holding onto tokens despite market fluctuations. HODL Token embraces this ethos by rewarding long-term holders.

Q: Where can I access social media and resources?
A: HODL provides links to its GitHub, Medium blog, Linktree, and social media profiles. These platforms contain updates, technical resources, and community news. Investors are encouraged to follow for the latest announcements.

Q: How do NFTs interact with rewards?
A: Users can stake both HODL Hands® and Gem Fighter NFTs to earn rewards. This can include $HODL tokens or other in-game benefits. NFTs serve both as collectibles and yield-generating assets in the ecosystem.

Q: What is the Gem Fighter ecosystem?
A: Gem Fighter is a play-to-earn battle game that integrates with the HODL token and NFTs. Players use NFT characters to fight and earn rewards. The game connects gameplay with the financial utility of the HODL token.

Q: How does the reward pool accumulate BNB?
A: The reward pool accumulates BNB through a 5% transaction tax on every buy, sell, or transfer of $HODL. These taxed tokens are stored and swapped for BNB, which is then distributed weekly to holders. This mechanism ensures continuous reward generation.

Q: What is the total supply of $HODL tokens?
A: The total supply of $HODL tokens is fixed and fully circulated. Tokenomics are publicly viewable on BscScan and the dashboard. No hidden minting mechanisms exist.

Q: How do I claim my weekly rewards?
A: To claim your BNB rewards, visit the HODL dashboard, connect your wallet, and click the claim button. Claims reset weekly, so users are encouraged to return regularly.

Q: Can I view HODL on CoinMarketCap or CoinGecko?
A: Yes, $HODL is listed on both CoinMarketCap and CoinGecko. These platforms provide price tracking, trading volume, and token analytics.

Q: What is the '5% Tax for BNB Rewards' policy?
A: Every $HODL transaction includes a 5% fee that is converted into BNB rewards. This ensures that all holders benefit from ongoing trading activity.

Q: What is the utility of NFTs within HODL?
A: NFTs in the HODL ecosystem are more than art. They offer staking rewards, game mechanics, and access to exclusive in-app functions.

Q: How do I stake HODL Hands® NFTs?
A: HODL Hands® NFTs can be staked via the NFT staking portal. Once staked, users earn rewards over time based on their NFT tier and pool size.

Q: How can I get Gem Fighter NFTs?
A: Gem Fighter NFTs can be obtained by staking HODL Hands® or through the marketplace. They’re used in battle games and can be leveled up or traded.

Q: What is the difference between HODL Hands® and Gem Fighter NFTs?
A: HODL Hands® are collectible and stakeable NFTs with passive rewards. Gem Fighter NFTs are game-based characters used for active earning in battle games.

Q: What is the HODL Hands® Pack PDF?
A: The HODL Hands® Pack PDF outlines the NFT collection, rarity, and usage. It's a visual and descriptive resource for collectors and gamers alike.

Q: Is there a guide for new users?
A: Yes, the HODL platform provides resources, videos, and beginner-friendly guides to help new users get started. These include wallet setup instructions, slippage tips, and walkthroughs for rewards.

Q: Can I claim rewards using a mobile phone?
A: Yes, rewards can be claimed through the mobile app or mobile browser. Make sure your wallet is connected properly and use the Dashboard section.

Q: What is 'Claim BNB Rewards' on the site?
A: It's a shortcut to the rewards claim feature. It allows eligible users to claim their accumulated BNB directly to their wallet.

Q: What are the investor rankings?
A: Investor rankings display top holders and active community members based on wallet size or other metrics. This feature adds gamification and transparency.

Q: What is the liquidity lock period?
A: Liquidity for $HODL is locked until January 2280. This long-term lock boosts investor confidence and protects against rug pulls.

Q: What is 'Yahoo! Finance Press' about?
A: HODL has been featured in Yahoo! Finance and other outlets, highlighting its market performance and community strength. It adds visibility and credibility to the project.

Q: What does 'Doxxed & KYC Verified' mean?
A: It means the team has submitted identity verification through third parties, ensuring transparency. This reduces risk and builds trust with the community.

Q: What are the Gem Fighter NFTs used for?
A: They are used in the Gem Fighter game and can be staked for rewards. Players can train them, engage in battles, and earn tokens based on performance.

Q: Where can I trade or view NFTs?
A: You can access the NFT marketplace from the official site. Both HODL Hands® and Gem Fighter NFTs are listed there for viewing and trading.

Q: What is the 3D Gemstone Viewer?
A: It’s an interactive tool that lets users explore NFT visuals in 3D. This adds depth and immersion to the NFT ownership experience.

Q: What is the Solitaire game on HODL?
A: Solitaire is one of HODL’s play-to-earn games. It's a classic card game reimagined to reward winners with $HODL tokens. Users can play daily and compete for leaderboard rankings.

Q: What is Crypto Slash?
A: Crypto Slash is an arcade-style game where players slash tokens and dodge hazards. Points convert into in-game rewards and eligible holders may receive tokens or NFTs for their performance.

Q: What is Coin Catcher?
A: Coin Catcher is a game where players grab falling coins to earn points. The higher the score, the more potential for in-game rewards or leaderboard benefits. It's part of the broader play-to-earn suite.

Q: What is Gem Miner?
A: Gem Miner is a match-style puzzle game where users mine gems and collect points. It includes bonus levels and multipliers. High scorers may be rewarded with tokens or NFTs.

Q: What is Moonshot?
A: Moonshot is a platform game where you jump between planets, avoid enemies, and earn points. The longer you survive, the better the rewards. It's integrated with the $HODL economy.

Q: How are games connected to $HODL rewards?
A: Most games are tied to the $HODL economy via scoring systems, NFT bonuses, and staking incentives. High scorers may be rewarded with $HODL tokens, NFTs, or leaderboard visibility.

Q: What is the purpose of the play-to-earn system?
A: Play-to-earn provides a fun way to earn passive and active income. It keeps the community engaged and ties gaming to the HODL reward ecosystem.

Q: What is the Linktree on the HODL site?
A: The Linktree provides a unified list of important HODL links. These include social media, dashboards, NFT portals, and documents. It’s a quick-access resource hub.

Q: What is the Resource Library?
A: The Resource Library includes documents, whitepapers, NFTs guides, and game packs. It’s designed to help both new and advanced users understand the ecosystem.

Q: What is the Gem Fighter Pack PDF?
A: It’s a downloadable document that outlines the Gem Fighter NFT collection, gameplay mechanics, and staking benefits. It's useful for those wanting to get more involved in the NFT game system.

Q: Where can I download the Android app?
A: The Android app is available from the HODL website. It consolidates features like NFT staking, rewards claiming, and gameplay access.

Q: Is an iOS version available?
A: The iOS version is currently in development. Users are encouraged to follow announcements to be notified of its release.

Q: What is Lite Mode in the app?
A: Lite Mode is a simplified version of the app for beginners. It includes easy-to-use interfaces and hides advanced features to prevent confusion.

Q: What is Pro Mode in the app?
A: Pro Mode unlocks advanced dashboards, real-time analytics, and power user tools. It’s ideal for seasoned investors or traders managing large HODL holdings.

Q: What does 'Military-Grade Security' refer to?
A: It refers to the app’s implementation of strong encryption, wallet protection, and safe API calls. This minimizes the risk of exploits or data leaks.

Q: What is the 'Videos' section?
A: It hosts tutorials, trailers, community events, and other video content to educate and engage users. New videos are added regularly.

Q: How can I get support?
A: The app and website both include live support chat features. You can also find FAQs, documents, and a Discord community for help.

Q: What is the purpose of NFT staking?
A: NFT staking lets users lock their NFTs in exchange for periodic token or game-based rewards. This creates a passive income stream tied to NFT ownership.

Q: Can I swap tokens for NFTs directly?
A: Yes, the HODL ecosystem includes a Swap Tokens for NFTs feature, allowing users to use $HODL to acquire NFTs without needing fiat or other crypto.

Q: What does the dashboard show?
A: It displays wallet balances, rewards status, NFT activity, and real-time price charts. It’s the main control panel for users to manage their holdings and claim benefits.

Q: What is the function of the audit report?
A: The audit report ensures that the smart contract is safe, transparent, and free of critical vulnerabilities. It’s performed by an independent security firm and is published publicly for community review.

Q: How do I verify the smart contract on BscScan?
A: You can find the smart contract address on the official HODL site and search it on BscScan. There, you can view code, transactions, holders, and tokenomics information.

Q: How are NFTs transferred or traded?
A: NFTs can be traded through the HODL marketplace or external platforms like BSC-based DEXes. Transfers require small gas fees and are completed through connected wallets.

Q: What is the purpose of the staking interface?
A: The staking interface allows users to lock NFTs or tokens and track rewards in real time. It includes visuals for staked assets and estimated earnings.

Q: What is the benefit of holding $HODL long-term?
A: Long-term holders receive consistent BNB rewards and may qualify for bonus programs or rankings. The tokenomics are structured to reward loyalty through compounding benefits.

Q: Are there any referral programs?
A: Currently, there is no active referral program, but the community may vote on introducing such features in the future. Any announcements will appear on official channels.

Q: What are 'Slippage Settings' and why are they important?
A: Slippage accounts for price fluctuations during token swaps. For $HODL, a 6% slippage is recommended to accommodate the transaction tax and ensure successful execution.

Q: Can I connect multiple wallets?
A: Yes, you can connect multiple wallets via the dashboard or app. However, rewards and NFTs are tracked separately per wallet address.

Q: How do I level up in Gem Fighter?
A: Leveling up occurs by winning matches and participating in training or battles. Higher levels unlock better reward multipliers and rare abilities.

Q: Are there seasonal game tournaments?
A: Yes, HODL hosts tournaments where top scorers win special prizes, including rare NFTs or extra $HODL tokens. Seasons are announced via the community channels.

Q: How do I get listed in Investor Rankings?
A: Rankings are based on token holdings, staking activity, or NFT participation. Top wallets are listed publicly and may be eligible for exclusive rewards.

Q: What is the community governance model?
A: The community may vote on features, integrations, or changes to tokenomics. Voting rights are usually tied to holding/staking levels and occur via on-chain or snapshot tools.

Q: What does 'Token Burn' mean in this project?
A: Token burn refers to removing tokens permanently from circulation. HODL may periodically burn tokens to reduce supply and increase scarcity.

Q: What happens if I sell my HODL tokens?
A: You will stop receiving BNB rewards and lose eligibility for rankings or NFT bonuses. Also, the 5% tax applies on all sell transactions.

Q: Are there minimum holding requirements for rewards?
A: No minimum is strictly enforced, but users with very low balances may receive negligible BNB. Larger holders naturally get a bigger share of the pool.

Q: What are reward claim cycles?
A: Rewards are calculated and distributed on a weekly basis. Claim cycles reset every 7 days, and unclaimed rewards may roll over or expire based on settings.

Q: Can I track my NFTs inside the app?
A: Yes, the app provides a full NFT tracker including staked and unstaked assets. You can also see earnings and rarity levels.

Q: What are play-to-earn streaks?
A: Some games feature streak bonuses, where players earn more by playing multiple days in a row. These are limited-time events to increase daily engagement.

Q: What is the purpose of the HODL community Discord?
A: It’s a space for users to ask questions, discuss strategies, and receive updates. It’s moderated and often includes early news or beta access for games and NFTs.

Q: Is the HODL app audited or tested?
A: Yes, the app has gone through internal security checks and continuous updates. Any third-party audits will be published on the main website or GitHub.

Q: How are play-to-earn scores calculated?
A: Each game has its own scoring formula based on in-game actions like time survived, coins collected, or enemies defeated. High scores may be used for reward eligibility and leaderboard placement.

Q: Are there any play-to-earn leaderboards?
A: Yes, leaderboards display top players in each game. Players who rank highly may win bonus $HODL tokens, NFTs, or even whitelisting spots for future drops.

Q: Can I use a hardware wallet with HODL?
A: Yes, you can use a Ledger or similar hardware wallet for enhanced security. Just connect it via MetaMask or WalletConnect on the dashboard or app.

Q: What are staking multipliers?
A: Some NFTs offer higher reward yields due to rarity or leveling. These are referred to as staking multipliers and can significantly boost your earnings.

Q: What are passive vs active earnings in HODL?
A: Passive earnings come from holding tokens or staking NFTs. Active earnings come from gameplay, leaderboards, or engaging with app features like quests.

Q: What is the HODL AppQuest feature?
A: AppQuest allows users to complete small tasks like verifying their wallet, playing a game, or sharing content. Completing quests earns in-app bonuses or NFTs.

Q: What chains does HODL support?
A: HODL is built on Binance Smart Chain (BSC). Token interactions, NFT minting, and rewards all function on BSC for speed and affordability.

Q: Can I transfer NFTs between wallets?
A: Yes, NFTs are standard BEP-721 tokens and can be transferred like any other NFT. You just need the receiving wallet address and gas fees.

Q: Can I mint my own NFTs?
A: Currently, users cannot mint their own NFTs, but new drops are frequently launched by the HODL team. Future features may include custom minting or user-generated NFTs.

Q: What is the HODL Game Pass?
A: The Game Pass gives access to exclusive features in games, like extra lives, premium levels, or boosted rewards. It may be earned or purchased with $HODL.

Q: What is a wallet signature?
A: A wallet signature is a way to verify your identity without spending gas. It’s used to log into dashboards or claim rewards securely.

Q: Can I use Trust Wallet with HODL?
A: Yes, Trust Wallet is fully compatible. You can connect via WalletConnect in both the mobile app and web dashboard.

Q: What is a whitelist event?
A: A whitelist event gives early access to NFT drops, token sales, or game features. Users can qualify by holding tokens, staking, or completing tasks.

Q: How can I report bugs or suggestions?
A: Use the in-app feedback form or report via Discord. The team is responsive and regularly incorporates community suggestions into updates.

Q: Are there any gas fees for claiming rewards?
A: Yes, small BNB fees are required to claim BNB rewards or move tokens. These are standard Binance Smart Chain transaction costs.

Q: How often do new NFTs drop?
A: New collections or limited-time NFTs drop every few weeks. Keep an eye on announcements and subscribe to notifications for early access.

Q: Can I integrate HODL with DeFi tools?
A: Yes, you can add $HODL to DeFi dashboards or aggregators like DEXTools, Bogged Finance, or TrustWallet. You’ll need the contract address from the site.

Q: What is the future roadmap of HODL?
A: The roadmap includes new NFT integrations, mobile game expansions, more utility for $HODL, and potential cross-chain compatibility. The team publishes updates quarterly.

Q: What happens if I miss a weekly reward claim?
A: Depending on the cycle, unclaimed BNB may roll into the next week or be redistributed. It’s best to claim weekly to avoid losing rewards.

Q: How can I join the HODL community?
A: You can join via Discord, Telegram, Twitter, or the official website. The community is active, supportive, and often rewarded for engagement.

Q: What is the official $HODL contract address?
A: The official $HODL contract address is:
`0xC0FeC427c9E917365d3316507B34663B6E139e9e`
This is a BEP-20 token on Binance Smart Chain. You can verify it on [BscScan](https://bscscan.com/token/0xC0FeC427c9E917365d3316507B34663B6E139e9e). Always copy the address from official sources to avoid scams.

Q: Can you explain the full tokenomics of $HODL?
A: $HODL implements a 5% tax on every transaction. This tax funds the BNB reward pool, project marketing, and ecosystem sustainability. Liquidity is locked until 2280, and the contract is fully audited and doxxed. Token supply is fixed, with no hidden minting or inflation risk.

Q: What charity events has HODL supported?
A: HODL has organized and contributed to several charity events, demonstrating its commitment to social responsibility. These events have included donations to global humanitarian causes and fundraising campaigns run through the community. Details of each event are shared via official announcements and social media.

Q: How does HODL support donations or charitable giving?
A: The HODL ecosystem has built-in mechanisms to direct a portion of funds toward charitable causes. Community votes sometimes determine where donations are sent, and wallets used for donation transparency are publicly viewable. This gives investors a chance to support meaningful change while holding tokens.

Q: What kind of community events does HODL host?
A: HODL regularly hosts community events such as trivia games, NFT art challenges, AMA sessions, and live giveaways. These events are designed to reward active participants and grow the HODL ecosystem in a fun and engaging way. They are usually announced on Discord, Telegram, and Twitter.

Q: How does HODL handle token burns?
A: HODL periodically performs manual token burns to reduce circulating supply and increase scarcity. These burns are publicly announced and verifiable on BscScan. This practice aligns with long-term deflationary goals and enhances value for token holders.

Q: What is the token vesting structure?
A: Vesting schedules are in place to ensure that team members, advisors, and strategic partners receive tokens gradually over time. This prevents large-scale dumping and aligns long-term incentives. Vesting details are typically disclosed in the whitepaper or roadmap.

Q: Does HODL have a token buyback program?
A: Yes, HODL has implemented buyback initiatives in the past to support price stability and reward holders. These buybacks are announced ahead of time and are usually funded from platform earnings. All transactions are trackable on-chain for transparency.

Q: Has HODL conducted any airdrops?
A: Yes, HODL has held several airdrops to reward early adopters, contest winners, and active community members. Airdrop events are announced through official social channels and often require users to hold tokens or complete simple tasks to qualify.

Q: How do I participate in HODL giveaways?
A: Giveaways are frequently hosted on Discord, Twitter, and Telegram. To enter, users may need to complete actions such as liking a post, submitting a wallet address, or participating in a mini-contest. Winners are chosen transparently and prizes can include tokens, NFTs, or merch.

Q: What are the rules for community contests?
A: Each contest comes with its own set of rules, such as submission deadlines, format requirements, and eligibility criteria. These are always clearly outlined in the official announcement posts. Most contests reward creativity, activity, or luck, and winners are often showcased.

Q: What is token migration and has HODL done one?
A: Token migration refers to moving a project from one contract or blockchain to another, often to upgrade features or improve security. HODL has migrated contracts in the past to implement better reward mechanics and optimize gas fees. Migration steps are always carefully documented and guided.

Q: What specific charity work has HODL done?
A: HODL created a dedicated charity wallet and conducted one of its most notable contributions by donating $25,000 to India COVID relief efforts. This donation was fully transparent and verifiable on-chain. The HODL community also plays a role in choosing charitable causes via voting mechanisms. These initiatives have been recognized in press mentions and reflect HODL’s commitment to social impact.

Q: What is the HODL Forward initiative?
A: HODL Forward is a branded charity campaign launched by the HODL team to make meaningful social impact. A public wallet was created to collect donations from both the team and community. The funds were used to support causes chosen by community vote, such as health emergencies, education, or humanitarian relief. It stands as a prime example of DeFi enabling transparent, community-powered philanthropy.

Q: How did HODL support COVID-19 relief in India?
A: During a peak moment of the pandemic, HODL donated $25,000 in BNB to support COVID-19 relief efforts in India. This was part of the HODL Forward campaign and funded by contributions from the team and community members. The donation was transparent and viewable via the blockchain, and the effort was highlighted across community channels and external media coverage. It helped position HODL as a purpose-driven project.

FAQs

How does the reward pool work?

Holding $HODL gives you access to the BNB reward pool, where you can claim your share every 7 days. Your rewards are based on your percentage of all investor-held tokens (excluding project wallets and liquidity). The more you hold, the bigger your share. Check the homepage for the current pool balance and total BNB paid out.

How is the reward pool funded?

A 5% tax on all buys, sells, and transfers funds the reward pool. These taxed tokens are converted into BNB by our sell bot. Additional revenue from NFT sales and gaming further boosts the pool.

How do I claim my rewards?

Connect your wallet at the top right and ensure you’re on Binance Smart Chain. Choose to claim as BNB, tax-free $HODL reinvestment, or a mix, then confirm your claim. Your rewards will be sent to your wallet, and your claim timer resets for another 7 days.

Why should I reinvest my rewards?

Reinvesting into $HODL is tax-free, saving you the 5% fee. Reinvest 100% of your rewards to claim three days earlier next time, maximizing your earnings.

Do I lose rewards if I don’t claim?

No, rewards stay in the pool until you claim. However, since they become available every 7 days, missing claims means fewer claims per year—reducing your total earnings.

How do I earn more rewards?

The more $HODL you own, the bigger your share of the reward pool. Buying more, reinvesting tax-free, and participating in NFTs and gaming all help increase earnings.

INFINITE BRAND POWER

HODL isn’t just a name—it’s the most recognized word in crypto
, embodying the ultimate investment strategy: Hold On for Dear Life. This unparalleled brand power gives us a unique advantage, resonating with investors worldwide and setting us apart from projects lacking credibility or meaning. With HODL’s global recognition, we’re taking it to the next level by leading the way in rewarding users to hold, redefining crypto rewards, and building a household name in the world of finance.
$HODL - THE KING OF BNB REWARDS

Contract address (BSC):
0x32b407ee915432be6d3f168bc1eff2a6f8b2034c

BNB REWARDS
$HODL has paid out over 20,000 BNB in rewards so far!

Hold $HODL in your wallet to earn BNB rewards
by claiming your percentage of the reward pool each week. Your share is calculated based on the proportion of tokens you hold relative to the total investor-held tokens. These rewards are funded by a 5% tax on all transactions, supplemented by revenues from NFTs and gaming activities, with the reward pool's balance influenced by trading volume and overall ecosystem income.

Claim your rewards every 7 days
by connecting your wallet to the
claim page
.

To ensure fairness and prevent gaming the system, if you add more than 10% to your token balance, your claim time is extended proportionally. For increases over 100%, you'll need to wait an additional 7 days—creating a sustainable and balanced rewards system.

DYNAMIC REWARD BOT

The Dynamic Reward Bot ensures the $HODL reward pool operates intelligently, selling tokens dynamically based on factors such as price performance, reward pool stability, and token balances. This ensures BNB rewards are maximized while maintaining long-term ecosystem sustainability.

How It Works:

The reward pool collects $HODL tokens from transaction taxes, NFT revenues, and gaming profits.

The Dynamic Reward Bot converts these tokens into BNB rewards for holders, intelligently selling up to 1.5% of the stored tokens at a time.

Dynamic Adjustments:

The bot adapts how much it converts based on:

Token Price:

Sells more during price surges to maximize BNB rewards.

Reward Pool Balance:

Reduces sales as the pool approaches capacity to avoid over-depletion.

Token Levels:

Monitors token reserves in the pool to ensure stability.

By dynamically adjusting sales based on market and pool conditions, the Dynamic Reward Bot minimizes sell pressure, optimizes rewards, and ensures the $HODL ecosystem remains sustainable over the long term.

TAX-FREE REINVESTMENT

Maximize your rewards with our customizable claim system! Use the slider on the
claim page
to choose BNB, $HODL, or a mix of both. Reinvesting your rewards is tax-free, and every reinvestment places a buy on the chart. Best of all, if you
reinvest 100% into $HODL, your next claim is unlocked in just 4 days instead of the usual 7
!

STABLE REWARDS

Your weekly BNB reward claims are based on a cap set in the contract, ensuring consistent payouts without depleting the reward pool. Remaining funds are preserved in the pool for future claims, ensuring stability even during periods of low trading volume.

How your weekly claim is calculated:
(Your token holdings ÷ Total investor-held tokens) × Reward cap

Example:

If you hold 10,000,000 tokens, the total investor-held tokens are 650,000,000, and the reward cap is 15 BNB, your claim would be:
(10,000,000 ÷ 650,000,000) × 15 BNB = 0.23 BNB

For example, if the pool holds 100 BNB and the cap is 15 BNB, the same amount can be claimed weekly for up to 7 weeks, even if no additional BNB is added.

You can see the current reward pool cap when connecting to the
claim page
and at the top of this whitepaper.

This system ensures steady payouts during low volume, builds reserves during high volume, and guarantees long-term sustainability of rewards.

CONTRACT INNOVATION

Break free from the limitations of traditional blockchain contracts with $HODL's upgradable proxy contract! While most contracts are locked forever, leaving no room for improvement as technology evolves, $HODL stands apart. Our innovative design allows us to:

Optimize Efficiency:

We've already reduced gas fees on reward claims by an incredible
95%
!

Add New Features:

Seamlessly integrate the latest innovations to enhance your experience.

Fix Issues:

Address errors or close loopholes, ensuring maximum security and performance.

Remove Redundancies:

Streamline operations to keep things running smoothly.

With $HODL, your investment is future-proof, evolving with the latest trends and advancements in blockchain technology. Why settle for outdated when you can stay ahead of the game with $HODL?

ANTI-DUMP DEFENSE

Protecting $HODL and its community is our priority. To minimize the negative impact of large sell-offs, we’ve implemented a maximum sell limit of 0.25% of the total supply per address per 24 hours—equivalent to 25,000,000 tokens.

This isn’t about stopping people from selling; it’s about fostering a fair and sustainable ecosystem. By limiting massive dumps, we prevent selfish actions that harm the wider community—an issue that frustrates crypto investors everywhere. With this sensible measure in place, $HODL ensures stability and long-term growth for everyone involved.

FAIRTRADE COOLDOWN

Market manipulation and bot-driven exploits are problems that harm countless crypto projects, causing instability and even failure. At $HODL, we’ve taken the lead in addressing this with the FairTrade Cooldown—a 60-second waiting period after buying $HODL before selling.

For genuine investors, 60 seconds is insignificant and has no real impact on your trading experience. However, it’s a powerful deterrent to manipulative bots that exploit rapid buy-sell cycles, manipulate prices, and harm the community. The cooldown also blocks front-running and Miner Extractable Value (MEV) exploits, creating a fairer and more stable environment.

As the first project to implement this innovative solution, $HODL is setting a new standard in the crypto space. We’re focused on protecting our ecosystem and expect this measure to inspire others to follow our lead.

REWARD CLAIM SHARE

The $HODL contract calculates your BNB rewards based on the proportion of tokens you hold relative to the total investor-held tokens. Non-investor wallets, such as the $HODL contract wallet and PancakeSwap liquidity pool wallet, are excluded from the calculation, ensuring rewards are distributed among fewer tokens. This increases earnings for holders while maintaining ecosystem transparency and reliability. The full list of excluded wallets is available at the top of this page.

is your ultimate crypto companion, providing powerful insights and analytics to manage and maximize your investment. Simply connect your wallet or enter an address to access personalized insights. Need a broader view? Enter multiple addresses to see an aggregated snapshot of all your wallets. $HODL Dash ensures you’re always in control with unparalleled transparency and data at your fingertips.

SECURITY AND TRANSPARENCY

CONTRACT AUDIT

Our $HODL token contract has undergone a thorough
audit by cyberscope
, one of the most trusted auditors recognized by CoinMarketCap. The audit confirms that $HODL is a secure and innovative DeFi powerhouse, designed to lead the market. The audit also boosts our CMC ranking, showcasing our commitment to transparency and security.

MULTI-SIGNATURE WALLETS

To safeguard project funds, we have implemented multi-signature wallets, which require multiple approvals for transactions. This significantly reduces the risk of single-point failures and ensures funds remain secure under all circumstances.

Crucially, only these hardware wallets can interact with the $HODL contract, ensuring
no unauthorized access is possible
. Every wallet has been generated offline using an air-gapped hardware wallet, and seed phrases are never digitally recorded. Instead, they are securely stored in metal ciphers and kept in vaults across multiple locations, providing unparalleled protection for our ecosystem.

BUG BOUNTY

We are rewarding community members for identifying and reporting vulnerabilities in the HODL ecosystem with our generous
bug bounty
. This initiative helps ensure our contract remains robust, secure, and resilient to emerging threats, while empowering our community to actively contribute to the project’s success.

LOCKED LIQUIDITY

The Liquidity Pool (LP) is locked
for the maximum period possible—255 years—with UniCrypt, the most trusted provider in the industry. This lock demonstrates our long-term commitment and solidifies $HODL as a reliable and secure investment.

Evolving Smart Contract

With $HODL, we continuously refine our contract—optimizing reward generation, reinvestment options, and BNB reward claims to reduce gas fees, enhance rewards, and maximize returns for all holders.

Evolving Smart Contract

Reinvestment bonuses

Claim 100% of your rewards in $HODL and enjoy a bonus—your next claim unlocks in just 4 days instead of the usual 7! Plus, any amount of your reward reinvested in $HODL is tax-free.

Reinvestment bonuses

Multiple reward options

Investors can now choose their rewards in BNB, tax-free $HODL, and soon, HODL Hands® and Gem Fighter NFTs.

Multiple reward options

Dynamic Reward Bot

The Dynamic Reward Bot optimizes the $HODL reward pool to maximize BNB rewards while maintaining ecosystem stability. It intelligently sells tokens based on price performance, pool balance, and token reserves—converting them into BNB rewards for holders. With adaptive adjustments, it sells more during price surges and scales back when the pool is full, minimizing sell pressure and ensuring long-term sustainability.

Dynamic Reward Bot

Refer and Earn

Our affiliate program rewards HODLERS for bringing new investors into the community, driving growth and expansion.

Refer and Earn

HODL App

Your gateway to reward income—anytime, anywhere! The HODL App keeps you updated with reward alerts, trading functions, wallet access, and the full HODL ecosystem. Connect with a global audience and introduce new investors to DeFi.

Fiat On and Off Ramps

We're working to upgrade our platform with a world-class fiat on/off-ramp, supporting as many countries as possible, including the US. This will make buying $HODL easier with pay-by-card and pay-via-bank options.

Fiat On and Off Ramps

NFT Trading

A new way to trade Gem Fighter and HODL Hands® NFTs is coming! Our upcoming NFT Trading feature will let you set prices and trade your NFTs for BNB, $HODL, or other Gem Fighter NFTs—all within the HODL ecosystem. Plus, swap fees will boost the $HODL reward pool and support project growth, strengthening the ecosystem for all holders.

NFT Trading

HODL Pay

We're developing a digital payment card within the HODL App, allowing users to spend their rewards in-store and online—bringing HODL to the mainstream.

HODL Pay

Texas HODL

Experience the thrill of Texas Hold'em poker with HODL Hands® NFT integration! Play to win while contributing to the reward pool and supporting the HODL ecosystem.

Texas HODL

Telegram Trading Bot

A seamless trading experience directly within Telegram. Set buy and sell orders, execute trades, and transfer $HODL—all without the complexities of software wallets or slippage settings. Designed for efficiency, security, and ease of use, this bot empowers users to trade $HODL effortlessly within the community.

Telegram Trading Bot

DEX Listings
$HODL is heavily decentralized and available on multiple DEXs, including PancakeSwap, Uniswap, 1inch, Flooz, and Mobula. Rewards are generated from on-chain activity, allowing holders to trade securely and claim BNB every 7 days!

DEX Listings

Listings Optimization

We maximize $HODL's visibility on platforms like CoinMarketCap, CoinGecko, Nomics, and BscScan by ensuring complete and accurate information. This attracts new investors, strengthens credibility, and reinforces our commitment to transparency and professionalism.

Listings Optimization

New DEX Listings

We plan to expand $HODL's reach by listing on more decentralized exchanges, including those requiring their own liquidity pools, such as DODO Swap and Uniswap.

New DEX Listings

Top 5 CEX Listing

With a doxxed CEO, a registered company, and a strong team, $HODL is well-positioned for major CEX listings on platforms like Binance, Gate.io, Coinbase, and KuCoin. A top 5 CEX listing would open the door to millions of investors, boosting our global reach and reinforcing our world-class brand and ecosystem.

Top 5 CEX Listing

Innovation, Security, and Reward Income—Redefined

Shaping the Future of DeFi: HODL’s Achievements

Pioneering BNB rewards and DeFi innovation, HODL is setting new standards in crypto.

HODL is redefining the future of DeFi, building the most advanced reward income ecosystem in crypto. Since launching in May 2021, we’ve delivered groundbreaking innovations, secured key partnerships, and set new standards for security, transparency, and long-term sustainability.

Project Milestones

Launched on May 12, 2021

Achieved an all-time high market cap of $220 million

Reached over 100,000 holders at peak

Raised $180,000 for the relaunch, securing full liquidity replacement

Successfully migrated to a new, upgraded contract with enhanced security

Locked liquidity for 255 years via UniCrypt

Registered HODLVERSE Inc. as an official company

Reward Income

Paid over 20,000 BNB in rewards to holders (~$14M)

Established HODL as the highest-paying BNB reward token in history

Introduced tax-free reinvestment of $HODL

Implemented a Dynamic Reward Bot to optimize the BNB reward pool

Reduced gas fees by up to 85% for all transactions

Excluded project-owned wallets from rewards, increasing holder earnings by 30%

Developed and launched the enhanced BNB Reward Claim system

Security & Transparency

Fully doxxed team with a KYC-verified CEO

Completed multiple contract audits, including Cyberscope and RugFreeCoins

Secured a ‘Low Risk’ rating on BNBChain.org

Verified the HODL official Telegram group

Established a multi-signature ownership structure for enhanced security

Integrated the FairTrade Cooldown feature to prevent bot exploits

Built a
market-leading Telegram bot
for real-time stats, investor insights, and security

Developed a 360 Gemstone Viewer for Gem Fighter NFTs to verify NFT authenticity

Security You Can Trust

How HODL Safeguards Your Investments

At HODL, safeguarding your investments is our top priority. We implement a multi-layered security approach to protect $HODL, HODL Hands® NFTs, and Gem Fighter NFTs while maintaining full transparency and trust.

Smart Contract & Token Security

Audited & Verified
– $HODL has been independently audited by Cyberscope and RugFreeCoins.

Multi-Signature Protection
– All critical contract functions require multi-signature approvals.

Liquidity Locked for 255 Years
– Ensuring long-term stability and preventing rug pulls.

FairTrade Cooldown
– Protecting investors from front-running and price manipulation.

Low-Risk Rating
– Verified as a low-risk project by BNBChain.org.

Team & Key Management

Doxxed & KYC-Verified Leadership
– Fully transparent and accountable team.

Hardware Wallet Security
– Private keys are stored offline in air-gapped hardware wallets.

Distributed Key Holders
– Multi-country storage to eliminate centralized risk.

Community & Ecosystem Protections

Verified Official Channels
– Telegram, X, and other social platforms are verified.

Real-Time Scam Monitoring
– Our team actively tracks and reports suspicious activity.

Secure NFT Minting
– HODL Hands® and Gem Fighter NFTs are contract-verified.

Automated BNB Reward System
– Secure and seamless reward distribution.

– Always verify at
hodltoken.net

– No admin will ever ask for private keys.

– Check pinned messages in official groups before engaging.

The HODL team will never DM you first or ask you to connect your wallet.

Always use official links from our website or verified accounts.

How do I know if a message is really from the HODL team?

The HODL team will never DM you first or ask you to connect your wallet. Always verify messages by checking official links at hodltoken.net.

What should I do if someone asks for my seed phrase?

Never share your seed phrase with anyone. No admin, team member, or support staff will ever ask for your private keys. If someone asks, report and block them immediately.

How do I ensure I’m using the correct contract address?

Always check the official contract address at hodltoken.net. Avoid searching for it on third-party websites, as scammers may create fake tokens.

Is it safe to click links in the Telegram or X (Twitter) community?

No. Do not engage with links from unknown users in Telegram or social media. Only trust links shared in official announcements or pinned messages from verified accounts.

How does HODL secure my tokens and NFTs?

HODL uses multi-signature wallets, contract audits, and strict security protocols to protect investor assets. Liquidity is locked, and contract ownership is secured with multiple safeguards.

Cryptocurrency Investment Risks

At HODL, we prioritize transparency and aim to provide our users with a comprehensive understanding of the risks associated with cryptocurrency investments. Cryptocurrencies offer exciting opportunities, but they also come with a range of risks that every investor should be aware of. This page outlines some of the key risks to consider before investing in cryptocurrencies.

Market Volatility

Cryptocurrency markets are renowned for their extreme volatility. Prices can experience rapid and significant fluctuations over short periods. While this volatility can result in substantial gains, it also exposes investors to the risk of significant losses.

Regulatory Risks

Cryptocurrency regulations vary by country and can change over time. These regulations can impact the legality, taxation, and accessibility of cryptocurrency investments. It's essential to stay informed about the regulatory environment in your jurisdiction.

Security Risks

Protecting your cryptocurrency holdings is paramount. Security risks include the potential for phishing attacks, scams, and the importance of safeguarding your private keys and recovery phrases. Neglecting security measures can lead to the loss of your assets.

Lack of Consumer Protections

Unlike traditional financial systems, cryptocurrencies often lack the consumer protections and insurance that you might be accustomed to. If you lose access to your wallet or your assets are stolen, recovery may be challenging or impossible.

Technology Risks

Cryptocurrencies rely on blockchain technology, which is continually evolving. Technical issues, software bugs, or vulnerabilities could affect the security and functionality of your holdings.

Investment Knowledge

A solid understanding of the cryptocurrencies you invest in is crucial. Insufficient knowledge can lead to poor investment decisions and increased risk.

Diversification

Diversifying your investments across different assets can help mitigate risk. Overcommitting to a single cryptocurrency can expose you to higher levels of risk if that asset experiences a downturn.

Timing and Speculation

Cryptocurrency markets are influenced by speculation, making timing your investments challenging. Avoid making decisions based solely on hype or speculation, as this can lead to poor outcomes.

Tax Implications

Cryptocurrency transactions may have tax implications in your jurisdiction. Consult with a tax professional to ensure you comply with local tax laws.

Long-Term Considerations

Cryptocurrency investments should be viewed with a long-term perspective. Short-term price fluctuations are common, but focusing on the long-term potential of your investments is often a more prudent approach.

Useful Links for More Information:

Investopedia - Cryptocurrency Risks
: Explore an in-depth guide to the risks associated with cryptocurrencies, including market volatility, security concerns, and regulatory challenges.

Crypto.com - What Is a Crypto Wallet? A Beginner’s Guide
: Learn about the importance of cryptocurrency wallet security and how to choose a secure wallet.

IRS - Virtual Currencies
: Understand the tax implications of cryptocurrency transactions in the United States.

Coinbase - Learn Crypto
: Coinbase offers a variety of educational resources on cryptocurrency, including articles on risk management.

CryptoSlate - Cryptocurrency News and Analysis
: Stay updated on the latest news, trends, and insights in the cryptocurrency industry.

SEC - Investor Alerts
: The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) provides investor alerts related to cryptocurrency and digital assets.

CFTC - Virtual Currency
: The U.S. Commodity Futures Trading Commission (CFTC) offers fraud advisories related to virtual currencies.

Cryptocurrency Risks and Red Flags
: In September 2020, the Financial Action Task Force (FATF) released a report highlighting red flag indicators of money laundering and terrorist financing specifically aimed at virtual assets.

Reddit - Cryptocurrency Subreddits
: Engage with the cryptocurrency community and get insights from other investors on Reddit's cryptocurrency-related subreddits. Make sure if you engage others online that you never share your private keys with anyone!

Cryptocurrency investments offer exciting possibilities, but they are not without risks. It's essential to approach cryptocurrency investments with caution, conduct thorough research, and make informed decisions. Remember that the decision to invest in cryptocurrencies should align with your financial goals and risk tolerance.

The Ultimate Reward Token

Hold $HODL – Get Free BNB!

Claim your BNB rewards every 7 days without selling a single token.
$HODL launched on Binance Smart Chain (BSC) in May 2021 and has already rewarded holders with over 20,000 BNB (~$14m)!

BNB Rewards on Tap
$HODL applies a 5% fee on every transaction, fueling the BNB reward pool. Simply hold $HODL to earn—taxed tokens are converted into BNB, claimable every 7 days. Plus, NFT sales and play-to-earn gaming further boost rewards.

Built for Long-Term Success
$HODL is built for enduring performance and sustainable rewards, featuring a suite of innovations that set it apart:

Intelligent Reward Generation:

Our Dynamic Reward Bot converts up to 1.5% of collected tokens into BNB, maximizing rewards while minimizing sell pressure.

Sustainable Reward Pool:

A capped pool that stabilizes payouts for predictable rewards.

Diverse Revenue Streams:

Earn from transaction fees, play-to-earn gaming, NFT sales, and more.

Secure, On-Chain Transactions:

Enjoy transparent, secure interactions on Binance Smart Chain.

Robust Security Measures:

Doxxed team, KYC, registered company, locked liquidity, multi-sig controls, air-gapped wallets, and extensive audits keep your investment safe.

Built Around the HODL Ethos:

Embrace long-term holding to navigate market turbulence and maximize gains.

Marketing Edge:

Leverage a highly recognized brand with major search volume for lasting impact.

What Does the future HODL?
$HODL's future is incredibly bright as it cements its position as one of the most advanced and innovative tokens in the DeFi space. Check out our
roadmap
for upcoming milestones and discover the future of investing!

What is $HODL?
$HODL is a Binance Smart Chain (BSC) reward token that pays you BNB simply for holding—no staking required. A 5% transaction tax funds the reward pool, supplemented by earnings from NFT sales and play-to-earn gaming. Holders can claim rewards every 7 days.

What is the utility of $HODL?

Simply hold $HODL and claim BNB rewards every 7 days—no staking required.

What is the key info on $HODL?
$HODL runs on Binance Smart Chain (BSC) with a fixed supply of 10 billion tokens. Every transaction has a 5% tax, and a 6% slippage is required when trading. Contract: 0x32b407ee915432be6d3f168bc1eff2a6f8b2034c.

What are the taxes on $HODL?

A 5% tax applies to every transaction, directly funding the BNB reward pool.

Is $HODL inflationary?

No. $HODL has a fixed supply of 10 Billion tokens. Additionally, we actively support long-term value by conducting manual burns and buyback-and-burn events.

Is $HODL secure?

Yes, security is a top priority. $HODL is backed by a doxxed team, KYC verification, and a registered company. Additional security measures include locked liquidity, multi-sig contract controls, air-gapped project wallets, and extensive security audits.

How can I buy $HODL?

Buy $HODL on leading decentralized exchanges—check the 'Exchanges' menu on our website. Use 6% slippage to cover the 5% tax.

How frequently can I claim my rewards?

Rewards are claimable every 7 days. However, if you reinvest 100% of your rewards, your next claim unlocks three days earlier.

How are BNB rewards generated?

Our Dynamic Reward Bot converts taxed tokens, NFT sales, and play-to-earn gaming revenues into BNB rewards. It optimizes conversion timing to maximize rewards while minimizing sell impact on the chart.

What does 'HODL' mean and why is it important?
‘HODL’ began as a misspelling of “hold” but evolved to mean "Hold On for Dear Life"—a mindset of staying strong through market ups and downs to maximize long-term gains.

What support options are available if I have questions or issues?

Need help? Join our Telegram community, check the FAQ section, or contact support.

How do NFTs and play-to-earn gaming contribute to the ecosystem?

NFT sales and play-to-earn gaming help grow the reward pool, boosting earnings for all $HODL holders.

Where can I track my rewards and monitor $HODL’s performance?

You can monitor your rewards and track $HODL’s performance via our dedicated dashboard, price charts on DEX Screener, and our official Telegram channel for real-time updates. A 5% transaction tax funds the reward pool, supplemented by earnings from NFT sales and play-to-earn gaming. Holders can claim rewards every 7 days.

FAQs

Discover HODL's Gaming Ecosystem and Unlock the Power of Play-to-Earn!

What is HODL Games?

HODL Games is an exciting platform offering a variety of Play-to-Earn games. Engage in strategic games like Gem Fighter, high-stakes minigames, and more, earning $HODL and NFTs as rewards.

What is Play-to-Earn?

Play-to-Earn is a gaming model that allows players to earn rewards, typically in the form of cryptocurrency or digital assets, by actively participating in a game. It flips the traditional gaming paradigm by allowing players to generate real-world value from their in-game activities.

How can I earn with HODL Games?

Earn by scoring high in our minigames and Gem Fighter. Climb the leaderboards to earn $HODL and NFTs.

How do leaderboards work?

Leaderboards rank players based on their scores in various games. High ranks mean more earnings in $HODL and NFTs.

How does energy work in the minigames?

Energy is the key to unlocking the full potential of our minigames. In the free-play version, you can earn energy that enables you to participate in higher-stakes games, where you have the chance to win $HODL and NFT rewards. Use energy to enter high-stakes minigames and maximize your earnings!

Can I buy energy?

Yes, energy can be purchased, earned through play, or received for holding HODL Hands® NFTs.

Are there restrictions for Play-to-Earn games?

No restrictions for free play. For higher rewards, spend energy. Gem Fighter is free-to-play; use Gem Fighter NFTs as an advantage to power up your spaceship.

How do I get HODL Hands® NFTs?

Purchase them on our site or earn them by staking Gem Fighter NFTs at HODLX.exchange. You can also swap $HODL tokens for HODL Hands® NFTs at discounted rates over at HODLX.exchange.

What makes HODL Games different from other Play-to-Earn platforms?

HODL Games integrates DeFi mechanics, BNB rewards, and NFT staking, creating a self-sustaining ecosystem where game revenue fuels buybacks and rewards for holders.

What rewards can I earn in HODL Games?

Players can earn $HODL tokens, NFTs, and leaderboard prizes. High scorers win the largest share, with rewards distributed based on performance.

How do Gem Fighter NFTs impact gameplay?

Gem Fighter NFTs enhance your ship’s attributes, providing an advantage in battles. They improve speed, firepower, and shields, helping players dominate leaderboards.

Do I need to hold $HODL to play the games?

No, anyone can play. However, holding HODL Hands® NFTs generates energy, allowing you to enter high-stakes minigames and maximize rewards.

How does Play-to-Earn benefit the community?

Players earn $HODL tokens through their gameplay in our minigames and Gem Fighter, with a significant portion of the game's NFT sales proceeds being used to support buybacks of $HODL. Specifically, 50% of the revenue from NFT sales is allocated to buybacks of $HODL, enhancing its value. Additionally, 12% of these proceeds are directed to the $HODL BNB reward pool, further incentivizing and rewarding $HODL token holders.

How is game revenue used?
50% of NFT sales go to $HODL buybacks, increasing scarcity and price support. 12% is allocated to the BNB reward pool, benefiting $HODL holders.

What are the terms and conditions for HODL Games?

To participate in HODL Games, players must be at least 18 years old. All purchases of energy and other in-game resources are final and non-refundable. In-game assets are tied to your specific account and cannot be transferred to other wallets or accounts. We are committed to maintaining a fair gaming environment; therefore, if we suspect a player of cheating, we reserve the right to remove their scores and block their account from further participation.

FAQs

Learn More About Gem Fighter

How Do I Start Playing Gem Fighter?

Start your Gem Fighter journey by clicking 'Play the Beta' on the Gem Fighter page to play directly in your browser for free! Compete to earn rewards by surviving as long as possible. To boost your chances, mint Gem Fighter NFTs and enter each level with power-ups.

WHAT IS PLAY-TO-EARN?

Play-to-Earn is a gaming model that allows players to earn rewards, typically in the form of cryptocurrency or digital assets, by actively participating in a game. It flips the traditional gaming paradigm by allowing players to generate real-world value from their in-game activities.

Is Gem Fighter Free to Play?

Yes! Gem Fighter is entirely free to play. Enhancing your gameplay with Gem Fighter NFTs is optional. All players have a chance to earn rewards by achieving high scores and ranking on the leaderboard.

Can I Play Without NFTs?

Absolutely! Enjoy Gem Fighter without NFTs. Using NFTs offers a strategic advantage by enhancing your spaceship's powers. In addition, Gem Fighter NFTs offer additional perks such as staking to earn various digital assets!

How Do I Earn In-Game Rewards?

Earn rewards by scoring high and climbing the leaderboards. The better your performance, the greater your rewards! Track your score and claim earnings anytime.

What Makes Each Game Level Unique?

Each level in Gem Fighter is procedurally generated, ensuring a new and unique challenge and environment with every playthrough.

What is procedural generation?

Procedural generation in Gem Fighter creates unique levels and enemies for each playthrough, ensuring a fresh, unpredictable gaming experience. This technology uses algorithms to dynamically generate game environments, enhancing replay value and challenge. It diverges from traditional static designs, offering an evolving, engaging adventure where no two sessions are alike. This approach keeps gameplay exciting, making every journey through Gem Fighter a distinct adventure that always feels new.

How Do I Use NFTs in the Game?

Socket Gem Fighter NFTs into your spaceship for enhanced attack, defense, or spell abilities, depending on the properties of each NFT. Simply connect your software wallet and pick which NFT to use for each power!

Where Do the Earnings Come From?

The earnings in Gem Fighter come from the proceeds of Gem Fighter NFT sales. 50% of these proceeds go towards buying $HODL, which is distributed as player rewards. Additionally, 12% of proceeds contribute to the $HODL BNB reward pool, claimable by $HODL token holders.

What Are the Benefits of Ranking High on the Leaderboard?

Achieving high rankings on the Gem Fighter leaderboard brings bragging rights and rewards in $HODL. 50% of NFT sale proceeds are used for buying back these tokens for player rewards.

Is There a Community or Support Forum for Players?

Yes, join our active community on Telegram and Discord for tips, sharing experiences, and connecting with fellow players! Click the community tab on the HODL website to find those or the links in the footer.

Are Updates and New Features Planned?

Certainly! We aim to release a new level every month. With each release, leaderboards reset, giving everyone a fresh chance to play Gem Fighter and earn rewards.

FAQs

Find answers to common questions about HODL Hands® NFTs, staking, and earning.

What are HODL Hands® NFTs?

HODL Hands® NFTs are a collection of 10,000 unique digital assets on Binance Smart Chain (BSC). They offer multiple ways to earn, including staking and play-to-earn gaming.

What is the utility of HODL Hands® NFTs?

HODL Hands® NFTs generate energy, which allows you to enter and win $HODL in our play-to-earn minigames. You can also stake them via our DeFi Hub to earn Gem Fighter NFTs, which enhance your spaceship in Gem Fighter and boost your rewards. Additional utility is in development, including integration into our Texas HODL poker game.

How do I earn energy with HODL Hands® NFTs?

Holding HODL Hands® NFTs automatically generates energy over time. This energy is required to enter high-stakes minigames, where you can compete for $HODL rewards.

How do I buy HODL Hands® NFTs?

You can buy HODL Hands® NFTs with BNB (BEP-20). Simply click ‘Buy with 0.2 BNB’, select between 1 and 20 NFTs per purchase, and receive randomly selected NFTs from the collection—giving you a chance at a rare one.

What network are they on?

HODL Hands® NFTs are minted on the Binance Smart Chain (BSC).

What is the contract address?
0x7E82123bCb6465133D6E9E1Ad94d0115DE041b3D

Where can I view my NFTs?

Once purchased, HODL Hands® NFTs appear in your wallet (except on MetaMask desktop, which requires manual addition). To view them, go to your wallet's assets/NFT tab.

Why does my BSC NFT show as ETH/ERC-721?

Binance Smart Chain (BSC) follows the Ethereum NFT standard, ERC-721, which is why some wallets may label it as an Ethereum-based NFT.

Can I trade or sell my HODL Hands® NFTs?

Yes! You can list and sell your HODL Hands® NFTs on Binance Smart Chain-compatible NFT marketplaces.

How do I stake HODL Hands® NFTs?

You can stake your HODL Hands® NFTs on our DeFi Hub to earn Gem Fighter NFTs, which enhance gameplay and boost earnings in Gem Fighter.

FAQs

Learn More About Gem Fighter NFTs.

How Can I Buy Gem Fighter NFTs?

Buy Gem Fighter NFTs with ease using BNB (Bep20) on the Gem Fighter NFTs page. Select how many you want to buy, and you'll receive NFTs randomly from our unique collection of 50,000 pieces, with a chance to grab a rare one!

Which Network Are The NFTs On?

Gem Fighter NFTs are minted on the Binance Smart Chain (BSC).

What is the Contract Address?
0x1DC59c50d21514895A88D10F17Af8fB1017E6A37 - Binance Smart Chain (BSC).

Collection Size?

Our collection features an impressive 50,000 unique NFTs.

What Utility Do These NFTs Offer?

Gem Fighter NFTs are more than just collectibles! Utilize them in the Gem Fighter game to enhance your spaceship's attack, defense, and spells. Boosting your ship can help you climb the leaderboards and increase your earnings. Additionally, stake your NFTs on our DeFi Hub to earn HODL Hands® NFTs.

Where Can I View The NFTs?

After purchasing with BNB, NFTs appear in your wallet (Note: MetaMask users need to add NFTs manually). To view them, navigate to the assets/NFT tab in your wallet. You can also view in 3D the gemstone from your NFT by connecting your wallet to our dedicated viewer. Simply click the button on this page called '3D viewer' or in the NFT menu under '3D gemstone viewer'.

Why Does My BSC NFT Show as ETH/ERC-721?

Binance Smart Chain (BSC) operates similarly to Ethereum, and NFTs on BSC use the ERC-721 token standard, just like on Ethereum.

HODL App: Your Gateway to Earnings, Insights & Play

Maximise your crypto investments and unlock the full potential of HODL's earning ecosystem with the HODL app. Whether you're a seasoned crypto enthusiast or just starting your journey, our user-friendly app is designed to empower you with the tools and insights you need to succeed.

A New Era of Earning
1. Reward Income Simplified

With the HODL App, earning BNB reward income has never been easier. Simply hold $HODL tokens in your wallet, and claim BNB rewards every 7-days. Our app streamlines the process, allowing you to effortlessly claim BNB rewards and make re-investments into tax-free $HODL.
2. Seamless Buying Experience

New to crypto? No problem. The HODL App provides a straightforward way to buy $HODL tokens. We guide you through the process of purchasing BNB, which you can then easily swap for $HODL within the app. Say goodbye to complicated exchanges and hello to hassle-free buying.
3. Wallet Management Made Simple

Manage your crypto wallets with ease. The HODL App enables you to create new wallets or import existing ones, giving you full control over your crypto assets. Toggle between different wallets effortlessly, ensuring you stay organized and informed.
4. Detailed Transaction History

Keep track of your past activities with our comprehensive transaction history feature. View a detailed record of your buys, sells, and swaps, and click a transaction to view the full detauls on the blockchain using BscScan.
5. Access to the Entire HODL Ecosystem

The HODL App serves as your gateway to the entire HODL ecosystem. Explore our website directly from the app, access additional features, information, and resources, and stay updated with the latest developments.
6. Pro Mode for Advanced Users

For those seeking advanced functionalities and deeper insights, our Pro Mode is the perfect choice. Unlock a range of exclusive features, including staking, HODL Hands NFTs, play-to-earn gaming, and more detailed insights into your $HODL investment.
7. World-Class Security

Your recovery phrase, private key, and any addresses you add to your address book are stored with the utmost security on your device. We employ advanced encryption techniques, including obfuscation, sharding, and local-only storage, to ensure your sensitive information remains highly protected. Rest assured, any data you input into the app is never viewed or accessible to anyone else.

Your Journey Starts Here

Whether you're looking to start your crypto journey or enhance your existing one, the HODL App is designed to be your trusted companion. Our commitment to security ensures that your sensitive information is safeguarded, and our community support is just a click away if you ever need assistance.

Join us today and experience the future of crypto earnings with the HODL App. Get ready to HODL like never before!

Join our communities

What is the HODL App?

The HODL App is a user-friendly mobile application that provides access to the HODL ecosystem. It simplifies the process of earning reward income with $HODL, offers an easy way to buy, sell, and swap, and provides essential tools for wallet management, including BNB reward claim reminders.

How can I earn reward income with the HODL App?

Earning reward income with the HODL App is as simple as holding $HODL in your wallet. These tokens generate BNB rewards over time, which can be claimed every 7 days as BNB or more tax-free $HODL. You can track your rewards within the app.

How do I buy $HODL tokens using the HODL App?

To buy $HODL, you'll first need to purchase BNB (Binance Coin) using the app and then convert that to $HODL tokens. The HODL App will guide you through this process, making it easy for both beginners and experienced users.

Is the HODL App suitable for beginners?

Yes, the HODL App is designed to be user-friendly, making it accessible to beginners. We provide step-by-step guidance for buying and managing tokens, ensuring a smooth experience for all users. By default, the app starts in Lite mode and can be toggled to and from PRO mode at any time via the settings menu.

Can I manage multiple crypto wallets with the HODL App?

Absolutely. The HODL App allows you to create new wallets or import existing ones. You can easily switch between different wallets within the app, making it convenient to manage your HODL assets.

How can I track my transaction history?

You can access your transaction history within the HODL App. This feature provides a detailed record of your past transactions, including buys, sells, and swaps. You can also click each transaction to view it in more detail on BscScan.

What is Pro Mode in the HODL App?

Pro Mode is an advanced version of the HODL App designed for users seeking additional features and insights. It includes access to the $HODL Dashboard, which provides detailed analytics about your investment, and the DeFi Hub, which offers even more earning opportunities.

Is my information secure in the HODL App?

Yes, we prioritize the security of your sensitive information. Your recovery phrase, private key, and any addresses you add to your address book are securely stored in an encrypted format on your device, utilizing advanced encryption techniques. They are not accessible to anyone else.

How can I get support if I have questions or issues?

You can access our community support through the HODL App. Click the 'Support Chat' link in the menu to connect with our support team.

Can I delete my app data if needed?

Yes, if you ever need to delete all app data, including the private key and recovery phrase stored locally on your device, you can find the option under "Settings" in the main app menu.

Developing for the App Store

App Store

The apps you love.

From a place you can trust.

For over a decade, the App Store has proved to be a safe and trusted place to discover and download apps. But the App Store is more than just a storefront — it’s an innova­tive destination focused on bringing you amazing experiences. And a big part of those experiences is ensuring that the apps we offer are held to the highest standards for privacy, security and content. Because we offer nearly 2 million apps — and we want you to feel good about using every single one of them.

Designed for discovery.

Stories and collections that inform, help and inspire. Updated daily.

Stories and collections that inform, help and inspire. Updated daily.

Original stories by our editorial team bring you everything from exclusive world premieres to behind-the-scenes interviews. Tap the Today tab and read about influential developers and game creators, learn a few tips and tricks, or see how apps are changing how people work, play and live.

Curated by experts. Handpicked for you.

App product pages give you the information you need when deciding what to download. From more videos to rankings and reviews, there are loads of ways to help you pick the app that’s right for you.

Privacy and security.

Built into everything we do.

Security for
every app.

At every
level.

Security for every app.

At every level.

We ensure that apps come from known sources, are free of known malware, and haven’t been tampered with at the time of installation or launch.
100% of apps are automatically screened for known malware.

Over 16K apps use Apple health technologies like HealthKit, CareKit and ResearchKit designed to protect patient privacy.

You choose what data to share. And with whom.

You choose what data to share. And with whom.

Each app is required to ask for your permission so you can choose what data to share. The first time a third‑party app wants to access your information — like your location, contacts, calendars or photos — you receive an alert. Even if you grant access once, you can revoke it later. We also ensure that apps are denied access to certain sensitive data on your device, are unable to modify your device or OS, and are prohibited from obtaining complete access to your data.

Over 215K submissions rejected last year for violating privacy guidelines.

Apps can’t pull your data from other apps.

Apps can’t pull your data from other apps.

System-level protections prevent an app from accessing data from other apps without your explicit permission.

Dedicated to trust and safety.

Apps must adhere to our guidelines.

Apps must adhere to our guidelines.

When you download an app, it should work as promised. Which is why human App Reviewers ensure that the apps on the App Store adhere to our strict app review standards. Our App Store Review Guidelines require apps to be safe, provide a good user experience, comply with our privacy rules, secure devices from malware and threats, and use approved business models.

Learn more about the App Store Review

Guidelines

Every week, over 500 dedicated experts around the world review over 100K apps.

Over 1M submissions rejected for objectionable, harmful, unsafe or illegal content.

You should never have to worry about inappropriate content.

You should never
have to worry about inappropriate content.

We strongly support all points of view being represented on the App Store. But we also take steps to make sure apps are respectful to users with differing opinions, and we reject apps with any content or behaviour that we believe is over the line — especially when it puts children at risk. Every app has an assigned age rating, so parents can determine what is appropriate for their children.

No surprise purchases.

No surprise purchases.

Apps must follow an approved business model and clearly show you the price, tell you what you get with your purchase and explain subscription-renewal terms up front. Apple sends a receipt each time you use our in‑app purchase feature, and you can also view those purchases and subscriptions in your account. So you won’t get bills out of the blue.

Every day, moderators review worldwide App Store charts for quality and accuracy.

In 2020, we removed over 80M user reviews that were considered spam.

We have removed over 2.3M apps because they haven’t been updated or don’t work on our latest OS releases.

Hardware and software. Powering amazing experiences together by design.

Apps help unlock the full potential of your Apple devices.

Apps help unlock the full potential of your Apple devices.

Apple products use industry-leading technology to bring apps to life — so you can experience more of the amazing things your devices are capable of. Thanks to hardware and software designed to work together, you get more out of your apps — from things you take for granted, like super‑smooth scrolling, to seeing how a new sofa might look in your living room before you buy it.

We help app developers take advantage of our latest hardware technologies.

We help app developers take advantage of our latest hardware technologies.

We give developers the tools and support to build cutting‑edge technologies into their apps straightaway — which means they’re yours to enjoy straightaway. Like when an app uses Face ID or Touch ID for secure access — while keeping the underlying authentication data from your face or fingerprint private. Or when a game controller syncs up easily with a new game on your iPhone. And with our innovations in augmented reality and machine learning, you’ll be seeing even more amazing features in the years to come.

Download with confidence.

Make any app yours. Instantly.

Make any app yours. Instantly.

Our world‑class distribution platforms reach over 1.5 billion devices worldwide, allowing users to buy and download apps without lags. When you download a universal app on one device, it automatically appears on your other devices. And if you upgrade to a new device, your apps go with you — no need to re-download as long as your apps stay up to date.

Over 900K apps have secure payment technologies like Apple Pay and StoreKit for goods and services.

Purchase safely and securely.

Purchase safely and securely.

App Store purchases are safe and simple, so you can start playing, gaming, reading — or just doing — straightaway. Create a secure account with your preferred payment method on file and it’s easily accessible across your devices and the web. Your account is protected by two‑factor authentication, ensuring that the only person who can access your account is you — even if someone else knows your password. And more than 250,000 apps tap into the advanced technologies of Touch ID and Face ID built into your devices, giving you an additional layer of security.
