HODL APP: LITE MODE USER GUIDE

Available in Apple and Android stores, the HODL app is your gateway to managing and maximizing your $HODL and BNB rewards. This user guide will walk you through the key features and functionalities of the app, helping you navigate and make the most of your experience. Let's get started!
1. Wallet Overview

The wallet overview screen provides a snapshot of your $HODL investment and important information:

Access it by selecting the 'Wallet' option from the menu at the bottom of the app.

View your $HODL token balance and other relevant details.

Track your next reward claim amount, monthly reward forecast, annual reward forecast, collected BNB rewards, and more.
2. Buy and Sell $HODL or BNB

To buy, sell, or swap tokens, go to the 'Trade' menu in the app's footer and select 'Swap':

Select the tokens you wish to trade and enter the desired amount.

Review and confirm the transaction details, then proceed to complete the trade.

Options include selling BNB or $HODL, buying BNB with cash, or swapping BNB for more $HODL.
3. Wallet Management

Manage your wallets easily within the app:

Access the 'Wallet' section from the menu at the bottom of the app.

Add new wallets by creating a new one or adding an existing wallet.

Toggle between different wallets using the options available in the heading at the top of the app or in the main menu.

View total $HODL and reward earnings forecasts in the 'My Wallets' section.
4. Transaction History

Access your transaction history to monitor your past activities:

Go to the 'Transactions' section within the app's main menu.

View a detailed record of your past transactions, including buys, sells, and transfers.

Click any transaction you want to view and see the full details on the blockchain with BscScan.
5. HODL Website Access

Access the full HODL website from within the app:

Click the 'Website' tab at the bottom of the app.

Explore additional features, information, and resources available on the website.
6. Additional Features

Customize your app experience in the settings found in the main menu:

Adjust language, display currency, and payment currency to your preference.

Activate pro mode to access more tools, including the $HODL dashboard and the DeFi Hub with additional ways to earn.

Rest assured, the HODL app prioritizes the security of your sensitive information. Your recovery phrase, private key, and any addresses you add to your address book will be securely stored in an encrypted format on your device, utilizing advanced encryption techniques such as Keychain, RNSInfo, Ethereum Keystore v3, and obfuscation methods. They are not accessible to anyone else.

You can always join the HODL community through the links in the app menu. Use the 'Chat Support' feature to speak to the team and report any bugs (keep safe - the team at HODL will never DM you first, ask you to click links, or request key information such as your private keys). In case you need to delete all app data, you can find the option under 'Settings' in the main app menu. This will remove all user data, including the private key and recovery phrase stored locally on your device in an encrypted format.

Enjoy using the HODL app and make the most of your crypto journey!

HODL APP: PRO MODE USER GUIDE

The HODL App Pro Mode offers an enhanced experience designed exclusively for our more experienced users. Explore the additional features and benefits available to Pro Mode users with this user guide.
1. Wallet Page in Pro Mode

When you activate Pro Mode, the 'Wallet' page provides detailed information, statistics, and insights into your $HODL investment:

Gain valuable insights into your equity in $HODL, representing the percentage of the investor-held tokens you own, which is also the amount you can claim from the BNB reward pool.

Discover your HODL ranking, showcasing your position among all investors based on your token holdings.

Unlock your unique HODL rank, represented by a special sea creature, reflecting your investment level.

Track the number of $HODL tokens you've claimed as rewards, giving you a clear overview of your earnings.

View your NFT holdings - even if your NFTs are staked.
2. HODLX DeFi Hub

Pro Mode unlocks access to the DeFi Hub, an all-in-one platform for decentralized staking:

Find the DeFi Hub in the Pro mode app menu.

Take advantage of various features within the DeFi Hub, including staking, and discounted token to NFT swaps.
3. Play-to-Earn Gaming – Have Fun While Earning

Access HODL's play-to-earn games:

Crypto Slash

Gem Miner

Coin Catcher

Moonshot

Solitaire

All this can be accessed via the pro mode menu, offering an exciting opportunity to have fun while earning rewards within the HODL ecosystem. Enjoy the enhanced functionality and take your HODL experience to new heights!

To activate Pro Mode, simply access the app menu and follow the steps to unlock the additional benefits. Enjoy the enhanced functionality and take your HODL experience to new heights!

Rest assured, the HODL app prioritizes the security of your sensitive information. Your recovery phrase, private key, and any addresses you add to your address book will be securely stored in an encrypted format on your device, utilizing advanced encryption techniques such as Keychain, RNSInfo, Ethereum Keystore v3, and obfuscation methods. They are not accessible to anyone else.

Should you have any further questions or need assistance, don't hesitate to reach out to our support team by selecting 'Support Chat' in the app's main menu.

Happy investing, and welcome to HODL Pro Mode!

HODL's Official Charity

Turning Crypto Rewards into Real-World Impact

The HODL Charity Fund is powered by our community and fueled by the concept of HODL Forward—the idea that we can pay forward some of our rewards to help those in need around the world. By holding $HODL, the fund continuously generates BNB rewards, which are then donated to causes chosen by our holders.

Every month, the community suggests and votes on charities to support, ensuring that contributions go where they matter most. Together, we’re proving that crypto can be a force for real-world good—turning decentralized rewards into food, shelter, healthcare, and education for those who need it most.
100% of contributions go toward growing the fund, increasing the BNB rewards available for charity. Want to take part? Simply send BNB (BEP-20) or $HODL to the address below and help us amplify the impact—one reward at a time.

About HODL

HODL is a complete and decentralized reward earnings ecosystem making it easy for anyone to generate income by investing in cryptocurrency. The ecosystem includes Binance Smart Chain’s highest-paying reward token, $HODL, along with HODL Hands® NFTs, Gem Fighter NFTs, and Play-to-Earn gaming. For more information, visit the About HODL page under the Key Info tab.

What does 'HODL' mean?
‘HODL’ is crypto's most used word and became a famous meme based on a misspelling of the word hold. The word is now used in all corners of cryptocurrency and even in trading, representing an investment philosophy – to ‘Hold On for Dear Life’. HODLING is now seen as one of the most effective investor strategies – hold on through the ups and downs and over time you will gain the most benefit.

Roadmap

HODL’s vision is to improve the quality of life for its holders by generating strong reward income, accessible to anyone, anywhere. The roadmap focuses on sustainability and growing HODL into a multi-billion-dollar organization. Visit the Roadmap page in the Key Info menu for a breakdown of completed milestones and future plans.

Whitepaper

The HODL whitepaper provides a full technical overview of the project, detailing how rewards are earned and how the ecosystem protects investors. The HODL ecosystem is built on Binance Smart Chain, with $HODL, HODL Hands® NFTs, Gem Fighter NFTs, and Play-to-Earn gaming driving sustainable earnings. The full whitepaper is available under the Key Info menu.

Achievements
$HODL was founded in May 2021 and has become the highest-paying BNB reward token in history. Since launch, HODL has built an entire ecosystem to reward and inform its community. See more on the Achievements page under Key Info.

Team

HODL is led by CEO Adam Roberts along with a highly committed and experienced team. Adam has 18 years of experience in tech startups. The team is doxxed, and you can meet them via the official Telegram. More details are available under Team in the Key Info section.

KYC

HODL CEO Adam Roberts has completed Know Your Customer verification with Cyberscope. The KYC report can be found under Key Info.

Are there risks investing into $HODL?

At HODL, we are committed to transparency and want to ensure that our users have a clear understanding of the risks associated with cryptocurrency investments. Please take a moment to familiarize yourself with the following risk disclosures. Market Volatility: Cryptocurrency markets are highly volatile, and prices can fluctuate significantly in a short period. While this volatility presents opportunities for profit, it also carries the risk of substantial losses. Regulatory Risks: Cryptocurrency regulations vary by country and are subject to change. Changes in regulations can impact the legality and accessibility of cryptocurrency investments. Security Risks: Protecting your cryptocurrency holdings is crucial. Be aware of phishing attempts, scams, and the importance of keeping your private keys and recovery phrases secure. Lack of Consumer Protections: Unlike traditional financial systems, cryptocurrencies often lack consumer protections and insurance. If you lose access to your wallet or your assets are stolen, recovery may be challenging. Technology Risks: Cryptocurrencies rely on blockchain technology, which is still evolving. Technical issues, software bugs, or vulnerabilities could affect your holdings. Investment Knowledge: It's essential to have a good understanding of the cryptocurrencies you invest in. Lack of knowledge can lead to poor investment decisions. Diversification: Diversifying your investments across different assets can help manage risk. Overinvesting in a single cryptocurrency can expose you to higher risks. Timing and Speculation: Cryptocurrency markets are influenced by speculation, and timing your investments can be challenging. Avoid making investment decisions solely based on hype or speculation. Tax Implications: Cryptocurrency transactions may have tax implications in your jurisdiction. Consult with a tax professional to ensure compliance with tax laws. Long-Term Considerations: Cryptocurrency investments should be viewed as a long-term strategy. Short-term price fluctuations are common, but focusing on the long-term potential is often more prudent. Please note that this list of risks is not exhaustive, and there may be additional factors to consider when investing in cryptocurrencies. It's important to conduct thorough research and seek financial advice if needed before making investment decisions. Remember that cryptocurrency investments carry inherent risks, and you should only invest what you can afford to lose. Your decision to invest in cryptocurrencies should align with your financial goals and risk tolerance.

About $HODL
$HODL is a secure and stable way to generate reward income. Simply hold $HODL tokens to earn BNB rewards.

What makes $HODL different from other reward tokens?
$HODL is the highest-paying BNB reward token, with over 20,000 BNB claimed by holders. Unlike other reward tokens that rely solely on trading volume, HODL has built an entire ecosystem, including NFTs and Play-to-Earn games, to sustain and grow rewards long-term.

How does HODL generate revenue outside of taxes?

Revenue comes from multiple streams, including NFT sales and Play-to-Earn gaming. These funds help grow the reward pool beyond the 5% trading taxes.

Is the $HODL contract upgradeable?

Yes, the $HODL contract is upgradeable, allowing for future improvements without requiring new migrations. This ensures long-term sustainability, the creation of new innovations, gas fee optimization, and security updates as needed.
$HODL Rewards

BNB rewards are distributed every seven days. The reward pool is funded by a 5% tax on all buys, sells, and transfers, as well as revenue from HODL Hands® NFTs and Play-to-Earn gaming. Over 20,000 BNB has been paid to holders, making $HODL the highest-paying BNB reward token in history. Each holder's share of the reward pool is based on their percentage of all investor-held tokens.

What happens to unclaimed rewards?

Unclaimed rewards remain in the pool until they are collected. There is no expiration, but claiming on time every 7 days maximizes yearly earnings.

Is there a limit to how much rewards I can claim?

No, your claim is based on your percentage of investor-held tokens. The more you own, the larger your claim.

How do I manually add $HODL to my wallet?

You can add $HODL to MetaMask, Trust Wallet, and any software wallet using the contract address 0x32B407ee915432Be6D3F168bc1EfF2a6F8b2034C.

What gaming does HODL offer?

HODL offers an exciting Play-to-Earn ecosystem where skill and strategy turn into rewards. Players can earn $HODL by ranking on the leaderboards of each game.

What is Gem Fighter?

Gem Fighter is a side-scrolling space shooter where players battle waves of enemies, upgrade ships with gemstone NFTs, and earn $HODL. Players compete on leaderboards, collect power-ups, and stake NFTs when not playing to generate more rewards.

What minigames does HODL offer?

HODL offers multiple Play-to-Earn minigames, including Solitaire, the classic card game reimagined with P2E mechanics, Crypto Slash, a reaction-based game where players slice digital coins while avoiding bombs, Gem Miner, a match-three puzzle adventure, Coin Catcher, where players grab falling coins, and Moonshot, a space navigation game where players steer their ship while avoiding obstacles. All games contribute to the reward pool and $HODL token buybacks.

What are HODL Hands® NFTs?

HODL Hands® NFTs are ten thousand unique collectibles that provide extra benefits within the HODL ecosystem. Over four thousand have already been minted, generating over five hundred thousand dollars for the reward pool, marketing, and ecosystem development.

HODL Hands® NFTs Utility

HODL Hands® NFTs can be staked to earn Gem Fighter NFTs, harvest energy to enter Play-to-Earn games to win $HODL, and will soon provide exclusive perks in the upcoming Texas HODL Poker.

What are Gem Fighter NFTs

Gem Fighter NFTs power the game, providing unique ship upgrades such as weapons, shields, and energy boosts. These NFTs can be staked for rewards when not in use.

How do I buy Gem Fighter NFTs

Gem Fighter NFTs can be purchased with BNB on the Gem Fighter NFTs page. Prices vary, and each NFT is randomly assigned from a collection of fifty thousand unique pieces.

How do Gem Fighter NFTs affect gameplay

NFTs provide key enhancements to your spaceship, improving attack, defense, and energy regeneration. The stronger your ship, the better you perform in battles, increasing your earning potential.

Can I sell or trade my Gem Fighter NFTs

Yes. Gem Fighter NFTs can be traded on secondary marketplaces, giving players the ability to buy, sell, and upgrade their assets.

What is Staking?

Staking allows investors to lock up assets in exchange for rewards. HODL provides NFT staking where users can stake HODL Hands® NFTs or Gem Fighter NFTs and vice versa to earn rewards over time.

How long do I need to stake my NFTs for?

There is no lock-up period. You can stake and unstake your NFTs at any time.

Are there risks in staking?

Unlike traditional staking, NFT staking carries no risk of impermanent loss. Your NFTs remain yours and can be withdrawn at any time.

What is the HODL App?

The HODL App is a user-friendly mobile application that provides access to the HODL ecosystem. It simplifies earning reward income with $HODL, offers an easy way to buy, sell, and swap tokens, and includes tools for wallet management and BNB reward tracking.

Where can I Join the HODL Community?

HODL has an active community on Telegram, Discord, X, YouTube, Bluesky, Reddit, and more. Join us on Telegram to chat with the team and other investors.

Is there any community Guidelines?

By joining and of our communities, you adhere to our community guidelines. You can view them under ‘Guidelines' in the 'Community' menu.

What is the HODL Dashboard?

The HODL Dashboard is an advanced investor tool that provides analytics on holdings, earnings, project wallets, and claim BNB reward claims history. It helps investors track their $HODL performance.

Is HODL Secure?

HODL continually monitors and fixes bugs and exploits within the ecosystem. A bug bounty program is in place to reward developers who identify vulnerabilities. $HODL liquidity is locked with Unicrypt for over two hundred fifty years, and all project wallets are secured using air-gapped hardware wallets stored in vaults.

Is HODL compliant?

HODL takes the law and compliance seriously and works hard to operate in this area to a higher standard than the vast majority of DeFi projects. HODLVERSE Inc is a registered company and has already implemented several measures in relation to compliance, including blacklisting IP addresses from OFAC’s list of banned countries. HODL is also working to implement live anti-money laundering checks on addresses and blocks on access to services for blacklisted addresses, and warnings for users accessing services from territories such as the United States.

Does HODL support charity initiatives?

HODL Forward is HODL’s charity initiative, dedicated to providing essential aid, food, and education through the power of BNB reward income. Each month the community votes on the causes to support.

OUR STRATEGIC PARTNERSHIPS

Eljaboom: Industry Leader & Web3 Pioneer

HODL has partnered with Eljaboom, a globally recognized crypto investor, advisor, and Web3 strategist. As a Forbes 40 Under 40 honoree and Guinness World Record holder in AI & Robotics, Eljaboom has been a driving force in blockchain innovation, investing in and advising leading projects across the space. His mission focuses on bridging Web2 and Web3 to create a seamless, global crypto ecosystem. With over 1.35M+ followers across social platforms and a reputation for identifying high-potential projects, Eljaboom’s expertise brings immense value to HODL’s growth and visibility. His deep industry connections and strategic insight further solidify HODL’s position as a top-tier DeFi project.

Visit website

Smart Contract Security with Cyberscope

HODL has partnered with Cyberscope, a leading blockchain security firm, to ensure the highest standards of smart contract security and reliability. Over a period of months, Cyberscope conducted an in-depth audit of the $HODL contract, providing expert guidance and rigorous testing to optimize security, efficiency, and transparency. As one of the few auditors recognized by CoinMarketCap, Cyberscope’s audit strengthens HODL’s credibility, reinforcing investor confidence and boosting our CMC ranking. This partnership reflects HODL’s commitment to DeFi security and long-term sustainability.

Visit website

Seamless Fiat On-Ramping with Flooz

HODL has partnered with Flooz to make buying $HODL easier than ever. Purchase $HODL using a debit/credit card or bank transfer with fast, low-cost transactions.

Why use Flooz? Instant fiat-to-crypto purchases with no complicated setups. Supports multiple payment methods, including cards and bank transfers. Provides a secure and user-friendly experience.

Buy and hold $HODL directly in your software wallet and start earning BNB rewards every 7 days.

Visit website

Strengthening Security with RugFreeCoins

HODL has partnered with RugFreeCoins, a trusted token listing platform and smart contract auditor, to enhance security, transparency, and investor confidence. Their independent audit of the $HODL contract ensures optimized security and long-term reliability. This partnership reinforces our commitment to investor protection and industry-leading standards.

Visit website

Entering the Metaverse with LakeView Meta

HODL has partnered with LakeView Meta to explore metaverse-based innovations and expand its presence in virtual worlds. This collaboration includes shared promotions, interactive events, and immersive experiences, such as treasure hunts featuring $HODL rewards within the metaverse.

Visit website

Expanding Visibility with Coinvote

Coinvote is a leading cryptocurrency aggregator that highlights early-stage projects and connects users with airdrops, contests, and investment opportunities. Through this partnership, HODL gains increased exposure, engaging directly with Coinvote’s audience across their platform and social media channels.

Visit website

Mobula: Decentralized Data & Innovation

Mobula is a decentralized crypto data aggregator providing on-chain data processing and profit redistribution to users. Through this partnership, HODL utilizes Mobula’s advanced charting, project visibility tools, and innovative reward systems to enhance the ecosystem.

Visit website

Partner Listing on LaunchBar
$HODL is now listed on LaunchBar, a ranking and voting platform for cryptocurrency projects. LaunchBar provides key market insights, including token prices, market cap, and liquidity data, while highlighting trending pre-sale and fair launch tokens. This listing strengthens $HODL’s presence in the crypto community.

Visit website

Trusted Partnership with CryptoGuGu

As the ultimate meme word, HODL partners with CryptoGuGu-listed assets to enhance security and reliability. This partnership builds trust within the crypto space and strengthens the ecosystem for all stakeholders.

Where it all began

I AM HODLING

I type d that tyitle twice because I knew it was wrong the first time. Still wrong. w/e. GF's out at a lesbian bar, BTC crashing WHY AM I HOLDING? I'LL TELL YOU WHY. It's because I'm a bad trader and I KNOW I'M A BAD TRADER. Yeah you good traders can spot the highs and the lows pit pat piffy wing wong wang just like that and make a millino bucks sure no problem bro. Likewise the weak hands are like OH NO IT'S GOING DOWN I'M GONNA SELL he he he and then they're like OH GOD MY ASSHOLE when the SMART traders who KNOW WHAT THE FUCK THEY'RE DOING buy back in but you know what? I'm not part of that group. When the traders buy back in I'm already part of the market capital so GUESS WHO YOU'RE CHEATING day traders NOT ME~! Those taunt threads saying "OHH YOU SHOULD HAVE SOLD" YEAH NO SHIT. NO SHIT I SHOULD HAVE SOLD. I SHOULD HAVE SOLD MOMENTS BEFORE EVERY SELL AND BOUGHT MOMENTS BEFORE EVERY BUY BUT YOU KNOW WHAT NOT EVERYBODY IS AS COOL AS YOU. You only sell in a bear market if you are a good day trader or an illusioned noob. The people inbetween hold. In a zero-sum game such as this, traders can only take your money if you sell.
so i've had some whiskey
actually on the bottle it's spelled whisky
w/e
sue me
(but only if it's payable in BTC)
- GameKyuubi, December 18, 2013

FAQs

Don't see the answer to your question below? Reach out to us on Telegram anytime.

What are the benefits of these coins?

The coins are a true part of HODL's history and there will only ever be one 'first-edition' set, which is also limited in supply. On top of that, you will receive tax-free $HODL:

Gold coins – For a $10k investment, you will receive $10,500 of $HODL after tax.  If you were to purchase this amount via PancakeSwap you'd receive $9k of $HODL after the 10% tax meaning that you get the free gold coin and $1,500 more of $HODL!

Silver coins – For a $5k investment, you will receive $5,250 of $HODL after tax.  If you were to purchase this amount via PancakeSwap you'd receive $4.5k of $HODL after the 10% tax meaning that you get the free silver coin and $750 more of $HODL!

Bronze coins – For a $2k investment, you will receive $2,100 of $HODL after tax.  If you were to purchase this amount via PancakeSwap you'd receive $1,800 of $HODL after the 10% tax meaning that you get the free bronze coin and $300 more of $HODL!

How do I buy a coin?

You have 3 coin options - gold, silver and bronze. Once you've decided which coin to buy, simply click the 'Buy coin' button next to the coin you want to buy and complete the order form (please read the instructions and carefully complete the information). You will need to send payment to the wallet in the form in BNB (must be BEP-20).

When will I get my $HODL?

Once you have completed the order (by completing the 'buy coin' form on the coin you wish to purchase) and we have received your payment (BNB Bep-20), we will send the tokens within 1-2 working days to the wallet from which payment was sent.

When will I receive my coin?

All coins will be sent out in January 2022.

Bug Bounty

Security made Paramount

The HODL Bug Bounty

We reward those who identify bugs and security issues on our platforms.

Project Summary

HODL is a community-driven DeFi project built on the Binance Smart Chain (BSC). HODL is revolutionary and constantly innovating to drive more rewards and value to all holders. It was the first project to reward its holders with BNB just for holding and has set the record for the biggest payout of all time.

At the heart of HODL is a highly innovative smart contract that captures tax revenues from buys, sells, and transfers of the token. Our sell bot liquifies these tokens converting them into BNB and then places the funds into the reward pool. By holding HODL you can collect your share of the reward pool every 7 days.

Scope
*
hodltoken.net
*
hodlx.exchange
hodltoken.net/claim
nft.hodltoken.net

Focus Area

In-Scope Vulnerabilities

Business logic issues that can cause a loss of liquidity and/or user funds/assets

Vulnerabilities related to the Smart Contract which allows access to and the transfer of liquidity and/or user funds/assets

Payment’s manipulation

Remote code execution (RCE)

Leakage of sensitive information

OWASP Top issues such as XSS, CSRF, SQLi, SSRF, IDOR, etc.

Other vulnerabilities with a clear potential to harm the project, steal funds, or loss in general

Out of Scope

Theoretical vulnerabilities without actual proof of exploitation (proof of concept)

Clickjacking/UI redressing with minimal security impact

Invalid or missing SPF (Sender Policy Framework) records (incomplete or missing SPF/DKIM/DMARC)

Vulnerabilities in third-party applications & services

Social engineering, phishing, physical, or other fraud activities

Any activity (like DoS/DDoS) that disrupts our services

Email or mobile number enumeration

Information disclosure with minimal security impact (E.g., stack traces, path disclosure, directory listings, logs)

Internally known issues, duplicate issues, or issues that have already been made public

Best practices concerns

Tab-nabbing

Phishing attack

Self-XSS that cannot be used to exploit other users

Content spoofing

Use of known vulnerable libraries without actual proof of concept

Exposure of internal IP addresses or domains

Vulnerabilities affecting users of outdated browsers or platforms

Missing security headers that do not lead to direct exploitation

Host header issues without proof-of-concept demonstrating the vulnerability

CSRF with negligible security impact (E.g., adding to favorites, adding to cart, subscribing to a non-critical feature)

Issues that have no security impact (E.g., Failure to load a web page)

Assets that do not belong to HODL

Reports from automated tools or scans

Links to invalid/expired pages (Only valid if you can demonstrate an actual takeover)

Recently (less than 30 days) disclosed 0-day vulnerabilities (Reports allowed but no bounty gets paid)

Program Rules

Avoid using web application scanners for automatic vulnerability searching which generates massive traffic

Make every effort not to damage or restrict the availability of products, services, or infrastructure

Don’t access or modify other user data, localize all tests to your accounts

Perform testing only within the scope

Don’t exploit any DoS/DDoS vulnerabilities, social engineering attacks, or spam

Don’t spam forms or account creation flows using automated scanners

In case you find chain vulnerabilities we’ll pay only for vulnerabilities with the highest severity.

Don’t break any law and stay within the defined scope

Any details of found vulnerabilities must not be communicated to anyone who is not an authorized employee of this Company without appropriate permission

Severity and Payment

Critical:
$750 of BNB

High:
$500 of BNB

Medium:
$250 of BNB

Low:
$75 of BNB

Information:

No payment

Report Evaluation

To be deemed valid, a report must demonstrate a software vulnerability in a service provided by HODL that harms HODL or its customers. Reports that include a clear Proof of Concept or specific step-by-step instructions to replicate the vulnerability are considerably more effective at communicating a researcher’s findings and are therefore far more likely to be deemed valid.

A report must be a valid, in-scope report to qualify for a bounty. HODL awards bounties based on the severity of the vulnerability. We determine severity based on severity.

From reporting a finding to getting a response from HODL it will take up to seven working days. If the finding is classified and accepted the payout will happen within 24 hours.

To report a finding, please contact the admin team via the

Official HODL Telegram
.

Before proceeding with your use of the Site, it is crucial to understand the risks associated with cryptocurrency investments. Cryptoassets, including $HODL tokens, $HODLX tokens, HODL Hands NFTs, and Gem Fighter NFTS, are inherently volatile and speculative investments. The purchase and sale of cryptoassets involve significant risks and can result in the loss of your invested capital. You should be aware that investing in cryptoassets carries no protection from the Financial Ombudsman Service (FOS) or the Financial Services Compensation Scheme (FSCS) in the event of any adverse outcomes. Complexity and Diversification:

Investing in cryptoassets can be complex, and their performance can be highly volatile. You should conduct thorough research and diversify your investments to mitigate risks. Do not put all your capital into a single type of investment, and consider limiting high-risk investments to no more than 10% of your total portfolio. Remember that if something seems too good to be true, it may be a risk worth reconsidering.

Privacy Policy

Last updated: December 20, 2023

This Privacy Policy explains how HODLVERSE Inc ("we," "us," or "our") collects, uses, and discloses personal information when you use hodltoken.net (the "Site"). By using the Site, you consent to the collection, use, and disclosure of your personal information as described in this Privacy Policy.

COLLECTION AND USE OF PERSONAL INFORMATION

We may collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us when using the Site, such as your name, email address, and any other information you choose to provide. We use this information to communicate with you, provide the services you request, and improve the Site's functionality and user experience.

COOKIES AND SIMILAR TECHNOLOGIES

We may use cookies and similar technologies to collect information about your interactions with the Site. For more information on how we use cookies, please refer to our

Cookie Policy
.

THIRD-PARTY ANALYTICS

We may use third-party analytics tools to measure and analyze the usage of the Site. These tools collect information sent by your device or the Site and help us understand how the Site is used and improve its performance and user experience.

DISCLOSURE OF PERSONAL INFORMATION

We may disclose your personal information to third parties in the following circumstances:

With your consent or at your direction.

To comply with legal obligations, such as responding to lawful requests or court orders.

To protect our rights, property, or safety, or the rights, property, or safety of others.

In connection with a business transaction, such as a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets.

HODL APP AND WEBSITE DATA COLLECTION

In the HODL App, we do not store personal information; however, certain data is collected for improved functionality. Users have the option to label/name their wallets, addresses in the address book (contacts), and notifications that may show the names of addresses. All this data is securely stored and encrypted using AES-256-CBC encryption with randomly generated passwords per app installation. Private keys and passphrases are stored in compliance with the Web3 Keystore v3 standard, further protected by encryption and custom (de)shuffling of the data. React Native source code is obfuscated, and additional layers of security are applied. For our HODL Website, no tracking occurs, and our $HODL Dashboard only retains some cached wallet data in localStorage.

THIRD-PARTY LINKS

The Site may contain links to third-party websites or services that are not owned or controlled by HODLVERSE Inc. We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party websites or services. We encourage you to review the privacy policies of those third parties before providing any personal information.

DATA RETENTION

We will retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law.

SECURITY

We implement reasonable security measures to protect the personal information we collect. However, no method of transmission or storage is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee the absolute security of your personal information.

CHILDREN'S PRIVACY

The Site is not directed to individuals under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 18. If you become aware that a child has provided us with personal information without parental consent, please contact us, and we will take steps to remove the information and terminate the child's account.

CHANGES TO THIS PRIVACY POLICY

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time and make changes in our user account management and responsibilities. Please review our full

Terms of Use
for more details. We will notify you of any changes by posting the updated Privacy Policy on the Site. It is your responsibility to review the Privacy Policy periodically for any changes.

CONTACT US

If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at support@hodltoken.net.

Please note that this Privacy Policy is provided for informational purposes only and does not constitute legal advice. It is important to consult with a legal professional to ensure compliance with applicable privacy laws and regulations.

Cookie Policy

Last updated: December 20, 2023

This Cookie Policy explains how HODLVERSE Inc. ("we," "us," or "our") uses cookies and similar technologies when you visit hodltoken.net (the "Site"). By using the Site, you consent to the use of cookies as described in this policy.

WHAT ARE COOKIES?

Cookies are small text files that are placed on your device (computer, smartphone, or tablet) when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently, enhance user experience, and provide information to website owners.

HOW WE USE COOKIES

We use cookies for various purposes, including:

Essential Cookies: These cookies are necessary for the functioning of the Site and enable you to navigate and use its features. They are usually set in response to your actions, such as filling out forms or setting preferences.

General Analytics Cookies: We use analytics cookies to collect information about how visitors interact with the Site. This helps us analyze and improve the performance and usability of the Site. The information collected is anonymous and does not identify individual users.

Google Analytics: We use Google Analytics, a web analytics service, to collect anonymous data on site usage. This information includes pages visited, visit duration, and the website source. Google Analytics may also personalize ads based on this data. You can learn more about Google Analytics and opt-out options in Google's Privacy & Terms (https://policies.google.com/technologies/partner-sites).

Google Tag Manager: We utilize Google Tag Manager to manage and deploy tags on the site. It may collect data related to site performance. For details, refer to Google's Privacy Policy (https://policies.google.com/privacy).

Marketing Cookies: We may use marketing cookies to deliver personalized advertisements and promotional content based on your interests and browsing behavior. These cookies may track your visits to other websites and provide data to advertising networks.

Third-Party Cookies: The Site may contain content and features from third-party providers, who may set cookies on your device. We do not have control over these cookies and recommend reviewing the respective third-party providers' privacy and cookie policies.

MANAGING COOKIES

You can control and manage cookies in various ways. Most web browsers allow you to accept or reject cookies, delete existing cookies, and set preferences for future cookie usage. However, please note that disabling or blocking certain cookies may affect the functionality and usability of the Site.

To learn more about cookie settings and how to manage cookies in your browser, you can visit the following websites:

Cookie settings in Chrome:
https://support.google.com/accounts/answer/61416

Cookie settings in Firefox:
https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/cookies-information-websites-store-on-your-computer

Cookie settings in Safari:
https://support.apple.com/en-gb/guide/safari/sfri11471/mac

Cookie settings in Internet Explorer:
https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/delete-and-manage-cookies-168dab11-0753-043d-7c16-ede5947fc64d

Please note that these links are provided for informational purposes only, and we do not endorse or guarantee the accuracy of the information on third-party websites.

PRIVACY

For information on how we collect, use, and protect your personal data, user responsibilities, and our user account termination policy, please refer to our

Privacy Policy
.

CONTACT US

If you have any questions or concerns about our use of cookies, please contact us at support@hodltoken.net.

Please note that this Cookie Policy may be updated from time to time. We encourage you to review this page periodically for any changes.

Please note that this Cookie Policy is provided for informational purposes only and does not constitute legal advice. It is important to consult with a legal professional to ensure compliance with applicable laws and regulations regarding the use of cookies.

Company Registration

OFAC Blocked Addresses

AML Analytics

HODL is preparing to implement anti-money laundering analytics to maintain a secure ecosystem. This tool will detect and report suspicious activity to relevant authorities, protecting both HODL and its investors.

AML Analytics

Live AML Checks

We're introducing live anti-money laundering checks using market-leading AML software to prevent blacklisted wallets from accessing our services.

Live AML Checks

MiCA Passport

HODL is applying for MiCA’s regulatory passport to ensure compliance across all EU states, enhancing legitimacy and accessibility for European investors.

MiCA Passport

Meet

Michael
a $HODL Dolphin

I invest in $HODL for my family

Michael

HODL status

Dolphin

Share:
"Since the Dawn of Crypto with Bitcoin, many who missed out have sought 'the next big thing'.

Since then there has been a flood of crypto projects entering the market and people seeking the next crypto asset to invest in, which can be so daunting, but that’s where $HODL comes in. With $HODL true passive income has never been easier to obtain, and as the name suggests, holding $HODL rewards the investor. Every seven days you can claim your reward or reinvest, or even stack your BNB rewards until you wish to claim.

How does this all work? With every buy, sell, or transfer, there is a 10% tax of which 6% goes into filling the BNB reward pool, 1% goes into $HODL reflections, and a further 1% into marketing while the remaining 2% is sent to the liquidity pool.

What I enjoy about $HODL is that regardless of the market around us being up or down, I still earn my BNB rewards.

Of all the uncertainties in life, $HODL and your rewards will never be one of them. I’m currently earning $72 a month in BNB and being disabled and unable to work, nothing makes me smile more or want to reinvest in $HODL than claiming my BNB rewards. $HODL is an extra income for me and while $72 a month might not seem like much it truly is to me and it allows me to invest more frequently than I had been capable of prior to investing in $HODL.

I continue investing in $HODL to increase my stake and rewards and doing so is as easy as reinvesting my BNB rewards. You can also choose to keep your BNB or use it elsewhere but considering the benefits of $HODL, you’ll only want to reinvest in $HODL!

I’m all in on $HODL, not just for now but for the long term and the future is bright. With upcoming features like the $HODL Vault, and an ability to earn rewards in other coins besides BNB, $HODL token is the next big thing you can invest in right now."

"My crypto journey began in November 2017 when I experienced the confusing scramble of trying to buy 'this new thing' called Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Litecoin. After some trial and error, I successfully set up a Coinbase account, connected my bank card, and started buying this 'Cryptocurrency stuff'.

After being in and out of many crypto projects, losing money, and having to sell my bags to make any kind of profit, I stumbled upon $HODL in May of 2021. This is where the story becomes very exciting for me.

I discovered the HODL voice chat, plugged in, and became intoxicated by the positivity that I interacted with each day. I invested immediately after the first few hours in the voice chat. I invested a large sum of money from profits made on other projects that I finally learned how to manage properly. Since investing and to this day, I get paid in BNB just for holding $HODL!

I have been able to contribute to my sister's income so she can work part-time, providing her the ability to have more time to spend with our aging mother, who sometimes needs assistance.

I myself was able to semi-retire a few months ago, thanks to the passive income I consistently receive from $HODL.

HODL is family to me. I never regret the journey that I have taken in cryptocurrency, it got me where I am today, and I look forward to many years of prosperity being engaged, invested, and an overall part of this amazing cryptocurrency project."

Meet

Julien
a $HODL Dolphin

I've never sold a single $HODL token

Julien

HODL status

Dolphin

Share:
"The first time I invested in crypto was on June 2nd, 2021. A few days before I accidentally stumbled upon an article on Medium, which reported about a fabulous project that I couldn't get out of my mind afterward. The project was called $HODL. Apart from the BNB, which I needed to buy $HODL, this was my first crypto investment.

So I sat down, blue-eyed as I was, and asked the search engine of my phone how I can buy $HODL. Miraculously, in a relatively short time, I managed to create an account at Binance, verify myself, download a wallet, connect to PancakeSwap, and ask a lot of questions in the HODL Telegram group before buying a whopping 900,000 $HODL for 0.00018 BNB. On the same day, I bought another 90m $HODL and one day later 1.5b $HODL. I was hooked.

Since then my wallet has grown a lot and what started as a small shrimp has now become a stately dolphin that can proudly declare that $HODL deserves its name, and not even a fraction of a single $HODL token that ever found its way into my wallet has ever been sold!

So a lot has happened since June, I've bought a lot of dips, participated in a lot of competitions, even joined Twitter to promote $HODL, and always tried to help people who had questions or problems in the community.

When Adam asked me to write him a DM on the 17th of December, I was surprised but didn't mind. Shortly after that I was speechless, felt extremely honored, and also a bit touched. Since this conversation, I may call myself a mod and part of the team at HODL.

The fact that I managed it with my cluelessness at the time about crypto is a miracle. I owe that to the outstanding work of the mods and the support of the community who stand together with their whole heart behind the project.

I am thankful for everything I was allowed to experience in this community and look forward with every fiber in me to everything that still lies ahead."

Meet

Godfirst
a $HODL Shark

Passive income is my dream

Godfirst

HODL status

Shark

Share:
"My name is Godfirst Igwe, I am from Nigeria, and this is my story.

I dabbled in cryptocurrency three years ago by buying some Bitcoin on Luno. I sold a little bit a few years later and was excited about the potential for additional income crypto could offer.

So I started digging and looking for startup projects to throw a few dollars into and hold for a few years. I have always believed that getting rich in crypto is possible with timing and patience. I got rug-pulled a lot, as most projects are just outright scams.

In May 2021, I stumbled onto $HODL through a telegram group that promotes new projects. I got in for about $10, and shortly after the value doubled. I sold it and rebought it, and I saw it double again. Thereafter, I decided to check out the website and telegram group for more information. I got hooked on the Telegram voice chat and had it on 24/7. This built my confidence in the project and got me attached to the community.

To build my bag, I started participating in giveaways and contests, from which I have won more than $2,000 worth of BNB and $HODL, which I used to pay off my debts and buy foodstuffs.

I started with just under 10 million $HODL with little to no BNB rewards, but have built that bag to more than 855 billion at the time of this writing, claiming about $35 in BNB rewards every few days. This is a good income for people living in my part of the world. Passive income has been my dream, and I am glad I was able to achieve that with the $HODL. HODL Forward: A New Community-Driven Approach to Giving Back

Share:

At HODL, we’ve always believed in using crypto to create real-world impact. Now, we’re taking that mission even further with a
new direction
for our official charity initiative—one that puts the power directly in the hands of our community.

HODL Forward: Paying It Forward as a Community

The HODL Charity Fund is evolving into a
community-driven movement
where holders collectively decide where our

BNB rewards
should go. This aligns with our belief that crypto isn’t just about holding—it’s about making a difference. Through the concept of

HODL Forward
, we are committing to paying forward some of our rewards to
support global causes that matter most
to our holders.

How It Works

Every month, we will ask the

HODL community
to suggest charities they believe deserve support. Once nominations are in, we will
host a poll
to determine which charities will receive donations from the HODL Charity Fund. This ensures that every contribution goes to causes our holders care about most.

The entire process will take place within our
official community on Telegram
at
hodltoken.net/telegram
, where holders can submit charity suggestions and vote on the final selections.

A Transparent, Community-Driven Impact

By holding
$HODL
, you’re not just earning rewards—you’re also taking part in a system where
those rewards can change lives
. 100% of donations go directly toward growing the fund and increasing the

BNB rewards available for charity
, meaning our ability to give back
grows stronger over time
.

This shift is about more than just donating—it’s about
building a sustainable, decentralized way of giving back
, driven by the very people who make HODL possible. Join us in

HODL Forward
, and let’s make a global impact together.

If you’re ready to take part, join the discussion and help us choose the next charities to support at
hodltoken.net/telegram
.

HODL Forward India Event 05/29/2023

Share:
"On my visit back to India in collaboration with Swarmani youth organisation Rohit Kumar we distributed health safety aid kits auto-rickshaw’s below are few pictures we took during that event" -Thakur Mani

HODL Forward's mission is to help feed those in need by leveraging $HODL's passive income generation. At its heart, HODL is about community. Our rewards are rooted in the actions and choices of our community members. HODL Forward is the way we can share and give back to an even larger community in need.

This is So Important...

If you're reading this, you're one of the lucky ones... Many people all around the world struggle desperately, every day. They struggle in ways we can't comprehend... They struggle to feed and clothe their children, their families, and themselves. They can't buy the medicines they need or live in comfort. Every day around 10,000 children die from malnutrition - stop to think about that - all those lives that never really began. So many people live with little hope and even less support... We know we can't help everyone - no doubt about that, but we as a community can play our part - and in fact, we must play our part!

HODL Forward, our self-made charity service, partnered to deliver food and essential supplies to a family in Nigeria recently, they are desperately struggling. Take a look at the video and see the joy in the mother's face when she gets the food and supplies her family need. Through the power of passive income, we're able to help more families like this, and as we grow HODL is here to help as many people as we possibly can, and play our part in helping those in need around the world.

Check out more stories here, join the charity group and if you can, donate either HODL or BNB (Bep20) to the address on this website page.

HODL Forward Event Dec 10th 2022

Share:

Once again, HODL FORWARD paid a visit to a family on December 10th, 2022 in Nigeria who is struggling to keep up with the family after the death of her husband. HODL FORWARD provided them with foodstuffs in order to let them know that they are not alone.

This is So Important...

If you're reading this, you're one of the lucky ones... Many people all around the world struggle desperately, every day. They struggle in ways we can't comprehend... They struggle to feed and clothe their children, their families, and themselves. They can't buy the medicines they need or live in comfort. Every day around 10,000 children die from malnutrition - stop to think about that - all those lives that never really began. So many people live with little hope and even less support... We know we can't help everyone - no doubt about that, but we as a community can play our part - and in fact, we must play our part!

HODL Forward, our self-made charity service, partnered to deliver food and essential supplies to a family in Nigeria recently, they are desperately struggling. Take a look at the video and see the joy in the mother's face when she gets the food and supplies her family need. Through the power of passive income, we're able to help more families like this, and as we grow HODL is here to help as many people as we possibly can, and play our part in helping those in need around the world.

Check out more stories here, join the charity group and if you can, donate either HODL or BNB (Bep20) to the address on this website page.
/HODL_Others_in_Your_Heart

HODL's Official Charity

Turning Crypto Rewards into Real-World Impact

The HODL Charity Fund is powered by our community and fueled by the concept of HODL Forward—the idea that we can pay forward some of our rewards to help those in need around the world. By holding $HODL, the fund continuously generates BNB rewards, which are then donated to causes chosen by our holders.

Every month, the community suggests and votes on charities to support, ensuring that contributions go where they matter most. Together, we’re proving that crypto can be a force for real-world good—turning decentralized rewards into food, shelter, healthcare, and education for those who need it most.
100% of contributions go toward growing the fund, increasing the BNB rewards available for charity. Want to take part? Simply send BNB (BEP-20) or $HODL to the address below and help us amplify the impact—one reward at a time.

HODL Forward wallet address
0x3a5b82e9E0D5F31e5bee0F1a5667f3CF392DBA4a

Delivering Pension Education across Slums in India

HODL Forward delivered support and education on applying for financial support from the government for the most impoverished.

Learn more

Learn more

HODL Forward Delivers Essential Supplies in Nigeria

HODL Forward delivers nutritious food and toiletries to two charities in Nigeria.

Learn more

Building A Better Tomorrow with HODL Forward

HODL thinks that financial sustainability is the key to a better tomorrow. Through our non-profit HODL Forward, we are working with The Swarmani Youth Welfare Organization in India to organize events to change the lives of those lacking financial sustainability.

Learn more

HODL Forward Event, May 13th, 2022

Trinitarian foundation home of orphans and  helpless people

Meri Yojna - My Adhikar

In village Burail, social Welfare organisation Swarmani Youth Welfare Association Chandigarh, in association with HODL FORWARD India, inaugurated its new campaign "Meri Yojna - My Adhikar" in which

Mr. Varun Bainiwal ji - Assistant Labor Commissioner, Labor Department Chandigarh as the chief guest.

HODL Forward Support 7 Families in Need
"For many of the families we supported today, their conditions are so bad that they cried when receiving these donations, with several of them bowing and touching our feet with tears in their eyes saying thank you over and over again - it's incredibly humbling."

150 Covid-19 Safety Kits Delivered to Families in Poverty

HODL's Official Charity

Turning Crypto Rewards into Real-World Impact

The HODL Charity Fund is powered by our community and fueled by the concept of HODL Forward—the idea that we can pay forward some of our rewards to help those in need around the world. By holding $HODL, the fund continuously generates BNB rewards, which are then donated to causes chosen by our holders.

Every month, the community suggests and votes on charities to support, ensuring that contributions go where they matter most. Together, we’re proving that crypto can be a force for real-world good—turning decentralized rewards into food, shelter, healthcare, and education for those who need it most.
100% of contributions go toward growing the fund, increasing the BNB rewards available for charity. Want to take part? Simply send BNB (BEP-20) or $HODL to the address below and help us amplify the impact—one reward at a time.

Celebrating 4 Years of HODL: A Journey of Growth, Rewards, and Innovation

Share:

On May 7, 2021, HODL launched on the Binance Smart Chain with a vision to revolutionize passive income in the crypto space. Four years later, we're proud to celebrate our 4th anniversary, having achieved significant milestones and built a robust ecosystem for our community.

Milestones Achieved

Over 20,000 BNB Paid Out
: HODL has become the highest-paying BNB reward token in history, distributing over 20,000 BNB to our holders.

Expansive Ecosystem
: From NFTs to play-to-earn games, we've developed a comprehensive DeFi ecosystem that offers multiple avenues for earning and engagement.

Innovative Features
: Our Dynamic Reward Bot optimizes BNB rewards, while tax-free reinvestment options and a 5% transaction tax ensure sustainability and growth.
4th Birthday Giveaway

To thank our community, we're hosting a special birthday giveaway:
4 Random Buys
: We'll select four random purchases of $HODL to receive $40 worth of $HODL each.

How to Enter
: Simply buy $HODL via PancakeSwap by midnight (UTC) on Sunday, May 11, 2025.

Winner Announcement
: Winners will be announced on Monday, May 12, and prizes will be airdropped directly to their wallets.

Looking Ahead

Our roadmap includes exciting developments:

Cross-Chain Expansion
: We're working to bring $HODL to multiple blockchains, increasing accessibility and utility.

Enhanced DeFi Tools
: Upcoming features like the HODL App and Telegram Trading Bot will provide more control and convenience for our users.

NFT Innovations
: We're introducing new NFT staking options and trading features to further enrich our ecosystem.

Thank You

We extend our heartfelt gratitude to our community for your unwavering support over the past four years. Your trust and engagement have been instrumental in our growth and success.

Here's to the next 40 years of building, earning, and growing together!

Stay connected and join the celebration:

Stake Your Gem Fighter NFTs and Earn $HODL – Up to 200% APR!

Share:

To celebrate the upcoming launch of

Gem Fighter
, one of the most exciting play-to-earn games in crypto, we’re launching a
limited staking pool
that lets you earn passive income in
$HODL
just for holding and staking your

Gem Fighter NFTs
.

This is your chance to earn your mint cost back — and more — while waiting to battle in the arena!

How It Works

Stake any

Gem Fighter NFT with an ID between 1,800 and 2,549
and earn
fixed APR
in $HODL based on your NFT’s number.

You can check your NFT ID in your wallet, on the
staking page
, or by asking in the

HODL Telegram group
.

APR Tiers

NFT #1800 – #1899
→
200% APR in $HODL

NFT #1900 – #2149
→
150% APR in $HODL

NFT #2150 – #2549
→
100% APR in $HODL

APR is calculated using a fixed NFT value of $35.

Example:

Stake 10 NFTs from the top tier (ID #1800–1899) for 6 months, and you’ll earn back
$350 worth of $HODL
— on a $350 NFT stake.

Mint Now – Still Early for 200% APR

At the time of writing, we are on

NFT #1804
, so you still have a chance to grab a top-tier NFT and lock in
200% APR
!

Mint cost:
$35 per NFT

Staking period:
6 months

Start here

Play-to-Earn Is Just Getting Started

Once the game launches, your staked NFT becomes your
fighter
in

Gem Fighter
— letting you
earn even more $HODL through gameplay
.

And the best part?

Most of the mint funds go directly into boosting the $HODL chart
, so everyone benefits from the momentum.

Summary

Mint a Gem Fighter NFT for $35

Stake it for 6 months and earn up to 200% APR in $HODL

Then fight in the game to earn even more

Boost the $HODL chart and community while you earn

This is true utility — earn while you wait, and earn again when you play.

Get your fighters now and join the next evolution of DeFi gaming.

HODL Levels Up: 1,400 Days, 20,000 Holders & Bigger Rewards

Share:

The HODL journey continues to gain momentum. Over the past 1,400 days, we have built a strong and resilient ecosystem, grown our community to over 20,000 holders, and enhanced our reward system to make holding HODL even more valuable.

While the broader market faces challenges, HODL remains strong—delivering consistent BNB rewards, increasing price momentum, and maintaining a sustainable model for long-term success.
20% More BNB Rewards

HODL has increased BNB rewards by 20%, making it even more rewarding to hold. This upgrade ensures that every claim provides greater value, reinforcing our commitment to long-term holders.

Simpler and More Cost-Effective Rewards

To make the rewards system more efficient and cost-effective, we have removed the need for stacking:

Holders can now claim every seven days with lower fees.

Those who previously stacked their rewards have already received their tokens, along with bonus HODL, which has been bought back on the chart.

This change simplifies the claiming process and reduces unnecessary costs for all users.

Exclusive Reinvest Perk

As part of our March initiative, we are introducing a reinvest bonus:

Holders who reinvest 100% of their rewards can claim in just five days instead of seven.

This approach strengthens the ecosystem by encouraging reinvestment and maintaining price momentum.
20,000 Holders and Growing

HODL continues to expand, reaching over 20,000 holders despite market fluctuations. The combination of strong fundamentals, a growing community, and sustainable rewards ensures HODL remains a leader in passive BNB income.

Our focus is clear:

Provide consistent BNB rewards to holders

Strengthen long-term growth and price stability

Adapt and innovate to ensure sustainability
1,400 Days and Looking Ahead

Hitting the 1,400-day milestone demonstrates the strength of our project and community. With these latest upgrades, HODL is better positioned than ever for continued growth and success.

The future of HODL is strong, and this is just the beginning.

Reward Stacking Closure – What You Need to Know

Share:

At HODL, we’re always working to
improve efficiency, fairness, and simplicity
for our holders. With our latest updates, we are officially
removing reward stacking
to streamline the claiming process and further reduce costs.

Why Are We Removing Reward Stacking?

Originally, reward stacking allowed users to
accumulate BNB rewards up to 0.1 BNB
without any claim period—a feature that helped smaller investors maximize rewards relative to gas fees. However, with our latest contract optimizations,
this feature is no longer needed.

Here’s why we’re making this change:

Ultra-low claim fees
– Claim fees are now just
$0.04
(down from
$1.20
under the v1 contract!). With fees this low, stacking is no longer necessary to save on gas costs.

A uniform claim system for all holders
– Rewards will now be distributed
purely based on time and holdings,
ensuring fairness for all users.

Encourages weekly engagement
– Regular claiming keeps the system
dynamic and rewarding
for all holders.

Reduces contract costs & complexity
– Removing stacking
streamlines the system
, making it even more cost-effective.

Cleaner messaging & easier claiming
– A
simpler claim process
means a better user experience and
less confusion
for new holders.

What’s Next?

To ensure a smooth transition, we are providing
one week’s notice
for holders who wish to
claim their stacked BNB rewards
before stacking is permanently removed.

Final Cut-Off Date: Monday, March 3, 2025

After this date:

Reward stacking will be permanently removed.

All stacked $HODL and earned BNB rewards will be returned
to holders who are still in the stacking pool.

This update makes HODL
even more efficient, fair, and accessible
for all holders. Thank you for your support as we continue to improve and evolve!

Open Letter to BNB Chain: A Call for Collaboration

Share:

Dear BNB Chain Team,

Since 2021, HODL has been at the forefront of sustainable, community-driven DeFi, distributing over
20,300 BNB in rewards
and proving that real-yield crypto projects can thrive. Even in market lows, our system continues to deliver 40% APR in BNB rewards alone, demonstrating the strength of our tokenomics and long-term vision.

For nearly four years, we have built relentlessly through all market conditions because we believe that builders, not hype, will win in this space. We embrace incremental progress, continuously refining our model to deliver a system that users truly value and want to use.

The HODL Ecosystem: More Than Just Rewards

Our primary token, $HODL, allows users to earn BNB simply by holding, offering a secure and sustainable way to generate reward income. But we’ve gone beyond traditional rewards by building a full ecosystem that supports and enhances $HODL’s value:

NFTs with Real Utility – Providing access, staking, and engagement incentives.

Gaming & Play-to-Earn – Expanding opportunities for users to earn while enjoying the ecosystem.

The HODL App – Enabling anyone, even with zero crypto knowledge, to join DeFi effortlessly, set up wallets, and collect rewards seamlessly.

By integrating
multiple revenue streams
, we ensure
long-term sustainability
, making reward income reliable and scalable for every user.

Longevity & Advancing Security on BNB Chain

Security and efficiency are core to our mission. That’s why we’ve developed solutions to mitigate MEV attacks and front-running, ensuring a fairer and more efficient trading environment. Our new contract is optimized for:

Gas efficiency, reducing costs for users to claim weekly BNB rewards to just ~$0.04 of BNB.

Class-leading security, 250-year LP lock, multi-sig contract and more ensure stability and best results for holders.

Integration with a frictionless app layer of products and services that users truly want—ensuring long-term success as a sustainable, lifelong project with ongoing BNB rewards.

A Strategic Collaboration with BNB Chain

BNB Chain has been the foundation of our success, and we see the potential for even greater impact with technical support and collaboration. We would welcome the opportunity to work alongside the BNB Chain team on:

Security Enhancements – Further strengthening anti-MEV and front-running protections.

Scalability & Optimization – Ensuring the most efficient, cost-effective trading experience.

Elevating Visibility – Showcasing sustainable BNB reward models that highlight the power of real-yield DeFi.

By working together, we can set a new standard for sustainable, high-utility DeFi, drive user adoption, and further position BNB Chain as the leading blockchain for secure, reward-driven ecosystems.

Let’s make it happen.

Best regards,

The HODL Team

The Story Behind Our Epic Game: Gem Fighter – Shards of Creation

Share:

Episode 1: Shards of Creation

Prologue: The Fractured Future

The year is 6780. Humanity has unlocked unimaginable technological advancements, unraveling the physical mysteries of the universe. Yet, only a privileged few enjoy the fruits of this knowledge, while billions scrape by in squalor, eking out a miserable existence. The air of Earth's overpopulated megacities is thick with desperation and resentment, as the wonders of science serve to widen the gulf between the rich and the poor.

Among the final frontiers of discovery are consciousness and the origins of existence itself. These enigmas remain unsolved, even as scientists harness celestial amounts of energy to rip holes in the fabric of space-time, creating portals to what were initially thought to be alternate dimensions. But the truth was far stranger—each portal gives birth to a
new
temporary universe. These fragile dimensions collapse the moment there are no observers within them, their existence dependent on the attention of those who dare to explore.

Chapter 1: The Cost of Creation

The creation of a portal is no trivial task. The energy required is astronomical, far beyond what Earth can generate. Instead, portals are opened in space, where nuclear reactors and artificial suns can channel the immense power needed. Spaceships are mandatory for delvers, who must traverse these rifts to gather resources or die trying.

These unstable dimensions are hostile realms, filled with crystalline entities and alien technologies powered by gemstones. Decades ago, a single drone returned from such a dimension with one of these gemstones. Research revealed their miraculous properties: they defied physical laws when energized, producing matter out of nothing. Water, air, hydrogen, oxygen—even exotic matter flowed from these stones, depending on their composition.

The discovery transformed the gemstones into the most valuable resource in human history. For the elite, they meant self-sustaining spaceships and endless wealth. For the impoverished, they represented salvation. Public access to portals was eventually allowed, but only under grim conditions—delvers would assume all risks, and survival rates were abysmally low.

You are one of the forgotten masses, struggling for survival. With no hope of breaking free from the grind of poverty, you and your friends pooled every resource you had to construct a patchwork spaceship. Your dream is simple but perilous: delve into a portal, retrieve a gemstone, and return alive. For the first time in your life, you have a chance to change your fate.

Chapter 2: The Portal Beckons

Your spaceship,

The Shardchaser
, is a patched-together relic of desperation. Its hull groans with every shift in gravity, and its systems are barely functional, but it’s enough to reach the nearest public portal station orbiting Earth. The facility is a hive of chaos, packed with other would-be delvers and corporate recruiters preying on the desperate.

The portal itself is a dazzling spectacle—a massive ring floating in the void, its edges crackling with raw energy. The power of a thousand suns surges through it, and the unstable glow in its center marks the birth of a new universe. Kael, your engineer and closest friend, mutters as he calibrates the ship's stabilizers. "That much energy just to create a world that disappears the moment we stop looking at it. Feels like playing God."

As the countdown begins, you take one last look at Earth. It’s not a home, just a reminder of everything you’re leaving behind. When the portal activates, the world twists into chaos. Your ship hurtles into the unknown, the roar of collapsing space-time filling your ears.

Chapter 3: Beacons of Hope

The temporary dimension they entered was surreal, a boundless void veiled in shifting fog. Jagged rocks floated aimlessly, their sharp edges glinting in the soft light emitted by crystalline orbs scattered throughout the expanse. The orbs pulsed with a rhythmic, multicolored glow, their light refracting through the fog to create patterns both mesmerizing and alien.

The crew of

The Shardchaser
was captivated. The haunting beauty of the place contrasted sharply with the danger they knew lurked within. Even Kael, usually grounded and composed, found himself saying, “This doesn’t feel like a battlefield—it feels like... a dream.”

But the sensors reminded them otherwise. Movement registered in the distance—precise, deliberate, and deliberate.

Indescribable Entities

Through the fog, the entities began to emerge, their forms almost too alien for human comprehension. They were not like anything the crew had expected. Their shapes seemed mathematically perfect yet defied any conventional geometry. Surfaces curved and folded in ways that made no sense, lines seemed infinite yet contained, and edges blurred as if existing in multiple dimensions at once.
“I... can’t describe that,” one crew member muttered, their voice tinged with unease.
“It’s like trying to explain a higher dimension,” Kael added, his gaze locked on the nearest entity. “Every time I look at it, I feel like it’s... wrong, but perfect at the same time.”

Despite their surreal forms, the entities moved with mechanical precision. One in particular caught the crew’s attention. It floated apart from the others, its shape a mesmerizing combination of symmetry and chaos, with a gemstone embedded in its core.
“That’s our target,” you said, breaking the crew’s trance.

Testing the Waters

The crew decided on caution. A small drone was launched toward the entity, its sensors active, its movements slow and deliberate. The entity remained still, its crystalline surface shimmering faintly. The crew held their breath as the drone approached, but when it came too close, the entity reacted.

In an instant, parts of its shape twisted and folded inward, revealing what seemed like an aperture. From within, a beam of energy erupted, obliterating the drone in one blinding flash. As quickly as it had moved, the entity returned to its original form, motionless once more.
“It doesn’t act unless provoked,” Kael observed, his tone grave.
“Or maybe it sees intrusion as provocation,” you suggested.

The Calm Before the Storm

The crew armed their ship’s weaponry, knowing they’d have to tread carefully. The plan was simple: disable the entity without destroying it, and retrieve the gemstone intact. The first shot was a low-power energy pulse aimed at the entity’s outer layers.

The reaction was instantaneous. The entity’s form began to shift, parts of it folding and unfolding in a way that seemed both deliberate and chaotic. It moved with uncanny precision, its attacks calculated and swift, but the crew worked together to disable it piece by piece.

The battle felt like solving a puzzle. Each attack revealed new patterns in the entity’s movements, forcing the crew to adapt. Finally, a well-placed strike dislodged the gemstone from its core. The entity froze, its glowing surfaces dimming until it became just another fragment floating in the void.

Reflections in the Void

The crew retrieved the gemstone using robotic arms, their hearts pounding with both relief and exhilaration. The stone pulsed faintly in its containment chamber, its energy contained but palpable.
“It’s ironic,” one crew member said, staring at the gemstone. “We succeeded here, in this impossible, incomprehensible place, because we were forced to be careful. It’s like the dimension itself demanded precision.”

Kael nodded. “The entities, the environment, even the fog—it all feels deliberate. Like it’s not just alive, but aware. This place wasn’t just hostile; it was testing us.”

Another crew member added quietly, “We’ve never heard of a place like this. What if the people who saw this dimension didn’t survive to tell the story? We only hear about the ones who make it back. What if... this was their final sight?”

The weight of those words lingered. The crew turned their ship toward the portal, eager to leave the enigmatic realm behind.

As the fog swallowed the crystalline orbs and alien entities, the crew carried with them the gemstone—a beacon of hope and a reminder of the dangers they had barely survived. Behind them, the dimension seemed to watch, its unknowable gaze following them until the portal closed.

Chapter 4: Escape Through the Rift

The return journey was calm—almost too calm. As your ship glided toward the shimmering portal, the crew sat in quiet reflection, the weight of their achievement and the mysteries of the dimension pressing heavily on their minds.

The glowing gemstone lay secured in its containment chamber, casting a faint light that seemed almost alive. It pulsed rhythmically, as if synchronized with the ship’s systems. Kael stared at it intently.
“This thing is... incredible,” he said. “It’s almost like it knows it’s been taken.”

You dismissed his comment with a shrug, though you couldn’t shake the same unsettling feeling. “It doesn’t matter what it knows,” you replied. “All that matters is that it’s ours—and that we get back in one piece.”

The Calm Before the Rift

The fog parted as the portal drew nearer, its energy shimmering in the distance like a beacon. For a moment, everything seemed tranquil—too tranquil. Kael adjusted the ship’s controls, carefully steering through floating debris and the jagged rocks that marked the dimension’s surreal terrain.

But as the portal came into view, the sensors began to beep erratically. Something was wrong.
“Why are we getting anomalies?” one of the crew asked, glancing at the readouts.

Kael furrowed his brow. “I don’t know. It’s like the dimension’s energy is... fluctuating.”

The portal’s glow began to flicker, its stable form wavering. “That shouldn’t be happening,” you muttered, instinctively tightening your grip on your chair.

Dimensional Instability

Suddenly, the space around you began to distort. The serene void erupted into chaos as the dimension’s energy surged unpredictably. Rocks spiraled violently, and the once-mesmerizing crystalline orbs shattered like fragile glass, scattering shards of light in every direction.
“Dimension’s collapsing!” Kael shouted.

The portal, once a steady gateway, now pulsed erratically, shrinking and expanding as if struggling to maintain its form.
“Full power to the engines!” you commanded, your voice cutting through the rising tension.

The ship’s thrusters roared as you surged toward the portal. Behind you, the dimension folded in on itself, the jagged terrain imploding into a kaleidoscope of chaotic light.

The Final Push

The crew worked in frantic unison, every system pushed to its limits. Alarms blared as the ship’s structural integrity wavered under the strain of the collapsing dimension. The portal was now a flickering pinpoint, shrinking faster than you could approach it.

Kael’s voice cracked through the chaos. “If we don’t make it now, we’re done!”

With one last desperate maneuver, you diverted all remaining energy to the engines. The ship hurtled forward, narrowly dodging a massive shard of collapsing rock.
“Brace yourselves!” you shouted.

The ship shot through the portal just as it collapsed entirely, the shockwave hurling you into open space. The roaring chaos of the dimension was replaced by an eerie silence.

Back to Reality

When you came to, the portal station loomed outside the viewport, its stark, metallic frame a welcome sight after the madness you had endured. The gemstone still pulsed faintly in its chamber, its glow a reminder of your impossible journey.

The crew exchanged looks of weary relief, but the moment was short-lived. Almost immediately, a fleet of corporate ships surrounded your vessel.

One of them opened a transmission. A smooth, calculated voice echoed through the speakers. “Congratulations on your successful return. That gemstone... it belongs to us now. Let’s discuss terms.”

Kael sighed deeply. “So much for the glory.”

The crew braced for the next battle—not with alien entities, but with the cold, calculated greed of humanity. The fight for survival was over, but the fight for the gemstone had just begun.

Chapter 5: The Revolution Begins

You refuse their offer. This gemstone isn’t just a ticket out of poverty; it’s a symbol of the system that keeps billions in chains. With the help of Kael and your crew, you smuggle the gemstone back to Earth, using it to improve the lives of your community.

Word spreads of your success, inspiring others to take the risk. The public portal system becomes a battlefield of hope and greed, as the downtrodden rise against the elite. But as you delve deeper into the dimensions, you uncover troubling truths.

Each delve feels more personal, as if the dimensions themselves are reacting to your presence. Theories about consciousness shaping these worlds take on new weight. The hostile entities seem less like enemies and more like guardians, defending their fragile universes from human intrusion.

Epilogue: Shards of Creation

Your journeys into the dimensions are no longer about survival—they’re about discovery. What are these temporary universes? What role does human consciousness play in their creation and collapse? And most importantly, what happens if humanity pushes too far?

The gemstones hold the key to creation itself, but with every delve, you realize the cost of wielding such power. As you prepare for your next mission, you can’t help but wonder: are you shaping the dimensions, or are they shaping you?

now and let the revolution begin!
