$HODL is the longest-serving and highest paying $BNB reward token in the history of crypto, underpinned by an incredible brand and a complete passive income ecosystem.
#HODL is a passive income ecosystem built on The Binance Smart Chain Network (BSC). Our ground-breaking contract delivers a revolutionary mechanism to #BSC ecosystem: Earn sustainable $BNB and reflections just by holding. Not only that but our token is underpinned by the greatest brand name in crypto and a series of innovative products that our holders can enjoy in order to generate more passive income. At HODL we believe in a future where personal finance is more lucrative, fair, and sustainable for all. HODL is more than a token; it is a platform and community making it easy for anyone to make money by investing in cryptocurrency. Our innovative ecosystem and initiatives are strategically chosen to ensure sustainable income for our holders. Here are some of the key features of our ecosystem:
$BNB rewards

Reflections

Reward stacking

Sustainable reward pool

Automatic LP generation

Manual and automated token burns

Anti-dump mechanism

Anti-flip mechanism

Tax-free tokens when reinvesting

Upgradable proxy contract

Market-leading brand

Advanced dashboard

Innovative products and utility

NFTs sales revenue

NFT staking pool

Revenue generation from CEXs

Our own DEX and reward token - HODLX

Gaming and play-to-earn

Betting games with earnings to our reward pool

Burn Lottery

Our own meaningful charity

Tokens worth holding

HODL to earn. Built smart for the future, HODL is a community-driven DeFi project built on the Binance Smart Chain (BSC). HODL is revolutionary and constantly innovating to drive more rewards and value to all holders. It was the first project to reward its holders with BNB and reflections just for holding and has set the record for the biggest payouts of all time. At the heart of $HODL is a highly-innovative smart contract which captures tax revenues from buys, sells and transfers of the token. Our sell bot liquifies these tokens converting them into BNB and then places the funds into the reward pool. By holding $HODL you can collect your share of the reward pool every 7-days and will be sent reflections throughout.

Taxes worth paying

Engineered to be sustainable and taxes you will love with each transaction; be it a buy, sell, or transfer, $HODL collects a 10% tax to fund a $BNB reward pool to sustainably grow its rewards. Our capped reward pool means your rewards are protected even if volume dips, and are amplified in times of growth. As long as you hold, you will be collecting rewards.
5% of the value of all buys is sent to the $BNB reward pool. All holders can access their share of the $BNB reward pool every 7-days!
2% of the value of all buys is sent to holders in the form of $HODL tokens. Reflections are sent continually, so your token balance is constantly growing!
2% of the value of all buys is sent to the PancakeSwap liquidity pool, increasing the price stability and ensuring that anyone who wishes to cash out can access their funds.
1% Burn Lottery. Simply buy 10 Billion or more $HODL Tokens using PancakeSwap or the HODL DEX and you will see your ticket in the official HODL Telegram group! The winning ticket will receive all tokens in the lottery pool, with the remaining 30% burned, making HODL hyper-deflationary!

Investments worth reinvesting

With HODL reward or reinvest options, you have the power to make your rewards work for you; reinvest your rewards into additional $HODL, claim $BNB rewards directly back into your wallet, or request a combination of both - every 7-days.

Reward pool worth sustaining

The BNB reward pool uses an adjustable cap to ensure it is sustainable, safeguarding rewards when volume decreases and creating a sustainable and long-term source of passive income for all holders.

HODLers worth protecting

With the anti-dump mechanism, there is a maximum sell amount of 250B $HODL tokens, per address, per 24 hours in order to reduce the impact of excessive dumps and support the underlying principle of HODLing for maximum gains.

Rewards worth stacking
$HODL Stack is the market-leading reward stacking technology, allowing small investors to stack their rewards to ensure their claims exceed the network costs

Exchange worth farming

HODLX.exchange is a totally decentralized exchange with staking pools and farms where you can stake $HODL, our DEX reward token $HODLX, and earn $HODL, $HODLX, or partner tokens!

NFT’s worth minting

HODLhands are set to turn heads in the NFT space, you'll be able to stake them to earn $HODL/$HODLX, access boosted APRs, access play to earn and more! We also have mythical NFT's that we offer a one time reward for minting.

Performance worth charting

HODLdash.io dedicated dashboard is the best investor dashboard in #DeFi, allowing you to view the performance of your investment, earnings, and key project information!

Games worth playing

HODLgames.net is a simple DeFi Gaming Network integrated into the HODL Ecosystem. We are bringing fresh games in every few weeks and we have only just begun.

Odds worth betting

With HODLbet you can currently enjoy two fun games - coin toss and rangefinder - with bets available in both $HODL and our reward token $HODLX, with fees from gaming, are sent to the $BNB reward pool too! More HODLbet games are coming in the future.

Merchandise worth wearing

During the rise or the fall together we HODL! Encourage others to HODL and spread the word with a conversation starter. HODLstore.io has beautiful merchandise for all HODLers.

Coins worth collecting
-(Sorry, we are currently sold out)- Bronze, silver, or gold? Own a piece of crypto history, earn tokens, and support the community. Each beautiful first-edition physical coin purchase also earns you tax-free HODLtokens, from $2K - $10K. All funds raised support the project and the BNB rewards pools for all HODLers.

Charity worth supporting

HODLforward's mission is to help feed those in need by leveraging $HODL's passive income generation. At its heart, HODL is about community. Our rewards are rooted in the actions and choices of our community members. HODLforward is the way we can share and give back to an even larger community in need. HODL is here to stay; we built our token to bring the benefits of the blockchain and passive income to the masses. The longevity, growth, and security of our HODLers investments are at the core of all the choices we make.

Why Buy Into The HODL Ecosystem

Share:

Why Buy HODL?  What makes us stand out in the Decentralized Finance (DeFi) cryptocurrency space?

HODL Token was created to operate on the Binance Smart Chain (BSC) Network over a year ago in May of 2021 as a dual-reward system offering both BNB rewards and reflections to its investors (HODLers).  It was simple and straightforward but has evolved into an amazing ecosystem with a multitude of opportunities to earn passive income.

Over the past year, the growth and accomplishments of HODL have been astounding.  There have been very successful changes in development and ownership.  This has enabled progression into our third contract which happens to be a proxy contract.  This will allow certain aspects and needs to be modified without creating a new immutable contract, meaning the need for migration is no longer an issue.  Migrating, airdrops and mass confusion tend to shroud growth when it comes to moving to a new contract within a cryptocurrency project.  HODL has solved those issues.

Team members are Doxxed and can be found on the website portal. This means there are photos, names, and some personal information about ownership and support within our HODL project. Most projects hide behind anonymity and mystery, but HODL has chosen to be open, honest, and transparent.  The team at HODL is proud of who they are!

HODL’s ecosystem and newly created Decentralized Exchange (HODLX “the simple” DEX) currently supports both HODL and HODLX project tokens and provides its own Yield Farming, Staking, HODL Hand NFTs, games, BNB earned rewards and reflection earnings.  A quick review of the roadmap on hodltoken.net shows that more development and forward progression is imminent.

HODL is listed on various Centralized Exchanges, also Coin Market Cap, CoinGecko, etc.

HODL is on a multitude of social media platforms including Telegram, Facebook, Twitter, Discord, Instagram, and YouTube, and is always looking to expand. The main telegram group contains over 15,000 members and a BSC network search shows an excess of 26,000 wallets, which are referred to as HODLers or HODL Investors.  All-around membership continues to grow across its platforms.

How to Deal With Uncertainty in the Notoriously Volatile Crypto Space

Share:

Investing in crypto is a little like getting on a roller coaster with a blindfold on—plenty of unforeseen ups and downs make the ride exciting and scary at the same time. With crypto, however, real money is at stake, which can make the downs far more frightening than a sudden plunge on an amusement park ride.

So, for those of us who believe crypto is here to stay (both as a practical, digital currency format and as an investment vehicle), how can we invest wisely, without fear, and in a way that is sustainable? Most of this comes down to using diversification, planning/automation, and longer time horizons in order to remove emotion from the equation.

Spoiler alert—the ideas in this article probably won’t appeal to risk-hungry swing traders or those aiming to time the market and cash in on a lump-sum investment that directly precedes a moonshot.

Diversification

Diversification is a broad term, and it means different things in different investment circles. Here, we’re talking about diversification within an investor’s crypto portfolio specifically.

But, before we dive into that, it’s worth mentioning that even though it seems highly likely that crypto is here to stay (after all, hundreds of governments, businesses, celebrities, and even professional fund managers have bought into the scene), it is never wise to put all of your eggs in a single basket—especially when thinking about retirement. So, before diversifying your crypto portfolio, be sure that your savings include other asset classes (e.g., cash, stocks, fixed-income investments, real estate, etc.) as well.

Now, back to crypto—as we all know, new coins and projects emerge all the time, and for every few that launch skyward, there are countless others that plummet into obscurity and never end up grabbing much market share.

So, first and foremost, investors interested in long-term growth should make sure they have exposure not just to many different coins, but to many different kinds of coins. Let’s take a look at a hypothetical, well-diversified crypto portfolio:
30% large-cap, mainstream currencies (e.g., Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, etc.)
20% native tokens for popular platforms (e.g., Binance Coin)
20% small and mid-cap coins with good use cases that you believe in (your choice)
10% interest-earning stablecoins (e.g., USDCoin, [fill in the blank], etc.)
10% staking rewards coins (e.g., Cardano, Polkadot, etc.)
10% passive income coins (e.g., HODL token)

A great way to hedge against inflation is to buy

HODL
and stake it on the

HODLX
exchange. You can stake your HODL to earn a high yield interest in the form of HODLX tokens. You can use those earned tokens to stake, sell, or a combination of both. It’s a great strategy to make your tokens work for you to earn even more.

With a well-diversified crypto portfolio, you can cash in on massive price surges in the major coins while also collecting staking rewards, reflections, interest, and other income by holding income-oriented coins during lulls and downtime. You can also dedicate a portion of your portfolio to projects you really love and believe in. If they blow up, so will a portion of your portfolio!

Just as important, if one sector of your portfolio plummets, you won’t lose it all. Big coins like BTC and ETH are good safety bets since they are well known, have large user bases, and are highly liquid and thus easy to trade. Coins that allow you to earn by holding—whether through staking, interest, or reflections, can also help offset temporary losses you may incur if some of the tokens in your portfolio lose value quickly.

Planning and Automation

Everyone needs enough money for their day-to-day and month-to-month expenses, and many of us like to have some extra cash on hand for emergencies. That’s just good planning. This money is not for investing in crypto.

Your crypto investment funds should come out of any discretionary income you have after expenses, emergency fund contributions, spending money, and savings. So, let’s say you have an extra $100 a month and you want to invest it in crypto. The best way to do this as a long-term growth-oriented investor is to use dollar-cost averaging to automate your investments and avoid emotional decisions.

Watching the crypto market is stressful, and emotion-based moves like panic selling and FOMO buying have decimated the portfolios of many starry-eyed DeFi enthusiasts. Instead of reacting rashly to every Elon Musk tweet or viral Reddit post on r/crypto, consider turning a blind eye to the news and sticking to a plan.

First, design your portfolio. You can use the allocation example above and then change out categories and percentages to fit your goals and preferences. Figure what percentage of your portfolio you would like to have allocated to each coin you’re interested in. Set up automatic investments on your app/platform of choice, and invest the same amount every month (or every week) in the same coins at the same proportions. This way, you’ll buy more of each asset when it’s cheaper and less of each asset when it’s more expensive.

If you trust your portfolio in the long term, dollar-cost averaging is a great way to avoid letting short-term price swings convince you to kick your well-laid plans to the curb and make an emotional trading decision.

Longer Time Horizons

No one knows when or how quickly any particular crypto asset is going to go up in value, but as the crypto space gains more and more traction in mainstream finance, most believe that higher highs are on the horizon. Cathie Wood, manager of Ark Invest, predicts that Bitcoin could hit $1 million by 2030. Whatever the case may be, digital currency is useful, and the blockchain has countless applications both inside and outside of the realms of finance, so the realm of DeFi technology probably isn’t going away any time soon.

That being said, it can take a long time for an investment to pay off. How long? When it comes to crypto, we don’t really have enough historical data to make predictions with any degree of certainty. That’s why hanging in there for the long haul is likely your best bet in terms of solid gains. The more people and companies adopt crypto, the more a well-diversified crypto portfolio is likely to appreciate in value.

Getting rich quick by dumping one’s life savings into a single project could be the thrill of a lifetime, but if you’re not looking to lay your livelihood on the line for a minuscule chance of a lottery-like payoff, the best way to get in on the action is probably to balance risk with reward, keep emotions out of the equation, and hang in there for the long haul. Keep adding to your positions, stay informed, add or remove projects and tokens from your bullpen as needed, and watch your digital savings grow slowly but surely. Good luck!

How to Dollar Cost Average (DCA)

Share:

How To Dollar Cost Average (DCA) With Crypto

DCA is a less demanding and time-consuming tool for investing slowly and consistently. In other words, it will prevent any negative effect on an investment caused by short-term market instability. The goal is to take advantage of the downturns without compromising too much capital at once.

How DCA Works

With dollar-cost averaging, first, you will determine the total quantity you are expecting to invest, along with your preferred investment product(s) — stocks, crypto, commodities, etc. Afterward, instead of investing a significant amount of money all at once, you will fund it in smaller equal installments over a specific period.

Once set up, your profit will happen automatically, regardless of asset price or activity in the market. If the cost of an investment drops when you are dollar-cost averaging, you will probably get some earnings if the price moves back up.

On the other hand, committing to dollar-cost averaging means that, sometimes, you’ll be investing when the market or a particular asset has lowered in value. Suppose you choose to buy when the others are selling; a DCA strategy can potentially help you obtain the benefits of buying low and selling high, especially if you’re not a professional market watcher.

How do you use DCA in crypto?

It is essential to know that cryptocurrencies can be pretty volatile, even more than stocks. That being said, using DCA for crypto can be a suitable method. Summing up, this strategy will establish an order for a regular acquisition on a cryptocurrency exchange.

Even if you just entered the crypto market, you comprehend that you can generate a potentially greater profit from buying during dips and selling at the top. But, this approach also comes with greater risks and instability.

There’s overall unanimity that DCA is a safer primary method. It has lower risks and lower rewards but still offers the chance of profiting from market swings. So, if you want a relatively safe form of benefiting from crypto’s volatility, a dollar-cost averaging strategy is worth considering. You can also use this methodology for Ethereum, Binance coin, Ripple, etc.

For example, suppose you choose to invest a fixed amount of $150. If you spend $150 to buy a fraction of Bitcoin in your first month and keep investing that same number monthly; you will notice that it will be possible to purchase more Bitcoins during some months because of price volatility.

Another essential factor is to dedicate some time to research and analyze the proper asset to invest in. The Dollar-cost averaging only works when you keep funding one particular crypto.

A Brief History of the Word HODL

Share:
"HODL," is a term repeatedly used in the cryptocurrency world, created years ago from a typo. It's also typically come to stand for "hold on for dear life" among crypto investors.

Cryptocurrency is a kind of digital currency backed by blockchain technology. It works as a form of dealings and can also be kept as an asset or investment. The main feature and advantage of cryptocurrency is decentralization since it is not administered by a unique central source such as a country's central bank. Some examples of cryptocurrencies are Bitcoin, Ethereum, Ripple, etc.
2013 was a big year for Bitcoin. The price rushed from $15 in January of that year to over $1,100 at the beginning of December, which gave a return of 7,230%. In addition to it, in that same month, a drunken user posted an entry titled "I AM HODLING" in a bitcoin forum; the post was loaded with typos and phrases in all caps.

Take a look at the original post:
"I AM HODLING"
"I type d that tyitle twice because I knew it was wrong the first time. Still wrong. w/e," WHY AM I HOLDING? I'LL TELL YOU WHY, It's because I'm a bad trader and I KNOW I'M A BAD TRADER. Yeah you good traders can spot the highs and the lows pit pat piffy wing wong wang just like that and make a millino bucks sure no problem bro."

GameKyuubi
was the author.

The typo "HODL" started to circulate between the crypto community and soon became the internet slang to point out when a person holds bitcoin rather than sells it. Later, the term was extended to include other cryptocurrencies.
"Hodling" became some of the most popular cryptocurrency slang and also served as an uncomplicated strategy for traders, given the volatile essence of the crypto market. This method enables investors to avoid the loss from the short-term volatility of cryptocurrencies and gain returns from long-term value growth. Although the "hodling" part is theoretically less risky than trading, investors still need to evaluate the risk of laws and regulation changes and the public's viewpoint.

For cryptocurrency extremists, HODL symbolizes more than a method for escape from FUD (Fear, Uncertainty, and Doubt), FOMO (Fear of Missing Out), and other profit-eroding feelings. Long-term crypto HODLers remain loyal to it because they think that cryptocurrencies will someday substitute government-related currencies as the foundation of all economic systems.

Keanu Reeves – “I have a little HODL”

Share:

You've probably heard about NFTs and have an opinion about them, but if not, here is a quick explanation; the non-fungible tokens allow users to possess rare digital artifacts through the blockchain network that supports cryptocurrencies.

During a recent interview with The Verge, the Canadian actor Keanu Reeves expressed some disbelief about non-fungible tokens (NFTs) while discussing the upcoming Matrix NFTs from Warner Bros.

Warner Bros. Pictures has been engaged in the crypto area, launching a series of 100,000 NFTs to promote the movie's launch in November. The NFTs are Matrix-themed avatars, and they are being sold for $50 per token. Each one gives the holders the chance to choose between taking the red or blue pill, mirroring one of the film's most significant moments.
"I have a little HODL." - Keanu Reeves

It all began when Alex Heath asked the actors if any of them was "into cryptocurrency personally," and Keanu said a friend bought him some a while ago, but he hasn't used it yet. The interviewer explained that this action is called a HODL, and Reeves replied, "I have a little HODL." The actor also expressed his thoughts about NFTs, pointing out that even though they cannot be copied, someone can easily reproduce them.

He is not against decentralized technologies like crypto or metaverse, but thinks that Facebook did not come up with the concept. He says that the whole idea is way older. As a matter of fact, the term "metaverse" was initially created back in the 1990s in a piece by Neal Stephenson called "Snow Crash."

The road to our upgradable contract

Share:

Phase 1 was migrating from V1 to HODL 2.0. This was done by the previous developer in an effort to upgrade certain things on the contract. It was announced to the community that migration would be open for only 3 days. When the 3 day time period ended, the previous developer generously opened migration for another 3 months then he decided to close the migration since it was a security risk staying open any longer after sufficient time had been given.

After migration closed 3 months later, an offer was made to give HODL 2.0, the new contract, to the current team under the leadership of the newly appointed CEO Jeff Gilden in exchange for keeping the V1 contract and all of its liquidity, holders, code, and everything to do with HODL V1. HODL V1 still existed at the time with it’s own liquidity, own holders, own trading pairs and everything that a live project has to make it function. This was and is the property and under the ownership of the previous developer. HODL 2.0 shifted to the new team. HODL V1 stayed with the current developer. The team that took over HODL 2.0 had no access to version 1 or anything tied to it since it was still owned by the previous developer.

After a month or so had passed, the new HODL team and leadership decided to embark on creating a new proxy contract that would protect its holders from any exploits or individuals trying to harm the project. With this migration, trading was stopped and every holder of HODL 2.0, was automatically migrated to the hew contract HODL leaving no one behind like the previous developer did. We saw this migration as a necessary step towards the thriving future of HODL which will become the #1 brand in DeFi.

The Contract Team was formed to further optimize the functions of the contract and to integrate innovative new technologies both now and in the future. The purpose of this team is to identify and strengthen areas of weakness within the contract and optimize functions leading to a potentially higher ROI for investors.

As we see projects crumbling around us, we will HODL and emerge to become the strongest organization crypto has ever seen. Bare with us through these times of evolution for our project becoming stronger and stronger claiming our name in history.
#HODL #HODLtoken #HoldOnForDearLife

$HODL Claim Process for Users who Left Tokens on WhiteBit, LBank, Azbit, Coinstore, LATOKEN Exchanges

Share:
$HODL token was delisted from centralized exchanges (CEXs) in 2023 to focus on decentralized exchanges (DEXs). We are now sharing reminders with users to claim any tokens they left on the CEXs and are offering a 3-month support window to recover any tokens left on these exchanges.
$HODL Token is the market-leading BNB reward token, with on-chain taxes and revenues from products and services feeding a central BNB reward pool. In 2023, the HODL team decided to delist from CEXs to ensure all transactions occur on-chain with the fullest transparency.

WhiteBit:
0x33Eac50b7fAf4B8842A621d0475335693F5D21fe

LBank:
0x124D9BF2fecBc16b54eC4AcCdB14D44C2144f012

Azbit:
0x4687c20DaB611dd2629B6623376060954a3BeA91

Coinstore:
0x20664cacdcfeb318C8e145a03C75e34bc2CC4A3b

LATOKEN:
0xAbdFd1cf11F574FBD2Ae65F76C14E981e55Bb8cE

Please note:

The window to claim any tokens left on CEXs will run for 90 days, ending September 23, 2024. After this point, no tokens that have not been claimed can be recovered.

WEEKLY ROUNDUP (Jun 10–16, 2024)

Share:

Hello HODL Community! It’s been another busy week focused on play-to-earn and optimizing our listings. Here's a summary of our recent activities:

Weekly Highlights

Trending on DexScreener and Crypto.com

We trended 1st on @dexscreener and 3rd on Crypto.com, showcasing our growing popularity and strong community support.

AMA on Binance Live

We have booked an AMA hosted on Binance Live. Stay tuned for the details and get ready to participate!

Transaction Fee Upgrade

Upgraded our systems to lower transaction fees, making it more cost-effective for our community to trade $HODL.

CoinScope Listing Update

Requested an update to our listing on CoinScope to ensure the latest information is available.

Closing Old Telegram Group

We closed our old v1 Telegram group to streamline our communication channels.

Circulating Supply on CoinGecko

CoinGecko now lists our circulating supply, providing more transparency for our investors.

Play-to-Earn Game Testing

Continued testing of our play-to-earn games to ensure a seamless and enjoyable user experience.

Support for Scammed Community Member

Supported a community member who was scammed, reinforcing our commitment to protecting our users.

Updated CoinGecko Listing Info

Updated our CoinGecko listing info to reflect the latest data and developments.

New Supply API Endpoints

Created new supply API endpoints to provide real-time supply data.

Updated CoinMarketCap Listing

Updated our CoinMarketCap listing to ensure accurate and up-to-date information.

Circulating Supply Submission to CMC

Submitted our circulating supply to CoinMarketCap for verification and display.

Website Team Update

Updated the team section on our website to introduce new members and highlight their contributions.

Instagram Verification

Applied for verification on Instagram to enhance our social media credibility.

Play-to-Earn Page Update

Updated our play-to-earn page with the latest game details and features.

Gem Fighter Listing Request

Requested the listing of Gem Fighter on CoinGecko, expanding our game's reach.

Certified Update Request

Submitted a certified update request to ensure our listings are verified and optimized.

GeckoTerminal Update Request

Requested an update on GeckoTerminal for more accurate tracking of our token.

CoinScope KYC

Booked a KYC verification on CoinScope to boost our credibility and trustworthiness.

Advertisements

Ran targeted adverts on CoinMarketCap and X to increase visibility and attract new users.

Strategic Raids

Conducted strategic raids with our community and team to amplify our presence.

Content and Social Media

Published last week's roundup, a new CoinMarketCap article, new Medium articles, and an updated blog post on our website. Additionally, we maintained a substantial volume of social media posts to keep our community engaged and informed.

Looking Ahead

We have completed our play-to-earn gaming and are gearing up to market it extensively! We're finalizing all $HODL listings on platforms like CoinGecko and CMC. Next, we'll focus on launching the HODL app for iOS and completing Gem Fighter as we ramp up our marketing efforts.

Stay connected and keep HODLing!

Weekly Roundup (June 3–9, 2024)

Share:

Hello HODL Community! We’re excited to share our latest updates and achievements with you. Here’s a comprehensive look at what we’ve accomplished together over the past week:

Weekly Highlights

Coin Catcher Play-to-Earn Game Launch

This week, we launched the Coin Catcher Play-to-Earn game, adding a new and thrilling dimension to the HODL ecosystem. Players can now dive into this exciting game and start catching coins to earn rewards. Check it out on our website and start playing today!

Successful Market-Making Fundraising

We are thrilled to announce that we successfully raised additional funds for our market-making initiative. This boost will significantly enhance our market stability and liquidity, ensuring a robust and dynamic trading environment for the HODL community.

Conclusion of Moonshot Season 1

Moonshot season 1 has come to a successful conclusion, and we have distributed prizes to our well-deserving winners. Congratulations to all participants for their dedication and efforts. Your contributions make the HODL community vibrant and competitive!

Kickoff of Moonshot P2E Season 2

We have kicked off Moonshot P2E season 2, introducing fresh challenges and exciting rewards. This new season promises even more fun and competition. Join us and compete for amazing prizes!

Week-Long Community Q&A Session

We conducted a week-long community Q&A session, fostering engagement and transparency within our community. Your questions and feedback are invaluable to us, and we appreciate your active participation. Let’s keep the conversation going!

New Play-to-Earn Videos

To enhance the user experience, we added four new Play-to-Earn (P2E) videos to our website. These videos provide detailed insights into our games and help new users get started. Be sure to check them out and share your thoughts!

Gameplay Videos on YouTube

We published four new gameplay videos on our YouTube channel, showcasing the latest developments and exciting features of our games. These videos highlight the fun and engaging aspects of our ecosystem. Watch them now and see the action for yourself!

Productive Discussions with Biconomy

This week, we engaged in productive discussions with Biconomy about their incubation program. We are exploring potential collaborations that could bring additional value to our community. Stay tuned for updates on this exciting development!

CoinTopList Application

We have submitted an application for listing on CoinTopList. This move aims to increase our visibility and attract more investors to the HODL community. Fingers crossed for a successful listing!

Market-Making Bots Upgrade

Our market-making bots received significant upgrades this week, improving their performance and ensuring better market efficiency. These enhancements will contribute to a smoother and more reliable trading experience for all users.

Website Stats Update

We updated critical stats on our website, including market cap, liquidity pool, and the number of holders. Keeping our community informed with the latest data is essential, so be sure to check out the updated stats on our site.

Marketing Updates and Community Contributions

We shared important marketing updates and outlined ways the community can contribute to our growth. Your involvement is crucial to our success, and we appreciate all the support and contributions from our dedicated members.

HODL PFP Competition Prizes

Prizes for the HODL PFP competition were distributed this week, rewarding the creativity and participation of our community members. Congratulations to all the winners and thank you for your fantastic entries!

Targeted Ads on CoinMarketCap and X

We ran targeted ads on CoinMarketCap and X to boost our visibility and attract new members to the HODL community. A warm welcome to all our new members!

Strategic Raids

We organized strategic raids with our community and team to amplify our presence and spread the word about HODL. Your active participation made a significant impact. Thank you for your support!

Previous Week's Roundup

We published the previous week's roundup to keep everyone informed about our ongoing activities and achievements. Stay up to date with all the latest news by checking out our roundups.

CoinMarketCap Article Release

This week, we released a new article on CoinMarketCap, highlighting our recent progress and future plans. Be sure to read it to stay informed about what’s happening at HODL!

New Medium Articles

We published new articles on Medium, providing deeper insights into our projects and the broader crypto landscape. These articles are a great resource for understanding our vision and goals. Don’t miss out!

Blog Update on HODL Website

Our blog on the HODL website was updated with fresh content, keeping our community engaged and informed. Make sure to visit and catch up on the latest updates!

Enhanced Social Media Presence

We enhanced our social media presence with increased activity and engagement, ensuring our community stays connected and informed. Follow us on all platforms to stay in the loop!

Looking Forward

We’re on the brink of launching our 5th and final Play-to-Earn mini-game, marking a significant milestone for our ecosystem. Additionally, we are working tirelessly to debut our app on the iOS store. We are also raising funds for more robust on-chain market-making for $HODL. As we prepare for the anticipated bull run, we’re amplifying our social media efforts, ads, and AMAs.

Stay tuned for more exciting updates and thank you for being part of the HODL journey!

Introducing Our Four New Play-to-Earn Games! Earn $HODL Tokens While You Play!

Share:

We are thrilled to announce the launch of four brand new play-to-earn games, each designed to bring you an immersive gaming experience while offering the opportunity to earn $HODL tokens. Whether you're a fan of match-3 puzzles, fast-paced action, interstellar adventures, or precision-based gameplay, we have something for everyone. Dive into the details of each game below and discover your next favorite pastime!

Gem Miner: Unearth Hidden Treasures in a Thrilling Match-3 Adventure

Welcome to the enchanting world of Gem Miner! This game invites you to delve deep into a sparkling match-3 journey where aligning gems is your path to hidden treasures. Each successful alignment brings you closer to uncovering the riches buried beneath the surface. Gem Miner combines strategic thinking with exciting gameplay, making it perfect for players of all ages. Ready to start mining and earn $HODL tokens? Embark on your treasure hunt today!

Coin Catcher: Snap Up Crypto Coins and Fill Your Piggy Bank

Step into the fast-paced universe of Coin Catcher! This exhilarating game challenges you to catch flying crypto coins and use power-ups to maximize your score. Each coin you collect fills your digital piggy bank and brings you closer to earning $HODL tokens. Coin Catcher is a game of quick reflexes and strategic power-up use, making it both fun and rewarding. Join the action now and see how many coins you can catch!

Moonshot: Leap Between Planets in a High-Stakes Interstellar Adventure

Prepare for an epic space journey with Moonshot! This game takes you on a high-stakes adventure through the cosmos, where you must leap between planets, harness power-ups, and collect bonuses. Precision and timing are crucial, as one misstep could leave you drifting in space. Moonshot offers a thrilling mix of excitement and challenge, with each successful leap bringing you closer to earning $HODL tokens. Are you ready to master planetary hopping and explore the wonders of the universe?

Crypto Slash: Master Precision and Timing to Slash Digital Coins

Sharpen your skills with Crypto Slash, an action-packed game that tests your precision and timing. Slash through flying digital coins with accuracy and skill to earn $HODL tokens. Each precise slash brings you closer to victory in this fast-paced challenge. Crypto Slash is perfect for gamers who love a test of reflexes and sharp decision-making. Don’t just HODL – slash your way to the top and prove your prowess!

Join the Adventure and Start Earning $HODL Tokens Today!

Our new play-to-earn games offer something for every type of gamer, blending fun and engagement with the exciting opportunity to earn $HODL tokens. Whether you’re aligning gems, catching coins, leaping between planets, or slicing through digital currencies, these games promise hours of entertainment and rewards.

Visit our

Play-to-Earn Ecosystem
to start your adventure today. Be part of the future of gaming with our innovative new releases and see how rewarding gaming can be!

We hope you enjoy these games as much as we enjoyed creating them. Happy gaming!

Unlock the Treasures with Gem Miner: The Latest Play-to-Earn Adventure

Share:

The world of gaming is constantly evolving, and with the rise of blockchain technology, players can now earn real-world rewards through their virtual endeavors. Enter

Gem Miner
, the newest addition to the HODL gaming family, designed to captivate players with its thrilling match-3 gameplay and the promise of $HODL tokens.

What is Gem Miner?

Gem Miner is an engaging match-3 game where players dive deep into a sparkling underground world, aligning gems to unearth treasures. Each successful alignment brings players closer to valuable $HODL tokens, making every move in the game not only fun but rewarding. This game stands out as our third mini-game release, reinforcing HODL's commitment to delivering innovative and enjoyable gaming experiences.

How to Get Started

Getting started with Gem Miner is simple and user-friendly. Here are the steps to begin your mining adventure:
1.

Visit the Official Website
: Head over to
https://hodltoken.net/play-to-earn
.
2.

Connect Your Wallet
: Ensure your wallet is connected to seamlessly earn and receive $HODL tokens.
3.

Choose Your Mode
: Players can opt for Free-play mode for casual gaming or enter Easy mode to compete for real $HODL token prizes.

By following these steps, you can jump right into the action and start earning rewards from your very first match.

Understanding Play-to-Earn (P2E)

The concept of Play-to-Earn (P2E) is revolutionizing the gaming industry. Unlike traditional gaming, where players invest time and sometimes money without tangible returns, P2E games reward players with digital assets, often in the form of cryptocurrency or NFTs (Non-Fungible Tokens). These digital rewards can be traded, sold, or held as investments, providing real-world value for in-game achievements.

In the case of Gem Miner, players earn $HODL tokens through gameplay. These tokens can be used within the HODL ecosystem, traded on various exchanges, or held as part of an investment portfolio. This model not only enhances the gaming experience but also provides financial incentives for players, making gaming more rewarding than ever before.

Why Choose Gem Miner?

Gem Miner isn't just another match-3 game; it's an opportunity to combine entertainment with financial rewards. Here’s why you should dive into this exciting new game:
-

Engaging Gameplay
: The match-3 genre is beloved by many for its simplicity and addictive nature. Gem Miner takes this to the next level with stunning visuals and immersive mechanics.
-

Real Rewards
: With the chance to earn $HODL tokens, your time spent playing translates directly into potential financial gains.
-

Community and Support
: Join a vibrant community of players and enthusiasts. Connect, compete, and collaborate to maximize your gaming and earning potential.

Join the Community

To fully experience the benefits of Gem Miner and stay updated with the latest news and events, join the HODL community. Connect with fellow players, participate in discussions, and be part of an exciting and growing ecosystem.

Join the Community on Telegram over at
http://hodltoken.net/telegram

Conclusion

Gem Miner represents the future of gaming, where fun and financial rewards go hand in hand. By blending engaging gameplay with the innovative Play-to-Earn model, HODL has created a platform that not only entertains but also empowers its players. Start your gem mining adventure today and discover the treasures that await!

Visit
https://hodltoken.net/play-to-earn
to begin your journey. Happy mining!

WEEKLY ROUNDUP (May 20–26, 2024)

Share:

Another busy week for the HODL team as we tackle multiple fronts simultaneously:

Key Achievements

Development and Upgrades

P2E API Enhancements:

We delivered significant upgrades to our Play-to-Earn (P2E) API, ensuring a smoother and more efficient experience for users.

New Game Completion:

We completed our next P2E game, which is set to launch soon.

Telegram Bot Upgrades:

Upgraded the P2E score bots and updated the $HODL buy bot in our Telegram group.

Marketing and Promotions

CoinMarketCap Ad Campaigns:

Ran several ad campaigns on CoinMarketCap, totaling 70k ads, boosting our visibility.

CoinGecko Fixes:

Addressed and fixed issues with the $HODL page on CoinGecko.

AMA with Elite Crypto Lounge:

Booked and promoted an AMA session, engaging with our community and sharing insights.

Competition Win:

Won a CoinMarketCap competition for 200k ads (tier 2), which will further enhance our reach.

Community Engagement

AMA Recording:

Shared the recording of the AMA across all platforms for those who missed the live session.

Social Media Raids:

Organized and executed social media raids with our army and community, increasing our online presence.

Support for Scammed Member:

Assisted a scammed community member in recovering their tokens, reinforcing our commitment to community support.

Telegram Verification:

Our official Telegram channel received the blue checkmark verification.

Profile Pic Competition:

Ran a profile picture competition within our community, encouraging engagement and creativity.

Competition Winners:

Announced the winners of recent competitions and distributed prizes.

Profile Bios on X:

Added two more complete bios to our profiles on X, enhancing our team's visibility.

Elite Lounge Q&A:

Delivered over 20 Q&A answers in the Elite Crypto Lounge Telegram chat, engaging directly with our audience.

Paid Ads on X:

Continued running paid ads on X to maintain high visibility.

Publications and Outreach

Press Releases:

Published another press release to keep the broader crypto community informed of our progress.

Telegram Promotions:

Had $HODL promoted in 10 call groups on Telegram, expanding our reach.

Last Roundup Published:

Ensured the previous roundup was widely shared.

Content Across Platforms:

Posted a CoinMarketCap article, published new Medium articles, and updated the blog on our website.

Social Media Activity:

Maintained a substantial volume of social media posts to keep our community engaged and informed.

Looking Ahead

As we look forward, our plans include rolling out another P2E game shortly and completing all five P2E games during June. Following this, we will turn our attention to the highly anticipated Gem Fighter game. Alongside these developments, we will continue our vigorous marketing efforts, delivering AMAs, conducting social media raids, and working tirelessly to get the HODL app into the iOS store.

Thank you for your continued support and engagement. Stay tuned for more updates and exciting developments!

HODL Introduces Moonshot: The First Play-to-Earn Game in Its Ecosystem

Share:

HODL, a leader in innovative DeFi solutions, has expanded its ecosystem with the launch of its first play-to-earn (P2E) game, Moonshot. This new addition offers users an exciting way to engage with the project and earn rewards, marking a significant milestone for the HODL community.

Moonshot invites players on an interstellar journey, where they can navigate between planets, harness power-ups, and collect bonuses. With 100 billion HODL tokens available as rewards throughout May, players can enjoy both thrilling gameplay and lucrative earnings.
"We're excited to unveil Moonshot as the inaugural P2E game in the HODL ecosystem," says the HODL CEO. "This launch is a major step forward in our mission to provide diverse earning opportunities and foster greater community engagement."

Players can dive into the action by visiting the official HODL website and connecting their wallets. Moonshot features two modes: free-play mode and Easy mode. In Easy mode, players compete for high scores on the leaderboard, with prizes airdropped at the end of May.

To participate in Moonshot and future P2E games, users need energy, which is required for games with prizes. Energy can be obtained by holding HODL Hands NFTs, or purchased using BNB, HODL, and HODLX tokens. Additionally, free energy can be earned in the free-play mode, enhancing accessibility for all users.

The launch of Moonshot marks the beginning of HODL's P2E gaming initiative. Over the coming weeks, new levels and monthly prizes will be introduced, keeping the excitement alive. Upcoming game titles include Gem Miner, Crypto Slash, Solitaire, and Coin Catcher, along with the studio-scale game Gem Fighter, offering endless battles and fun.
"We're dedicated to creating a groundbreaking P2E ecosystem that entertains and empowers our community," adds the HODL CEO. "Revenue from play-to-earn games will support the reward pool for $HODL token investors and fund further development of our ecosystem. With Moonshot leading the way, we're excited to revolutionize the interaction between users and DeFi projects."

Visit the Play-to-Earn section on the HODL website to start your gaming and earning journey!

Celebrating Three Years of $HODL: Leading the Way in Income Generation on the Binance Smart Chain

Share:

Since its launch on May 12, 2021, $HODL has revolutionized income generation in the cryptocurrency space, marking a significant milestone with its third anniversary. This innovative token offers investors the opportunity to earn rewards and reflections simply by holding their tokens.
"We are excited to celebrate this milestone," states the CEO of HODL. "It reflects our continuous innovation and vision. After three years of progress, we are eager for the future. This anniversary signifies our journey and dedication to transforming decentralized finance on the Binance Smart Chain (BSC). As we commemorate this occasion, we reaffirm our commitment to driving innovation and prosperity in the crypto world, providing an alternative to traditional savings and pioneering new paths in the crypto landscape."

To mark this anniversary, $HODL is launching exclusive community promotions and introducing new play-to-earn games.

As a trailblazer in decentralized finance (DeFi), $HODL offers a unique approach to earning rewards. Since its inception, the project has distributed over 20,200 BNB (valued at approximately $12,014,900 at the current price of $595 per BNB) in rewards. The $HODL ecosystem includes $HODL and $HODLX project tokens, yield farming, staking, and NFTs such as HODL Hands and Gem Fighter, all within a deflationary supply framework.

The $HODL app is now available on Android, with iOS compatibility on the way. Investors can claim their rewards through the app, with bonuses for reinvesting. With liquidity locked for over 250 years, $HODL is committed to being a perpetual project.
$HODL's earning model operates on a transaction tax, where each buy, sell, and transfer incurs a 5% tax. This tax is divided, with 4% going to a reward pool for investors and 1% distributed as $HODL reflections to holders. Additional revenue streams come from play-to-earn gaming, NFT sales, and fees from swaps and staking on the DeFi Hub.

Embodying its namesake, "hold on for dear life" (HODL), $HODL stands for the resilience and conviction of long-term investors.

The success of $HODL is highlighted by achieving an all-time high of $230 million Market Cap, showcasing the growing community and value proposition of the project.

WEEKLY ROUNDUP (May 6–19, 2024)

Share:

Over the past two weeks, we’ve been hard at work making significant strides in both our project development and marketing efforts. Here’s a detailed look at what we’ve accomplished:

Project Developments

Verification on X

One of the major highlights was achieving verified status as an organization on X. This verification adds credibility to our project and helps us reach a broader audience more effectively. In addition to this, X are giving away the ad credit to the same amount as the monthly subcription!

Play-to-Earn (P2E) Game Upgrades

We’ve rolled out several upgrades and fixes for the Moonshot P2E game, enhancing the gaming experience for our community. Additionally, we launched a new P2E game, Crypto Slash, which has already received positive feedback from players. This puts us at two Play-to-Earn games live with three more to come!

Compliance and Branding

In our continuous effort to ensure compliance and improve our branding, we secured the iOS compliance report from Transak and will be sharing this report with Apple. We also updated the $HODLX branding on BscScan to reflect our evolving identity.

Telegram Enhancements

Our Telegram group saw some exciting updates. We created a bespoke HODL coin emoji, refined the content and timings of our Telegram bot, and launched a new $HODL buy bot to streamline transactions within our community.

Marketing Initiatives

Community Engagement

We coordinated several marketing campaigns with our community, leveraging their enthusiasm and support to drive awareness and engagement. We also celebrated HODL’s 3rd birthday with special promotions on social media and targeted ads.

Advertisement Campaigns

Our advertising efforts included running ads on CoinMarketCap and multiple targeted ad campaigns on X. These ads helped us reach new audiences and keep our existing community informed and engaged.

Press and Publications

We issued three press releases, one of which was featured in Yahoo! Finance, garnering significant attention. Our articles were published on CoinMarketCap, Medium, and our blog, ensuring a wide dissemination of our latest news and updates.

Social Media Activities

We maintained a strong presence across all social media platforms. Key highlights included:

Updating pinned posts with essential information.

Publishing numerous posts to keep our followers updated on the latest developments.

Celebrating our achievements and milestones with our community.

Looking Ahead

With the Apple compliance report now in hand, we are poised to push for our app to go live. Our roadmap includes the introduction of three more Play-to-Earn games, which we believe will significantly enhance our ecosystem. We are also gearing up for the Bull Run, intensifying our marketing and project development efforts to ensure we capitalize on this exciting phase.

The past two weeks have been incredibly productive, and we are excited about the progress we’ve made. Our community’s support and engagement have been invaluable, and we look forward to continuing this journey together. Stay tuned for more updates as we keep building and growing!

Thank you for being a part of the HODL community. Together, we are making great strides towards a bright future!

WEEKLY ROUNDUP (APRIL 22-MAY 5, 2024)

Share:

In this comprehensive roundup covering two weeks, we're thrilled to share the latest developments and milestones achieved within the HODL ecosystem. From intensive Play-to-Earn (P2E) game development to strategic marketing campaigns, here's a glimpse into our recent efforts:

P2E Development and Testing:

Extensive efforts have been dedicated to the development and rigorous testing of our inaugural Play-to-Earn game, marking a monumental step forward for HODL.

Advertising Campaigns:

Strategic advertising campaigns on CoinMarketCap have been launched to amplify our visibility and reach within the crypto community, targeting 200,000 CoinMarketCap users.
iOS App Community Updates:

We've kept our community informed with regular updates on the progress of our iOS app development, ensuring transparency and engagement.

Collaboration with Blockraid:

Working with Blockraid, we've addressed MetaMask warnings to enhance user experience and security. The team at Blockraid did a manual review of our contract and all warnings have been removed.

NFT Pricing Adjustments:

Continuous optimization of NFT pricing on pool contracts ensures fair and competitive offerings for our community.

Communication with Payment Partners:

Ongoing communication with MoonPay and Transak regarding our iOS app to collect the necessary paperwork for our application with the iOS review team.

Resolved LunarCRUSH Issues:

Technical issues on our LunarCRUSH page have been swiftly resolved to maintain accurate and reliable data for our community.

Branding Updates on BscScan:

Branding updates on BscScan reflect our commitment to consistent and cohesive branding across platforms.

Coordination with CMC:

Collaborating with CoinMarketCap, we've addressed price discrepancies to ensure accurate representation of our token price.

Obtained Gold Tick on X:

Achieving the Gold tick on X demonstrates our commitment to transparency and reliability within the crypto space. In addition, we will receive monthly ad credit and boosted presence as a result of this gold tick.

Play-to-Earn Launch:

The highly anticipated launch of our Play-to-Earn game marks a significant milestone, offering our community exciting opportunities for earning and engagement. The first game we've launched is Moonshot and there are 100 Billion $HODL tokens up for grabs!

Deployment of P2E Scorebot:

The deployment and launch of the P2E scorebot in Telegram further enhances the gaming experience and competitiveness within our ecosystem.

Active Social Media Engagement:

We've maintained an active presence across various social media platforms, driving community interaction and amplifying our message to new investors.

Content Publication:

From last week's roundup to articles on CoinMarketCap and Medium, we've continued to disseminate valuable content to keep our community informed and engaged.

Looking Forward:

With significant progress in our ecosystem, including Play-to-Earn gaming, we're poised for exponential growth. As we anticipate the upcoming bull run, we're ramping up our marketing initiatives to raise awareness and attract retail investors to our innovative platform.

Together, let's seize the opportunities ahead and continue to build a brighter future for HODL!

Stay tuned for more updates as we embark on this exciting journey together.

WEEKLY ROUNDUP (APRIL 15-21, 2024)

Share:

As we stride through the ever-evolving landscape of cryptocurrency and blockchain technology, the HODL team remains totally committed to innovation and progress. This past week has been a whirlwind of activity as we diligently prepare to unveil our first

Play-to-Earn
game, marking a significant leap forward for the HODL ecosystem.

Here's a glimpse into our recent endeavors:

Enhanced contract scores:

We've upgraded our QuickIntel page to provide users with full information including social links, KYC report, contract audits and more. This will ensure that platforms such as DEXTools will pull in a higher score from QuickIntel.

Community Engagement:

Continuing our efforts to drive community interaction, we've implemented a social post command feature in our Telegram channel to give investors instant access to a library of hashtags to use in their posts and when we organise raids as a community.

Success in Competition:

We're thrilled to announce our successful participation in the CMC competition, clinching victory in tier 2 and earning a staggering 200k ads, amplifying our visibility and reach. Along with this, our profile picture on CoinMarketCap has been updated to include our badge, boosting our reach and credibility.

Boosted Reward Pool:

In a move to further incentivize our community, we've doubled the reward pool to an impressive $7,500, demonstrating our commitment to rewarding our supporters.

Platform Enhancements:

We've set up and announced the BitMart claim process, paving the way for seamless token claiming and distribution for BitMart holders who left their tokens on the CEX.

Exciting Offers:

To enrich the user experience, we've launched discounts for token to NFT swaps, providing our community with exclusive benefits and opportunities. Save on Gem Fighter and HODL Hands NFTs by swapping your $HODL and $HODLX tokens.

Platform Reviews and Development:

Our dedicated team has conducted a thorough review of offerings on the HODLX platform through an insightful video, ensuring that our platform continues to meet the evolving needs of our users. Additionally, we've made significant strides in the development of our Play-to-Earn platform, laying the groundwork for its imminent launch.

Community Engagement and Outreach:

We've maintained an active presence across social media platforms, engaging in regular raids to connect with our vibrant community and amplify our message. Furthermore, we've continued to disseminate valuable content through various channels, including last week's roundup, articles on CoinMarketCap and Medium, as well as a blog on the HODL website.

Looking Ahead:

With excitement building to a crescendo, our focus for the upcoming week is laser-focused on the launch of our Play-to-Earn version of Moonshot. This landmark event represents a pivotal moment for HODL, ushering in a new era of gaming and revenue generation. After this game is live and tested, we can start rolling out Play-to-Earn for all the games we've built so far!

As we embark on this exhilarating journey, we extend our heartfelt gratitude to our dedicated community for their unwavering support and enthusiasm. Together, we're shaping the future of finance and revolutionizing the world of gaming.

Stay tuned for more updates as we continue to innovate, collaborate, and HODL strong.

HODL Tokens on BitMart - Withdrawal Process

Share:

If you're holding $HODL tokens on BitMart and haven't withdrawn them yet, there's a dedicated process available for you. To initiate the withdrawal process, you'll need to provide evidence of your holdings. Join the dedicated Telegram group at
https://t.me/+-mxqB2Pjfxg0NTU0

Be cautious of scams; we'll never ask you to connect your wallet or send funds. We will simply guide you through a process to provide evidence of your $HODL holdings on BitMart, and we'll facilitate the token transfer.

You have until July 16th, 2024, to claim your $HODL tokens left on BitMart. After this date, any unclaimed $HODL tokens will no longer be recoverable.

WEEKLY ROUNDUP (APRIL 1–7, 2024)

Share:

As April kicks off, the HODL community is buzzing with excitement as we approach the launch of our first Play-to-Earn game - Moonshot. This week, we've made significant progress across various fronts, from app updates to Play-to-Earn ecosystem development, bringing us closer to introducing innovative and lucrative experiences to our users. Let’s dive into the highlights:

Progress in Play-to-Earn and App Development

Play-to-Earn Preparations
: With six games on the horizon, we're on the verge of delivering an exciting gaming experience. This week, we've made strides in

Play-to-Earn

Connect and introduced an 'energy' system, laying the groundwork for immersive P2E gameplay. The first P2E game we're launching is Moonshot!

Energy Token Integration
: We've added the ability for users to buy energy for Play-to-Earn games with tokens - $HODL, $HODLX and BNB, making gaming more accessible and engaging.

App Updates and Store Submission
: Updates to the HODL app as we attempt to overcome the challenges of listing a crypto app with Apple's store. We're on track to submit to app stores, a crucial step in broadening our reach.

Community Engagement and Marketing Initiatives

CMC Marketing Competition
: We've entered a marketing competition on CoinMarketCap, expanding our visibility and reaching a wider audience. It looks like we'll win and claim a large number of impressions for free!

Regular Community Engagement
: Raids across social media platforms and a flurry of posts keep our community engaged and informed.

Content Creation and Outreach

Roundup, Articles, and Blog
: We've shared last week's roundup, published new articles on Medium, and updated our blog, keeping our community in the loop.

Looking Ahead

Excitement mounts as we near the launch of our Play-to-Earn platform, offering both entertainment and earning opportunities. Stay tuned for app updates, enhancing accessibility and engagement.

Here's to a week of progress and anticipation. The journey continues, and we're thrilled to have you with us!

WEEKLY ROUNDUP (MARCH 25–31, 2024)

Share:

In a week full of activity and progress, the HODL community has remained a buzzing hub of engagement, innovation, and advancement. As we wrapped up March 2024, our efforts in community engagement, game development, and finalizing our app for iOS have kept us on an exciting trajectory. Here's a recap of our efforts and a glimpse into what’s next:

Engaging and Expanding Our Reach

Social Media and CoinMarketCap Engagement
: We've successfully maintained a high level of activity across social platforms and CoinMarketCap, amassing millions of views throughout March, a clear testament to our community's enthusiasm.

Enhancing Token Listings
: A comprehensive review of platforms listing our tokens has been conducted, leading to several submissions aimed at enhancing those listings, ensuring broader visibility and accessibility. Put simply, $HODL token is one of the best listed tokens in existance.

Technological Advances and Community Initiatives

Contract Audit and Website Integration
: In our continuous effort to promote transparency, we've added our contract audit details to the HODL website, providing easy access to vital information for our users.

Competition Launch and Prizes
: We sparked community engagement with the launch of a new competition, followed by the prompt announcement and distribution of prizes to the winners.

Innovations in Community Coordination
: The introduction of a new raiding bot on Telegram and the integration of an automated system for tweets have streamlined our communication and engagement strategies.

Raiding Activities
: Our community's presence was strongly felt with numerous raids on X and CoinMarketCap, supported by the integration of a raid commander, marking a strategic push in our engagement efforts.

Development and Collaboration

App Submission and Review with Apple
: After constructive meetings with Apple, we've submitted our iOS app for final review, marking a significant step toward bringing our app to a wider audience.

Game Development
: The development of our Gem Fighter Play-to-Earn game continues, promising an immersive and rewarding experience for our players.

Listing Achievements
: Our listing on Cryptach with an advanced listing highlights our growing presence in the crypto space.

Content Creation and Community Push

Substantial Social Media Posts
: Our commitment to keeping the community informed and engaged has resulted in a substantial volume of social media posts, alongside the publication of last week’s roundup, new Medium articles, and updates on our CoinMarketCap and Birdeye listings.

Looking Ahead

As we eagerly await the iOS app's approval, our focus remains sharp on amplifying our presence on social media and CoinMarketCap, aiming to reach between 50-100k people daily. With the anticipation building towards the launch of our first Play-to-Earn game and the iOS app, we are gearing up for significant celebrations leading up to the BTC halving.

Stay tuned as we continue to make strides in our mission to innovate, engage, and expand. The journey ahead promises exciting developments, and we’re grateful for the robust support of our community.

Weekly Roundup (March 18–24, 2024)

Share:

This week at HODL has been all about making our presence felt across the digital landscape and ensuring our community feels supported and energized. From making significant progress on various fronts to enhancing our Play-to-Earn offerings, here's everything that's been happening:

Community and Promotions

BNB Reward Pool Bot for Telegram
: We've launched a bot on Telegram to show the community how much BNB is available in the reward pool and the pools growth.

Apple Approval Steps Finalized
: We're thrilled to announce that we've finalized the steps required by Apple to get our app live. We're on the brink of bringing a seamless HODL experience to iOS users.

New Challenges in Gem Fighter
: Our Gem Fighter Play-to-Earn game has been upgraded with new enemies, making the battles even more thrilling and rewarding.

CoinMarketCap Milestone
: We've been promoting HODL to users on CoinMarketCap and reached a milestone of over 100,000 impressions this week.

Competitions and Enhancements

Golf Competition Success
: Our golf competition with LakeView was a hit, bringing together our community for some friendly competition and NFT prizes.

Contract and Platform Updates
: We've updated the $HODL contract review on various platforms, ensuring transparency and security for our holders and boosting our rating.

Reward Campaigns and Fixes
: Our reward claim promotion campaign has been a great success, and we quickly addressed a gas issue on the reward claim page, ensuring a smooth experience for everyone.

Reward Pool Expansion
: An additional 2.5T $HODL has been added to the reward pool, significantly increasing the BNB rewards available to our holders.

Visibility and Engagement

Trending on Crypto.com
: We're excited to share that we've trended again on Crypto.com, reflecting the continued interest and enthusiasm for HODL in the crypto community.

DEXView Updates
: Our audit and KYC reports have been added to DEXView, enhancing our project's credibility and transparency.

Content and Social Media Drive
: As always, we've been active on the content front, with the last week's roundup, new articles on Medium, and a substantial volume of social media posts to keep our community informed and engaged.

Looking Ahead

With clear guidance from Apple, we're closer than ever to launching the HODL app on iOS, bringing a new level of access and convenience to our community. As the crypto market heats up, our promotional efforts across key platforms like CoinMarketCap have reached hundreds of thousands, amplifying the buzz around HODL. We've also brought on board a raid commander to lead our community in ramping up the noise and excitement around our project.

Stay tuned for more updates as we continue to build, promote, and support the HODL community. Together, we're making great strides and there's much more on the horizon. Join us in this exciting journey, and let's make the digital world take notice.

WEEKLY ROUNDUP (MAR 11 - MAR 17, 2024)

Share:

I
t's been another whirlwind week at HODL HQ, and we're here to bring you the latest and greatest from our bustling community:

Social Engagement Boost
: Welcomed ShieldBot into our toolkit to amp up social engagement with coordinated raids on X.

Staking Launch
: Rolled out the Stake HODL Hands NFTs, introducing a new way to earn $HODLX through token staking.

Trending on Crypto.com
: $HODL token grabbed the 2nd spot in the trending section, making waves across the crypto community.

NFT Promotion Success
: Our HODL Hands NFT promo saw a fantastic number of mints - thanks for the support!

Competitions Ran
: We ran two competitions to boost engagement and prizes from our $HODL buy competition and HODL meme contest have been distributed to the lucky winners.

Team Expansion
: A new member has joined the HODL family, bringing fresh energy and ideas to propel our project forward.

Token Recovery
: Successfully reclaimed $HODL tokens from an old CEX, marking our full transition to a decentralized platform and recovering trillions of tokens.

Staking Pool Top-Up
: Added $HODLX tokens to the NFT staking pool and refreshed the BNB reward pool with revenue from NFT sales.

Influencer Campaign
: Kicked off an exciting campaign with an X influencer, spreading the word about our project.

Contract Audit Improvements
: Addressed contract audit findings with Honeypot.is to enhance our score on DEXTools and reached out to auditors to improve our ratings.

CMC and Social Push
: Our CMC engagement drives have touched over 25k people, complemented by regular video updates and social media drives.

Marketing Leadership
: Onboarded a dedicated marketing exec to lead X raids and bolster our social presence, laying out a focused marketing strategy.

Collaborations and Listings
: Partnered with a Turkish influencer, updated our DexView listing, and planned a golf tournament with NFT prizes.

App Update
: The HODL app has been updated and resubmitted to iOS, honing in on a live launch.

Content Galore
: Continued to share insights and updates through CoinMarketCap articles, Medium posts, our blog, and a flurry of social media content.

Looking Forward
: We're on the cusp of launching the iOS app, having temporarily restricted trade features to overcome some concerns of Apple. With a host of marketing initiatives underway and big milestones on our roadmap within reach, we're gearing up for the app launch, ramped-up marketing efforts, and the flow of Play-to-Earn revenues.

Let's keep the momentum going, team - the best is yet to come!

WEEKLY ROUNDUP (MAR 4 - MAR 10, 2024)

Share:

This week at HODL has been all about reaching more people and getting our first

Play-to-Earn
game ready. We’ve also been working hard to get our app in the iOS store and overcome some of the challenges of dealing with Apple's review team. Here’s what we’ve been up to and what’s coming up next.

What We Did This Week:
iOS App Update:

We're almost done updating our iOS app for the next submission. We want to make sure everything works great and overcome some of the objections Apple have as a crypto project.

Working with Designers:

Our design team has been busy with new ideas to make our stuff look cooler and work better with projects lined up to develop our brands, social media materials and more.

A New Way to Earn:

We’ve set up another way for you to earn, which we’ll tell you about really soon...

Staying in Touch:

We’ve kept talking to our community with regular updates and fun stuff to do to help reach new people in DeFi and across social media.

Getting Moonshot Ready:

We’ve finished adding Play-to-Earn parts to our game, Moonshot, so playing it can earn you rewards soon once we launch it.

Giving Back:

We shared some of the money made from NFTs (50%) back with our community through buybacks of $HODL and $HODLX, and added more to our prize pools (12% of proceeds).

Competitions and More:

We ran a big competition to get more people buying $HODL, teamed up with a P2E influencer, and planned a Twitter marketing campaign with another influencer.

Looking Ahead:

Now that Moonshot is ready for players to earn while playing, we’re super excited to launch our first Play-to-Earn game! Plus, we’re making a few changes to our app to finally get it on the iOS store.

What’s Next for HODL:

With our new game almost here and the app update on its way, we’re looking forward to welcoming more people to HODL. We’re also focusing on getting the word out there and bringing in new folks to join the fun.

Join the HODL Meme Fest with 10 Prizes up for Grabs!

Share:

As part of our ongoing efforts to engage and unite HODLers everywhere, we're excited to introduce a competition that promises not only to entertain but also to reward the ingenious spirit of our community. This is your chance to turn your crypto knowledge, humor, and artistic talents into winning entries in a fest celebrating the very essence of HODLing.

Prizes Awaits

Prepare to be dazzled by the array of prizes we've curated for the most clever and creative meme lords out there:
3 Gem Fighter NFTs:

Dive into the world of NFTs with these exceptional digital gems, perfect for collectors and enthusiasts alike.
2 HODL Hands NFTs:

Symbolize your commitment to the HODL cause with these unique NFTs, representing our community's strength and unity.
5 prizes of $50 in $HODL tokens:

Boost your crypto holdings and embrace the HODL way with these valuable tokens.

How to Participate and Make Your Mark

The competition is live now and will culminate on Tuesday, March 12, at 5 pm UTC. Following the close, winners will be celebrated across the

HODL on Telegram
and social media platforms, showcasing the vibrant creativity of the HODL community.

To Enter:

Unleash Your Creativity:

Share your most ingenious and amusing HODL memes by engaging with our posts across various channels. Each meme should be paired with a clever caption to enhance its appeal.

Maximize Visibility:

Use the hashtags $HODL and #HODL in your submissions, linking back to our website (
https://hodltoken.net
) to help spread the word and grow our community.

The More, The Merrier:

There's no limit to how many entries you can submit. Each meme is a new chance to win, so keep those memes coming and increase your odds of success.

Tag Us:

If you're making your own posts, remember to tag the official HODL channel on the social platform you're using. This ensures we can find and consider all entries. Here are the qualifying channels:

HODL on X

HODL on Reddit

HODL on YouTube

HODL on Facebook

HODL on Instagram

HODL on CoinMarketCap Community

Why Participate?

The HODL Meme Fest isn't just about laughs and prizes. It's an opportunity for you to contribute to a growing movement, to share in the camaraderie of the crypto world, and to help elevate the HODL project to new heights. Your creativity and participation can inspire others, attract new investors, and strengthen our community.

So, what are you waiting for? Grab your meme-making tools, tap into your inner comic genius, and join us in a celebration of creativity, community, and crypto. Let the HODL Meme Fest begin!

WEEKLY ROUNDUP (FEB 26 - MAR 3, 2024)

Share:

This week at HODL has been nothing short of monumental. With a flurry of activities aimed at enhancing our ecosystem, we’ve pushed the boundaries of innovation and community engagement. Here’s a rundown of our achievements this week and a peek into what’s on the horizon.

This Week’s Highlights:

Innovative Staking Pools Launched:

We’ve developed and launched
four new staking pools
, showcasing our commitment to offering value-driven opportunities to our community.

Gem Fighter Developments:

From developing
token-to-NFT swaps
to advancing game development, we’re setting the stage for an immersive Play-to-Earn experience in Gem Fighter.

Community and Engagement:

We launched three new community groups on X, ran a significant buy competition, and engaged our community through AMAs, driving social engagement to new heights.

Market Presence:

Our efforts bore fruit as we trended No.1 on the Crypto.com Trending page, a testament to our growing influence and the community’s enthusiasm.

Design Milestones:

We completed the Texas HODL'em designs, marking a significant step towards enriching our gaming offerings.

Looking Ahead:

As we continue to make strides in our

Play-to-Earn
offerings and the

Gem Fighter game
, our focus remains sharply on getting the HODL app listed in the iOS store. With the first stages of rolling out Play-to-Earn for our minigames nearing completion and the Gem Fighter game development progressing well, we’re gearing up for an exciting phase of growth and expansion.

Entering the Bull Market:

With a robust ecosystem in place and more innovative projects in the pipeline, we’re entering the bull market with confidence. Our focus will shift towards amplifying engagement with our community and extending our reach to new investors. We’ll be rolling out updates on initiatives where you can lend your support to help HODL reach new audiences and heights.

Join Us on This Journey:

As we navigate these exciting times, we invite you to be part of our story. Whether by participating in our new staking pools, engaging with the Gem Fighter game, or simply staying tuned for our updates, your involvement is pivotal to our collective success.

Stay connected for more updates, and let’s continue to explore the limitless possibilities of the blockchain and Play-to-Earn gaming together.

Together, let’s shape the future of gaming and finance.

Join our communities
