$50k Staking Pools Now Live!

Share:

We are excited to announce the launch of our most ambitious set of staking pools to date, featuring a groundbreaking opportunity: our first-ever "stake NFTs to earn NFTs" pools. This initiative marks a significant milestone in our commitment to innovation and value creation for our community.

Stake HODL Hands NFTs, Earn Gem Fighter NFTs

Reward: 750 Gem Fighter NFTs

Launch:

Today at 8:30 pm UTC

Ends:

August 29, 2024

Fees:

Network fees plus $0.20 per NFT staked and $0.50 per NFT claimed.

Action:

View now and get started!

Stake Gem Fighter NFTs, Earn HODL Hands NFTs

Reward: 120 HODL Hands NFTs

Launch:

Today at 8:30 pm UTC

Ends:

August 29, 2024

Fees:

Network fees plus $0.10 per NFT staked and $1 per NFT claimed.

Action:

View now and get started!

Stake $HODLX, Earn HODL Hands NFTs

Reward: 30 HODL Hands NFTs

Launch:

Today at 8:30 pm UTC

Ends:

August 29, 2024

Fees:

Network fees only.

Action:

View now and get started!

Stake $HODLX, Earn Gem Fighter NFTs

Reward: 100 Gem Fighter NFTs

Launch:

Today at 8:30 pm UTC

Ends:

August 29, 2024

Fees:

Network fees only.

Action:

View now and get started!

Staking offers a fantastic way to leverage your digital assets risk-free. You can easily stake your assets and then unstake them whenever you want to claim your rewards and retrieve your digital assets.

All NFTs earned through these pools will be freshly minted, providing you with the chance to win significant prizes and mint rare NFTs.

These pools not only allow you to earn both Gem Fighter and HODL Hands NFTs, which serve as your ticket to an incredible Play-to-Earn experience with up to $1,000,000 in rewards available for players, but they also play a pivotal role in our broader ecosystem.

Furthermore, a portion of NFT sales will be allocated for the buyback of $HODL and $HODLX tokens. These will be distributed to holders of both HODL Hands and Gem Fighter NFTs over the next six months. We will be disclosing an address today where we store the $HODL and $HODLX accumulated from NFT staking pools, which already contain a significant amount of $HODLX from swap earnings, set to be distributed to our valued community members.

With these rewards and innovations, now is the perfect time to start minting:

Mint HODL Hands NFTs!

Join us as we embark on this exciting journey, offering unprecedented opportunities for our community members to earn, play, and contribute to our growing ecosystem.

WEEKLY ROUNDUP (FEB 19 - FEB 25, 2024)

Share:

This week at HODL, we’ve been focused on expanding our ecosystem, enhancing user experience, and preparing the ground for the next leap forward in our Play-to-Earn journey. From key updates to our Gem Fighter project to significant enhancements across our platform, let’s delve into the milestones reached and the exciting prospects ahead.

Key Highlights of the Week:

Gem Fighter Integration and Listings:

We've successfully liaised with BscScan to add all key information to the Gem Fighter NFT listing, ensuring visibility and accessibility for our community. This step is crucial for the transparency and credibility of our project.

Platform Updates and Enhancements:
$HODL on CoinMarketCap:

Updates have been made, including adding the circulating supply API endpoint, entering the max supply, to provide accurate and up-to-date information to our investors.

Website Revamps:

From homepage content refreshers to various website fixes, we’ve aimed at a seamless user experience. The introduction of a Play-to-Earn earnings wallet and inclusion on the HODL dashboard marks a significant milestone in our commitment to reward our community actively and transparently.

Staking Pools Creation:

We've planned and created new staking pools, set to go live soon with $50,000 in rewards. In addition, the first distributions of Gem Fighter NFT funds marked a pivotal moment for our holders.

Game Development Advances:

Controller Support for Gem Fighter:

Enhancing the gameplay experience by adding controller support, making our game more accessible and enjoyable.

Continuous Development:

The development of new environments for Gem Fighter continues, promising an ever-evolving and engaging gaming experience.

Community and Marketing Initiatives:

We’ve ramped up our efforts to engage with our community and attract new members by setting up the first community for HODL on X and running paid ads to promote our upcoming AMA to celebrate $50,000 of rewards.

Looking Ahead:

The upcoming week is poised to be a game-changer for HODL and our community. We’re launching new and innovative staking pools with $50,000 in rewards, a move aimed at enhancing the value and utility of holding HODL Hands and Gem Fighter NFTs. Marketing for the Gem Fighter NFTs is set to kick off, coinciding with the launch of these staking pools, to maximize exposure and engagement.

Moreover, we’re in the final stages of overcoming the remaining hurdles with Apple, aiming to get our iOS app live, a critical step towards broadening our platform’s reach and usability. Our Play-to-Earn environment and the finalization of poker designs are on the horizon, promising to enrich our ecosystem further and offer more avenues for engagement and earnings to our community.

Stay tuned for more updates, and let’s make the digital world a more rewarding place together.

WEEKLY ROUNDUP (FEB 12 - FEB 18, 2024)

Share:

This week at HODL, we've taken significant strides in expanding
our Play-to-Earn ecosystem
, enhancing our community engagement, and pushing the boundaries of what's possible with blockchain gaming. Here's a glimpse of our journey and the exciting developments:

Innovative Achievements and Engagements:

Strategic Acquisitions:

We snagged a $1.6k Game SFX Bundle for our P2E platform for just $20, showcasing our knack for securing valuable assets at incredible deals.

Gem Fighter NFTs Launch:

Marking a milestone, we launched the

Gem Fighter NFT range
, celebrated with an engaging AMA session on Telegram, and completed detailed listings on both OpenSea and NFTScan.

Website and Community Enhancements:

From updating the website menu with new items to connecting with hundreds of Binance Angels and growing our audience through competitions, we've been all about fostering a vibrant community.

Technical Progress:

We've completed extensive testing of the Gem Fighter NFT swaps allowing users to trade their $HODL and $HODLX for Gem Fighter NFTS, and the final contract, ensuring a seamless and secure experience for our users.

Content and Transparency:

We updated our roadmap, whitepaper, and the 'features' section on the homepage to reflect our latest achievements and plans. Plus, we've added crucial token information including max supply and circulating supply info to CoinMarketCap to maintain transparency and offer key details to those who are researching HODL.

Post-Launch Success:

Since launching our Gem Fighter NFTs, we've seen over 250 sales, driving us to ramp up marketing efforts and enhance our listings on key platforms. Additionally, we're boosting our Play-to-Earn games and website functionalities, aiming to enrich the user experience and reward engagement.

Looking Ahead:

Our roadmap is meticulously designed to achieve significant milestones by the Bitcoin halving, setting us up for success in the evolving crypto landscape. With plans to enhance rewards with $50,000 pools for NFT stakers, the future looks promising for HODL token holders and the broader community.

Join the Adventure:

As we navigate these exciting times, we invite you to be part of our journey. Whether it's by acquiring $HODL or $HODLX tokens, diving into the world of HODL Hands NFTs, or battling it out with Gem Fighter NFTs, there's never been a better time to join the HODL adventure.

Stay tuned for more updates, and let's continue to explore the vast potential of blockchain gaming and DeFi together.

WEEKLY ROUNDUP (FEB 5 - FEB 11, 2024)

Share:

This week at HODL has been a flurry of activity, with significant progress on multiple fronts. We're thrilled to share the milestones reached and the steps we've taken towards some major launches. Here's a glimpse into our productive week:

Spotlight Achievements
$HODL's Impressive Trend:

We made a splash on Crypto.com, trending at 3rd place, showcasing the growing interest and support for $HODL.

Gem Fighter Art and Innovation:

All final art files for Gem Fighter have been posted to IPFS, with a account created on X along with an X account dedicated to the Gem Fighter game. We've also added some strong innovations to the Gem Fighter contract.

Engagement and Development:

Our social drive with the community was a hit, further fueling the excitement for what's ahead. We've completed the meta for the NFT API and raised funds for further development, along with finalizing and signing the investment agreement.

App and Game Progress:

A new iOS app version has been uploaded for Apple, and we've had further dialogue and delivered additional reports to them. The complete review of the latest Poker UI indicates we're close to finalizing the designs which include some additional features.

App Update and Future Plans

We're on the cusp of finalizing our requirements with Apple, with a call scheduled this week to iron out the last few details before our app goes live.

What's Next?

Gem Fighter NFTs Launch:

We're just 1-2 small steps away from launching Gem Fighter NFTs, aiming for a live date of Thursday this week. The anticipation is high, and we're ready to share an update very soon.

Poker UI Developments:

After a thorough review of the poker user interface designs and providing our feedback, we're eagerly awaiting the final designs. This step brings us closer to enhancing the gaming experience for our community.

Apple Store Finalization:

We're optimistic about our upcoming call with Apple, hoping to clarify and complete any remaining items for our HODL app's debut on the Apple Store.

Game Development Updates:

With the Gem Fighter NFTs wrapped up, our game developer, Marius, is focused on rolling out Play-to-Earn functionality on our mini-games and further developing the Gem Fighter game.

Looking Forward

As we move forward, the alignment with the upcoming Bitcoin halving presents an exciting backdrop for our launches. Our team's relentless effort and the community's unwavering support are driving us toward a future filled with promise and potential.

Stay tuned for more updates, and thank you for being an integral part of this journey. Together, we're not just building a platform; we're shaping the future of gaming and finance.

Join us as we continue to push boundaries and explore new horizons with HODL. The best is yet to come!

WEEKLY ROUNDUP (JAN 29 - FEB 4, 2024)

Share:

This week at HODL, we've been busy making things happen and getting several major projects ready launch. Here's a quick rundown of what we've been up to:

YouTube and Gem Fighter Updates

We've organized our YouTube channel with new playlists and released a full gameplay video of the current Gem Fighter beta. Plus, we've updated the Gem Fighter page to keep it fresh and exciting.

Community and Social Media Buzz

We ran a special drive on social media to get everyone talking about HODL. The community's support has been amazing, and we're loving the energy!
iOS App Progress

We've had some long talks with Apple about our app and made several updates. We've changed things like where the app is listed, its age rating, and some reports about the app. We've also uploaded a new version to the iOS store. We're hopefully close to finishing this up!

NFT Sales and Rewards

Our HODL Hands NFT sale was a big hit! To make things even better, we've doubled the reward stacking limit and did some promotions around this increase. We also used some of the money from the NFT sales to buy back $HODL tokens.

Tech and Charity Work

We've set up IPFS hosting for Gem Fighter NFTs and shared new documents that Apple asked for. On top of all that, we've been involved in charity work, published a video and an article about it, and received a lot of support from our community.

Content and Updates

As always, we've been busy writing and sharing. We've published last week's roundup, new articles on CoinMarketCap and Medium, a blog on our website, and lots of posts on social media.

Looking Ahead: Exciting Times

We're close to launching Gem Fighter NFTs, which is going to be huge for $HODL and $HODLX tokens because of the big buybacks it'll bring. We're also pushing to get the iOS app live, working hard on the Gem Fighter game, improving our Play-to-Earn tech for our minigames, and taking our Texas HODL'em game designs and functionality to the next level. Once the iOS app is live, we're going to promote it like crazy!

That's it for this week! We've got a lot going on and even more on the horizon. Thanks for being on this journey with us. Stay tuned for more updates, and let's keep pushing forward together!

Join us on this adventure. The future's looking bright at HODL!

WEEKLY UPDATE (JAN 22 - JAN 28, 2024)

Share:

This week at HODL, we've been busy getting ready for some big launches and updates. We're focused on bringing new things to our community and making sure everyone's involved. Here's a breakdown of everything we've been up to:

Apple iOS App: The Final Stretch:

We're still talking with Apple and sending them the various company documentation required to help publish our iOS app. We're almost there and can't wait for it to launch.

Gem Fighter NFT: Making Big Moves:

Our Gem Fighter NFTs got a lot of attention this week. We updated their own dedicated web page, made some new graphics and videos, and even got our page verified on X. We also put together a big press release that we're ready to send out in conjunction with the NFTs going live.

Website Updates: Keeping You in the Loop:

We've been busy updating our website too. We've made changes to the menu and added new stuff to the Timeline and Achievements pages to take us up-to-date. We've also added those new Gem Fighter NFT videos to the website for you to check out.

Content and Community: Keeping Things Buzzing:

We've joined Substack and kept up with posting articles on CoinMarketCap and Medium. We're working hard to share our thoughts and keep the conversation going as we continue to evolve. Plus, we've been really active on social media, trying to make sure our community is always involved and informed.

Innovation and Development: Never Stopping:

We've spent a lot of time thinking about new in-game purchase ideas and looking over our latest designs. We've also been working hard on Texas HODL'em and adding new features to our poker game including plans for a chat function and table selection.

App Update: Ready for Lift-Off:

Our iOS app is pretty much ready to go. We've done everything we can, and now we're just waiting for the green light from Apple.

Looking Ahead: Big Things Coming:

Next week's looking really busy. We're hoping to launch Gem Fighter NFTs, get our app out with Apple's help, finish up the Gem Fighter game, and wrap up the design for our poker game. We're all hands on deck, ready to make things happen.

We're wrapping up another busy week, but we're not slowing down. There's a lot to look forward to, and we can't wait to share it all with you. Stay tuned, stay involved, and let's keep pushing forward with HODL.

Join us on this adventure. The future's looking bright with HODL.

GEM FIGHTER NFT RANGE LAUNCHES, PROMISING A REVOLUTION IN PLAY-TO-EARN GAMING

Share:

Jan 25, 2024 - Get ready for a gaming revolution as Gem Fighter launches its highly anticipated NFT range, set to redefine the world of Play-to-Earn gaming and NFT collectibles. The Gem Fighter NFT range is slated for launch during the week commencing Monday, January 29, 2024, offering an exciting opportunity for gamers and collectors alike.

Gem Fighter is a cutting-edge, procedurally generated shooter game that transports players to an array of stunning and infinitely unique worlds. With the launch of the Gem Fighter NFT range on the Binance Smart Chain (BSC), players can now own a piece of this innovative gaming experience and enjoy a host of exciting benefits.

Key Features of Gem Fighter NFTs:

Procedurally Generated Gemstone Trading Cards:

Each NFT is a one-of-a-kind gemstone trading card, making every piece truly unique and collectible.

Enhance Your Gameplay:

Gem Fighter NFTs can be socketed into your spaceship within the game, boosting your abilities and allowing you to score higher and earn more rewards.

Stake for Earnings:

Holders of Gem Fighter NFTs can stake them to earn valuable $HODL and $HODLX tokens, adding an extra layer of utility and rewards.

Special Launch Price:

During the launch period, Gem Fighter NFTs are priced at just $25, offering a fantastic introductory offer to the Gem Fighter community.

In addition to these outstanding features, a portion of all NFT sales will contribute to buybacks and rewards, helping to drive the value of both $HODL and $HODLX tokens.

To learn more about Gem Fighter and the revolutionary Gem Fighter NFT range, visit
https://hodltoken.net/gem-fighter-nfts
. Players can also play the Gem Fighter Beta for free by visiting
https://hodltoken.net/gem-fighter-beta
.

Join us in this gaming evolution and embark on an adventure like no other with Gem Fighter NFTs. Don't miss out on this limited-time opportunity to secure your Gem Fighter NFT at the special launch price.

WEEKLY UPDATE (JAN 15 - JAN 21, 2024)

Share:

This week at HODL has been nothing short of productive, innovative, and progressive. As we navigate through the dynamic world of digital assets, we continue to break barriers and set new benchmarks. Let's dive into the highlights of the week that have set a new pace for our journey.
1. Innovating the Gem Fighter NFTs:

We're thrilled to announce the creation of a special rarity pack for Gem Fighter NFTs. This bespoke rarity pack showcases our upcoming NFT range and breaks down the benefits and probability of each attribute being minted in the range.
2. Navigating the iOS App Submission Process:

Our journey with Apple this week has been intensive. We've forwarded a comprehensive pack of information, detailing the nuances of our iOS app. This step is pivotal in ensuring our app meets the rigorous standards of the Apple App Store, paving the way for a seamless user experience.
3. Website Enhancements:

The digital front of HODL received a significant facelift this week. From refreshing the terms and disclaimers sections to updating the FAQs, every tweak was made with you in mind. The addition of the investment risks page and the Gem Fighter rarity guide ensures transparency and accessibility, reinforcing our commitment to user empowerment.
4. Strengthening Our Foundations:

Securing a DUNS number and transitioning our app account to an organization account are administrative milestones that underscore our growth and readiness for the future. These steps, though behind the scenes, are crucial in scaling our operations and enhancing our service delivery.
5. Engagement and Recognition:

Our digital footprint saw an impressive expansion. From climbing into the top 5 on Crypto.com's trending section to a flurry of social media posts, we've not just engaged but resonated with our community. The publication of insightful articles on CoinMarketCap and Medium, coupled with a fresh blog post on our site, has fortified our thought leadership in the space.
6. Looking Ahead:

As we wrap up the week, the anticipation for the launch of the Gem Fighter NFT series is palpable. This isn't just a launch; it's a leap into the future of Play-to-Earn ecosystems. The hard work is done, the stage is set, and we're almost ready to unveil an adventure that redefines engagement and earning.

Stay tuned, stay engaged, and let's continue to HODL on to this incredible journey together!

HODL – Navigating the Future, One Block at a Time.

WEEKLY UPDATE (JAN 8 - JAN 14, 2024)

Share:

Welcome to our first comprehensive update of 2024! The HODL team has hit the ground running this year, making significant strides in various aspects of our project. Here’s a glimpse into our bustling week:

Marketing and Partnerships

Influencer Marketing on X
: We've expanded our outreach through strategic influencer collaborations on platform X, enhancing our visibility in the crypto community.
$HODL Trending on Crypto.com
: Our efforts saw $HODL's popularity soar, trending high on Crypto.com.

App Development

Apple App Progress
: A major focus has been on our iOS app. We've applied for a DUNS number and submitted all necessary documents to Apple for app submission. This marks a crucial step in bringing our HODL app to iOS users.

NFT and Gaming Developments

Gem Fighter NFT Launch Prep
: We are on the verge of launching the Gem Fighter NFT range. The preparation is in full swing, promising an exciting addition to our ecosystem.

Updated Play-To-Earn Features
: We've updated the Gem Fighter content on our Play-To-Earn page, enhancing user experience and functionality.

Gem Fighter Dedicated Pages
: We launched dedicated web pages for Gem Fighter and the Gem Fighter NFTs, offering useful information on the game and NFTs.

Community Engagement and Tools

AMA Session
: We hosted an AMA session, now available on YouTube and social media, keeping our community informed and engaged.

Social Media Blitz
: A substantial volume of posts across various platforms kept our community buzzing with the latest HODL updates.
$HODL Price Bot for Telegram & Discord Bot Upgrade
: We introduced a new price bot for Telegram and upgraded our HODL bot on Discord, making it easier for our community to stay updated.

Website Enhancements

Homepage and Menu Updates
: We've revamped the website homepage and menu to include new content and feature icons, improving navigation and user experience.

Social Links Addition
: Social links have been added to our web banners and footer, ensuring seamless connectivity with our social platforms.

Content Updates
: Enhanced website content, including the latest blogs and articles on Medium, provides rich insights into our journey and future plans.

Looking Ahead

Exciting Developments
: We eagerly await news from Apple on our app submission. Meanwhile, we're working diligently to complete the Gem Fighter game and the HODL play-to-earn minigames, offering our community more ways to engage and earn.

As we navigate through 2024, our commitment to innovation, community engagement, and project development continues to strengthen. This week's progress is just the beginning of what promises to be an exhilarating year for HODL. Stay tuned for more updates, launches, and community activities as we forge ahead in our mission to revolutionize the crypto space.

HODL WEEKLY UPDATE (JAN 1 - JAN 7, 2024)

Share:

Happy New Year, HODLers! As we embark on an exciting 2024, we're thrilled to share this week's roundup of progress and developments. Our dedicated team worked tirelessly through the holiday season, ensuring that HODL continues to innovate and lead in the crypto space.

P2E System Development Using Moonshot:

This week marked a significant milestone with the rollout of our first Play-to-Earn (P2E) menu system, using Moonshot as our first test-case. This innovative system is set to revolutionize the way users interact with HODL, offering an engaging and rewarding experience.

HODLX Contract Update:

In our commitment to moving forward, we've updated the $HODLX contract. This crucial enhancement is designed to address and fix front-running bot issues, ensuring a more equitable trading environment for our community.

New Year Community Update:

We kicked off the year by delivering a comprehensive update to our community. This update covered our roadmap for 2024, reflecting our commitment to growth and continuous improvement.

Technical Support and User Engagement:

Our team was actively involved in supporting users with any technical issues they encountered. Additionally, we ran successful bounty and X/Twitter marketing campaigns, boosting our presence and engagement across different platforms.

NFT Trading Card Development Completion:

We're excited to announce the completion of our Gem Fighter NFT trading card development. These unique digital collectibles are not just a testament to our creative capabilities but also a new avenue for our users to engage with the HODL ecosystem.

Corporate and Community Engagements:

The week also saw us completing our company registration for 2024 and conducting an engaging AMA session with the crypto community. These steps are integral to our growth and community involvement.

Listings and Publications:

Our $HODL Token is now listed on Ave.AI. We also kept our community informed and engaged with the publication of last week's roundup, a new article on CoinMarketCap, fresh content on Medium, and a blog post on the HODL website.

Social Media Buzz:

We maintained a robust presence across social media channels, keeping our community updated and involved with our latest happenings.

Looking Ahead:

As we resume full operations, our immediate focus is on the iOS app submission to Apple. This app is a pivotal part of our strategy to make HODL accessible to a broader audience.

The journey we've embarked on this week is just the beginning of what promises to be an exhilarating year for HODL. We're grateful for your unwavering support and enthusiasm, and we can't wait to share more updates as we continue to build and innovate.

HODL WEEKLY UPDATE (DEC 25 - DEC 31, 2023)

Share:

As we wrapped up the final week of 2023, the HODL team, undeterred by the festive season, continued to push forward, achieving significant milestones and maintaining our momentum. Here's a recap of the pivotal activities and accomplishments during this period:

Highlights of the Week

Bounty Marketing Campaign
: We launched a targeted bounty marketing campaign to incentivize and engage our community. This approach has proven effective in expanding our reach and encouraging active participation.

X/Twitter Marketing Efforts
: Leveraging the power of social media, we ran a comprehensive marketing campaign on X and Twitter, enhancing our visibility and attracting new audiences.

Festive Competition
: Embracing the holiday spirit, we conducted a festive competition with attractive prizes. The event was a success, with prizes promptly dispatched to the winners.

Telegram Bot Updates
: We upgraded our Telegram bot messages, improving user interaction and providing more streamlined and informative responses to our community when triggering commands.

Gem Fighter Contract Completion
: A major development this week was the completion of the Gem Fighter contract, marking a significant step forward in our project roadmap.

Community Marketing Drive
: We initiated a robust community marketing drive, focusing on grassroots efforts to strengthen our community bonds and enhance our project's organic growth.

New Feature on @HODL_Official on X
: We added an engaging bio feature to our official handle on X, offering followers a deeper insight into our project.

Content and Communication

Weekly Roundup and CMC Article
: Keeping with our tradition, we published last week's roundup alongside a feature article on CoinMarketCap, sharing insights and updates with a wider audience.

Fresh Medium Articles and Blog Post
: Our content team released new articles on Medium and a detailed blog post on the HODL website, covering various aspects of our journey and future plans.

Social Media Engagement
: Our social media channels buzzed with activity, with a substantial volume of posts across platforms, keeping our community informed and engaged.

App Update

Apple Store Submission
: We are currently addressing the requirements for the Apple store submission, including providing additional information and registering for a DUNS number.

Android App Launch
: The Android version of the HODL app is now live! We've received overwhelmingly positive feedback, a testament to our team's dedication and the app's user-centric design.

In conclusion, the last week of 2023 saw the HODL team achieving new heights despite the holiday season. Our commitment to continuous improvement and community engagement remains unwavering as we step into the new year with renewed vigor and exciting prospects on the horizon. Stay tuned for more updates and breakthroughs from the world of HODL!

HODL Weekly Update (Dec 18 - Dec 24, 2023)

Share:

Introduction:

As we rapidly approach the end of 2023, it's exhilarating to reflect on the progress and milestones achieved at HODL. This week has been a whirlwind of updates, launches, and exciting developments, all geared toward enhancing our user experience and expanding our reach in the crypto space. Here's a comprehensive look at what we've been up to this week.

Key Updates and Developments:

Enhanced Digital Presence:

Linktree Integration:

We've added quick-access links to the HODL app on our Linktree, making navigation more intuitive.

Social Media Revamps:

Our Reddit and Facebook pages have undergone significant updates, now featuring new layouts, menus, and banners, all showcasing our latest app.

Media and Promotions:

YouTube and Chatbot Enhancements:

The HODL YouTube page now includes direct app links, and our Chatbot has been upgraded for better user interaction.

Promotional Video Launch:

A captivating promotional video for the HODL app has been released, offering a glimpse into its unique features and benefits.

App Developments:

Comprehensive Testing:

Our team has rigorously tested the HODL app on both iOS and Android platforms to ensure a seamless user experience.

App Store Submissions:

We've officially submitted the HODL app to both the Google Play Store and Apple App Store, marking a significant step in our app's journey.

Feature Completion:

The Pro and Lite Mode features of the app have been finalized, offering tailored experiences to our diverse user base.

Website and Content Updates:

Website Navigation and Content:

The HODL website now boasts improved navigation, specifically designed to enhance app accessibility. Additionally, we've removed outdated content, keeping our site fresh and relevant.

Educational and Support Resources:

Our FAQs have been updated with app support information, and a new 'About HODL App' page has been published, providing comprehensive insights into the app's functionality.

NFT Trading Card Design:

We’ve completed an exclusive design for an NFT trading card, incorporating unique gem features, adding another exciting element to our offerings.

Community Engagement and Support:

Competitions and Community Groups:

We’ve successfully run a competition, fostering community engagement, and established a dedicated in-app support group to assist our users.

Content Publications:

We've been active in publishing informative articles on CoinMarketCap, Medium, and our blog, ensuring our community stays informed and engaged.

Exciting Announcement:

The highlight of this week is undoubtedly the launch of the HODL app on the Google Play Store! This is a monumental milestone for our project, and we are diligently working towards making the app available on the Apple App Store as well.

Conclusion:

This week has been nothing short of phenomenal for HODL. With each update and development, we move closer to our goal of revolutionizing the crypto experience for our users. As we continue to innovate and grow, we want to extend our heartfelt gratitude to our community for their unwavering support and enthusiasm.

Thank you for being a part of our journey. Here's to many more milestones ahead!

HODL App Launches on Apple and Android Stores: Revolutionizing Crypto Earnings

Share:

FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE

HODL App Launches on Apple and Android Stores: Revolutionizing Crypto Earnings
[London, Dec 19, 2023] - In a significant advancement for the cryptocurrency world, HODL proudly announces the launch of the HODL App, now available on both Apple and Android stores. This app represents a groundbreaking step in accessible and secure crypto earnings, leveraging the power of the deflationary and fully authenticated HODL token.

Earn Passive Income with Proven Success

Since its inception in May 2021, the HODL ecosystem has distributed over 20,000 BNB in rewards, valued at over $5 million. The HODL App simplifies earning passive income for users by enabling them to easily earn and claim rewards every 7 days through the $HODL token on the Binance Smart Chain. This innovative approach to cryptocurrency rewards has been a game-changer for investors around the globe.

HODL: A Trusted and Secure Cryptocurrency

The HODL token is not only deflationary, ensuring its long-term value, but it also stands out for its transparency and security. The team behind HODL is fully doxxed and KYC'd, ensuring a high level of trust and accountability. Additionally, the liquidity of HODL is locked for over 250 years, showcasing an unparalleled commitment to stability and investor confidence. HODL is also a legally registered company, further cementing its legitimacy in the crypto space.

Exciting Future Developments: Play-to-Earn Games

Looking towards the future, HODL is developing a series of play-to-earn games, set to launch soon. These games are designed to enhance the user experience, providing both entertainment and additional avenues for earning within the HODL ecosystem.

Seamless Crypto Experience for Everyone

The HODL App is tailored for both newcomers and experienced crypto enthusiasts, offering a seamless interface for managing crypto investments, with robust security measures and a user-friendly design.

Join the Crypto Revolution with HODL

HODL CEO, Adam, shares the excitement: “The launch of the HODL App is a major milestone for us. We're not just offering a crypto tool; we're providing a secure and transparent platform for earning passive income. Our commitment to innovation and security has paid off, and we're eager to see our community grow with these new developments.”

The HODL App is more than just a cryptocurrency tool; it's a gateway to financial independence and sustainable earning. Download the app today and become part of a community that's reshaping the future of cryptocurrency.

For more information, visit
https://hodltoken.net
or download the HODL App from the Apple and Android stores.

WEEKLY ROUNDUP: DEC 4 - DEC 10, 2023

Share:

The past week at HODL has been a whirlwind of activity, innovation, and community engagement. As we forge ahead in the dynamic world of cryptocurrency and blockchain, we are thrilled to share our significant strides and accomplishments.

Milestones of the Week

App Excellence
: Our commitment to delivering a seamless and robust app experience continued this week. Through meticulous reviews, testing, and bug fixes, we've elevated our app's performance and user experience including simplifying the on and off-ramping.

User Interface (UI) Enhancements
: The design team outdid themselves by finalizing the UI for our Play To Earn minigames, blending aesthetics with user-friendly functionality.

Website Upgrades
: We've updated our homepage, ensuring that all statistics are current and accurate, enhancing the user journey on our platform. Updated figures include $HODL's market cap and liquidity pool.

Fundraising Triumphs
: Our app marketing wallet initiative was a resounding success, raising an impressive $4,000, a testament to the faith and support of our community.

Gemstone Feature Completion
: A major development this week was the completion of the 3D gemstone designs for the upcoming play-to-earn game, Gem Fighter.

Strategic Marketing
: With a comprehensive app marketing plan now in place, we're geared up to enhance our market presence and reach when the incredible HODL app launches.

Achieving Visibility
: Our efforts bore fruit as we trended at number two on Crypto.com, a significant achievement in enhancing our brand's visibility and reach.

NFT Sales and Developments
: The HODL Hands NFT sale was a major highlight, coupled with the development of Gem Fighter NFT trading cards, diversifying our NFT offerings.

Press Release Preparation
: In preparation for greater media outreach, we crafted a compelling press release for our app, set to make waves in the press.

Staking Pool Enhancements
: We optimized the earnings system in our Staking Pools, ensuring better returns for our users who stake $HODL and $HODLX tokens.

Looking Ahead: The App Launch

The spotlight of the week was undoubtedly the impending launch of our app. Paul, our dedicated developer, worked tirelessly over the weekend to ensure that we are on the brink of launching a cutting-edge, user-centric application. Final tests are being conducted to guarantee a smooth launch.

Community Engagement and Opportunities

Engagement with our community is at the heart of what we do. We hosted a successful $HODL buy competition and upgraded our sell bot limit to deliver more BNB rewards. Moreover, we introduced enhanced token swap offers for NFTs, making it more enticing for our users to engage with our evolving ecosystem and enjoy our HODL Hand NFT range.

Conclusion

As we reflect on a week of hard work and dedication, we extend our heartfelt thanks to our community for their unwavering support. Stay tuned for more updates, especially regarding our much-anticipated app launch, and join us as we continue to innovate and lead in the blockchain space.

WEEKLY ROUNDUP: NOV 27 - DEC 3, 2023

Share:

This week at HODL has been bustling with activity and significant advancements. Here’s a glimpse into our latest achievements and developments:

Innovative Staking Pools Launched
: We're thrilled to announce the launch of new staking pools - a HODL Hands NFT staking pool, $HODL staking pool, and the $HODLX staking pool. These pools provide our users with fresh opportunities to engage with our tokens and earn rewards.

Dashboard Updates for Enhanced Transparency
: We've updated the project addresses on our dashboard, ensuring that our users have the most current and accurate information for their transactions and understand how the project is structured in a completely transparent way. To view, simply visit the investor dashboard under the $HODL link in the menu.

Gem Fighter Game and NFT Video Release
: The excitement continues with the release of our Gem Fighter game and its accompanying NFT video. This visual treat gives our community a closer look at the game’s dynamics and the NFTs involved.

Pushing the Boundaries in Gaming
: Our team has made significant progress in developing designs for the Play-to-Earn (P2E) features on our mini-game user interface. This development is a testament to our commitment to providing a superior gaming experience.

Enhancing the Visual Appeal with 3D Inclusions
: We've created stunning 3D inclusions for gemstones, adding an extra layer of depth and realism to our digital assets as one of the elements of gemstone generation and rarity.

Dedicated Efforts in Debugging the HODL App
: Our team has been extensively working on debugging the HODL app. This rigorous process ensures an optimal and smooth user experience and a strong launch.

Engaging Content and Updates
:

Last week’s roundup and a new article on CoinMarketCap have been published, keeping our audience informed about our recent activities.

We’ve also released new articles on Medium and a fresh blog post on our website.

Our social media platforms have been buzzing with a substantial volume of posts, keeping our community engaged and updated.

Exciting App Update
: The HODL app is going live this week! We encourage everyone to stay tuned to the HODL Official Telegram for updates and help us drive awareness of this exciting launch.

As we wrap up another successful week, we at HODL are excited about what the future holds and are grateful for your continued support. Stay tuned for more updates as we continue to innovate and grow in the crypto space!

This Week at HODL: Innovating and Expanding in the Digital Realm

This week at HODL, our team has achieved several significant milestones, showcasing our commitment to innovation and excellence in the digital space.

Gemstone NFTs - A Sparkling Success
: Our design team has completed an exquisite series of gemstone-themed NFTs. These digital assets, combining artistry and technology, are set to captivate our community and bring powerups to our incredible Gem Fighter game.

Developing our Poker Game
: In collaboration with our skilled designers, we've extensively worked to develop the design and functionality of our upcoming Poker game - Texas HODL'em. The aim is to deliver a special user experience, ensuring both functionality and aesthetic appeal.

App Excellence - Testing and Debugging
: We've dedicated substantial effort to testing and debugging our app. This rigorous process ensures a seamless, user-friendly experience, reflecting our commitment to quality and reliability.

HODL App Update Video
: Keeping our community informed, we've released an update video about the HODL app. This video explains our launch timeline and makes a request to the community to help support its promotion.

AI-Enhanced Copywriting
: With the assistance of advanced AI tools, we've refined the textual content of the HODL app as we prepare for launch.

Engaging Online Content
: This week saw the publication of our weekly roundup online, providing insights into our recent activities and achievements. Additionally, we've contributed an insightful article to CoinMarketCap, solidifying our presence in the digital asset space.

Expanding Our Digital Footprint
: Our commitment to engaging with our community continues with the release of new articles on Medium, offering deeper insights into our projects and the industry at large. Moreover, a fresh blog post on the HODL website keeps our audience updated on the latest developments.

Social Media Buzz
: We've maintained a robust presence on social media, sharing a substantial volume of posts across various platforms. This ongoing engagement ensures we stay connected with our community, sharing updates, insights, and more.

In conclusion, this week at HODL has been marked by significant progress across various fronts, from NFT design and app development to content creation and community engagement. We continue to push the boundaries, striving for innovation and excellence in the ever-evolving digital landscape.

WEEKLY HODL ROUNDUP: NOV 13 - NOV 19, 2023

Share:

As we continue to push the envelope in the blockchain space, this past week at HODL has been marked by a series of completed objectives and exciting developments. Here’s an overview of the strides we've made:

Completing Gem Fighter P2E Game UI:

Our team has successfully completed the user interface for Gem Fighter, our much-anticipated play-to-earn game. The final UI design promises a seamless and engaging gaming experience that integrates the thrill of competition with the benefits of the blockchain.

Our Upcoming P2E NFT Collection:

The design team has been hard at work, and we're proud to announce the completion of 5 out of the 8 unique 3D gemstone NFT designs. These designs will soon form part of our growing ecosystem of digital assets, each with its own distinctive flair.

Completion of New User Account Interface:

In our mission to enhance user experience, we've completed the user interface designs of the new HODL user account. The new UI is tailored to provide a clean and clear experience and access to your NFT collection and play-to-earn earnings.

HODL Hands NFT Promotion:

Our HODL Hands NFT promotion has been a resounding success, with participants engaging enthusiastically. This initiative has allowed us to further solidify our community ties and bring more value to our holders.

Tuning Up the HODL Store:

The HODL store has undergone various fixes, ensuring an optimized shopping experience for our users. From product listings to checkout processes, every aspect has been polished to perfection.

Boosting $HODLX Token Liquidity:

We've added liquidity to the $HODLX token, thereby ensuring smoother transactions and enhanced stability for our traders.

Enhancing Token Swaps for NFT Offers:

We've increased the number of token swaps available for NFTs, offering our users more flexibility and opportunities to expand their digital asset portfolios.

Engaging Content and Social Media Presence:

As always, we've stayed committed to keeping our community informed and engaged:

Last week's roundup and our latest happenings have been published online.

A new CoinMarketCap article has been posted to the CMC community.

Fresh articles have been published on Medium.

Our blog on the HODL website has been updated with the latest posts.

We've maintained a strong and substantial volume of social media posts across platforms.

HODL App Update:

Our lead developer, Paul, is working towards the hard deadline of November 22nd for the completion of the HODL app. Major progress has been made over the last week on the remaining items.

Looking Forward:

With our user-centric updates, enhanced gaming interfaces, and continuous liquidity improvements, HODL is on track to deliver a robust and dynamic ecosystem for our community.

Stay tuned for the next installment of our weekly roundup, and in the meantime, keep HODLing!

WEEKLY HODL ROUNDUP: NOV 6 - NOV 12, 2023

Share:

This week, we've made some solid strides that we're eager to share.

Wallet Connect 2.0: A Seamless Connection

First off, the launch of Wallet Connect 2.0 on our HODLX exchange platform has been a smash hit! We're talking about a smoother, more reliable, and even more secure experience when you're trading. Your feedback drove this upgrade, and we're thrilled to deliver a fully-tested solution.

The $HODL Contract: Optimized and Enhanced

Efficiency is key in crypto, and with the latest optimization of the $HODL contract, your transactions are not just safer—they're faster and come with lower fees too. It's all about giving you the performance you deserve.

Sell Bot Adjustment

The sell bot has now been adjusted to allow sales up to $50 per transaction to help support the $HODL Token BNB reward pool.

Reinvesting Made Simple

Reinvesting in $HODLX? It's never been easier. With direct reinvestment from the main liquidity pool, it's a straightforward path to grow your investments with the most minimal price impact.

Recovered and Stronger: $HODLX LP Funds

Our team successfully recovered $1,000 in $HODLX from a centralized exchange, bolstering the liquidity pool's strength. It's a testament to our resilience and commitment to security.

Liquidity Pool Function: Smooth Sailing

A hiccup with the LP function on HODLX.exchange was swiftly addressed, ensuring your liquidity transactions are seamless and with minimized price impact.

Project Liquidity: A Boost for $HODLX

We've added more liquidity to the $HODLX pool, reaffirming our commitment to the project's health and your confidence in us.

Smart Contract Utilities: Verified and Secured

The $HODL smart contract utilities underwent a rigorous verification process. Everything's in top shape, providing you with a dependable trading environment.

NFTs and Spaceships: The Creative Frontier

Our collaboration with top-tier designers on gemstone-themed NFTs is shaping up to be a dazzling venture. And the Gem Fighter spaceship? It's designed and ready to take flight in the gaming universe!

App Testing and Debugging: Pursuit of Perfection

Our devs have been on a bug hunt, making sure the app performs flawlessly. Your user experience is paramount, and we're fine-tuning every aspect.

AMA Recap, Staking Costs, and UI/UX: The Community Focus

Did you miss our AMA? Check out the recap on our blog. We've also reduced NFT staking costs, making it more accessible for all. Plus, the new user UI/UX has been revamped—expect a smoother, more intuitive experience.

P2E API, Articles, and Social Buzz: Keeping You Informed

The Play-to-Earn REST API is now in testing phase, signaling new adventures on the horizon. Our presence in a CoinMarketCap article, fresh Medium posts, and a new blog post on our site means there's no shortage of reading material. And, of course, we've kept the conversation going strong on social media.

That wraps up this week's updates. We're excited about the progress and grateful for your continued support. Remember, we're in this together, riding the wave of crypto's potential. Here's to another week of growth and success!

Inside HODL's Future: An AMA with CEO Adam

Share:

We've hosted an AMA session to give our readers an inside look at what's next for HODL. Our community asked, and Adam, HODL's CEO, answered with insights on the company's direction and strategy.

Vision for HODL in Five Years

Jeremy Pat Martin:
"Where do you see HODL five years from now?"

Adam:

In five years, HODL aims to be more than just a project; it's designed to be a lasting institution. We expect to have seen two bull runs by that time. As for our growth, we are on track to evolve into a self-sufficient, multi-billion dollar company with a vast array of products and services across all major blockchain platforms. We're working towards embedding our contract into a DAO, which will ensure any changes are made with majority support, reflecting our community-driven philosophy. HODL is set to become a prominent brand in the crypto universe.

Calculating $HODL Claims

Adi:
"How can I calculate the daily or weekly claim I can make if I have 1T $HODL and the volume is 100 million euros per day? Please give us a clear example of how to calculate the claim based on your bag and volume."

Adam:

To determine your claim, start with the total supply, discounting deployer tokens, which is 683 trillion. The percentage of the reward pool you're entitled to is equivalent to your holding divided by 683 trillion. If the daily volume is €100 million, with 5% allocated to the reward pool, there's €5 million available daily. Holding 1 trillion $HODL gets you about €7,300 daily or €51,100 weekly. This is a simple guide and doesn't consider variables like unclaimed rewards or staking pools. For a tailored calculation, check out our dashboard where you can see real-time data based on your wallet.

Technical Challenges Post-User Testing

Keith H:
"Now that HODL has some information from user testing, what issues stand out as the major technical challenges for the app?"

Adam:

The user testing has been insightful, uncovering mostly minor issues that are manageable. We've encountered a slightly complex challenge with biometric locking, but we're making good progress. The primary technical task is perfecting the integration of our various services like HODLX, swap functionality, and the dashboard. The goal is to ensure that all wallet connections are seamless. We're confident in our ability to address these challenges; it's just a matter of time.

The Role of MoonPay in HODL's Ecosystem

Remco:
"Within the app, we are currently making use of MoonPay to buy and sell BNB. With the HODL Pay feature in mind, is this something that will change in the future?"

Adam:

Using MoonPay within our app is a strategic choice that allows us to focus on our strengths without the complications of direct cash handling. This approach helps us avoid the intricacies of global financial regulations. MoonPay is our partner of choice for launch due to its broad coverage and reliable interface. As we progress, we'll explore adding more partners to provide comprehensive fiat services globally. HODL Pay will likely integrate third-party services to facilitate the conversion of BNB rewards to cash.

HODLX's Utility and Sell Pressure

Keith H:
"Your reasons for removing the HODL/HODLX pool from HODLX are reasonable and understood. What additional utilities are in the pipeline to offset this move and decrease overall sell pressure on HODLX?"

Adam:

HODLX stands out for its range of features, including staking, farming, and NFT swaps, all without transaction fees. We're not resting on our laurels, though. We're actively developing new features, including an exciting connection to an upcoming game, which we believe will significantly enhance HODLX's utility and appeal.

Thank you for sharing your questions and keep an eye on our blog for more updates as we continue to build HODL's future together.

Weekly HODL Roundup: Oct 30 - Nov 5, 2023

Share:

It's been a busy week at HODL with lots of updates and progress. Here's what we've been up to:

NFT Promotions:

Our HODL Hands NFT promotional event finished up, giving out unique digital items to our community.

Game Branding:

We've finalized the design for our new game, Gem Fighter, which is all about earning while playing.

Updates Reviewed:

We've shared a roundup of all the recent HODL happenings. Plus, our team has gone over the HODL app with a fine-tooth comb to make sure it's perfect.

User Experience:

We're working on a special user account to help you manage your HODL account and assets. This week we worked with the design team to develop the look and feel of this new feature.

Tech Advances:

Our website's got a range of small updates with new content and images. We've also created new tech to make our upcoming gemstone NFTs even better.

New Listings:

We're now listed on Coincodex with full profile information! We've also made improvements to Wallet Connect on

HODLX.exchange
to support more connection options and with a new and improved interface.

Community Boost:

We've been working to get our name out there more, especially on Facebook. Plus, there's a new article on CoinMarketCap, and we've been posting a lot on social media.

HODL App Update:

Paul's almost done with the latest app updates, and we're nearly ready to show it off.

What's Next:

We're always working on making HODL better, with new updates and improvements that help us all stay connected in the blockchain world.

Stay tuned for more news, and keep on HODLing!

Hodling: The Art of Diamond Hands in Cryptocurrency

Share:

Introduction

In the volatile world of cryptocurrency, there's a term that's become emblematic of an investment strategy and an ethos: "Hodling". Originating from a misspelled forum post back in 2013, the term has since taken on a life of its own. At its core, "hodling" means holding onto a cryptocurrency and not selling it, regardless of the market's fluctuations. Let's delve into the philosophy, origin, and practicalities of hodling.

The Origin Story

The term "hodl" has an almost legendary origin in the crypto community. Back in December 2013, amidst a turbulent Bitcoin market, a user on the BitcoinTalk forum wrote a post titled "I AM HODLING". The user explained that despite being bad at trading, they had decided to hold onto their Bitcoin. The post was filled with typos, but the sentiment struck a chord with many in the community.

Hodling as an Investment Strategy

Hodling is often contrasted with active trading, where individuals buy and sell assets frequently based on market trends or short-term predictions. Here are the main tenets of the hodling strategy:

Long-Term Belief
: Hodlers believe in the long-term value proposition of cryptocurrencies. They maintain that, in the long run, the value will go up, regardless of short-term market dips.

Avoiding Emotional Decisions
: Cryptocurrency markets are known for their volatility. Hodlers argue that by deciding in advance not to sell, they avoid making rash decisions based on temporary market crashes or FUD (fear, uncertainty, doubt).

Simple & Passive
: Hodling is a passive investment strategy. Instead of constantly monitoring the market and making frequent trades, hodlers simply buy and wait.

Criticism & Considerations

While many swear by the hodling strategy, it's not without its critics. Here are some points of contention:

Missed Opportunities
: By choosing not to sell during peaks, hodlers might miss out on potential profits they could reinvest.

Lack of Diversification
: If one's entire crypto portfolio is in a single asset, they are more exposed to that asset's volatility.

Psychological Pressure
: Seeing one's investment plummet in value and choosing not to act can be mentally taxing for some.

Hodling in Popular Culture
"Hodl" has transcended its origins to become a cultural phenomenon within the cryptocurrency community. It's often used to express solidarity during market downturns or to poke fun at the irrationality of the crypto market. The term has inspired memes, merchandise, and even songs.

Conclusion

Hodling, like all investment strategies, is a matter of personal choice. Some see it as the best way to capitalize on the long-term potential of cryptocurrencies, while others prefer more active strategies. Whatever the choice, it's essential to do thorough research and understand the risks involved. And remember, whether you're a hodler or not, the world of cryptocurrency is as fascinating as it is unpredictable.

Expanded our merch store with an additional 20 products.

Published the roundup of the previous week online.

Developed and reviewed the v1 Gem Fighter Play-to-Earn NFTs concept.

Analyzed design concepts for Texas HODL'em.

WEEKLY ROUNDUP (Oct 9 - Oct 15, 2023)

Share:

Another week has passed in our vibrant ecosystem, and as always, there's a lot to share. As we embark on this journey of transparency, innovation, and collaboration, let’s dive deep into the strides we've made together.

Website Wonders

We believe in evolution and user-centric design. Reflecting that belief, our website now boasts a revamped menu. The aim? To ensure you get the information you need, effortlessly.

Clarity is King

Content isn't just about sharing information; it's about connection. We've revisited and refined our content, focusing on simplicity and clarity. We want every member, whether a newbie or a HODL veteran, to feel informed and included. One big area of focus has been developing the headings on all pages to be impactful and clear.

BNB Reward Pool Gets a Fresh Fill

To support our growing community and its needs, we've bolstered our BNB fund. This ensures liquidity, stability, and a promise that we're always ready for the next big step.

Simplifying NFT Transactions

The option to buy HODL Hands NFTs on card has been having some issues as the company who made the tool was bought out and due to HODL Hands being an asset you can stake, they may not be able to support it further so we've stepped back to simply offering pay with BNB.

All About the HODL Shop Experience

Every glitch tackled is a step closer to perfection. Thanks to your feedback, our HODL shop has undergone optimizations to enhance your experience with loads more products on the way.

Teasing Tomorrow's Triumphs

We’re bubbling with excitement about the projects we have in the pipeline. While we’re keeping cards close to our chest, for now, know that impactful announcements are on the horizon.

App Innovations Around the Corner

Our HODL app, a cornerstone of our ecosystem, is gearing up for some major updates. We're confident these enhancements will elevate your experience further.

A Final Note

Each week at HODL is a testament to our commitment to you, and our community. Your feedback, enthusiasm, and trust drive us to push boundaries and innovate relentlessly.

Weekly Roundup: Oct 2 - Oct 8, 2023

Share:

The first week of October has been a bustling time at HODL, and as always, we’re thrilled to share our weekly roundup with all of you, ensuring you stay updated on every little stride we make toward our shared success.

Keeping Our Roadmap Transparent

We've
updated our roadmap page
, ensuring that our strategic journey, outlining the path from where we are to where we're going, is clear to all HODLers. Your insights matter, so do check it out and let us know your thoughts!

Doubling Down on the BNB Pool

Excitingly, the
sell bot amount has been updated
, doubling our BNB pool! This fortifies our financial backend, ensuring smoother transactions and consistent functionality even as we grow our community and token circulation.

Website and Communication Refinements

We are in perpetual pursuit of clarity and usability, which is why our
homepage copy has been refined and simplified
. Further, to keep the community in sync with our progress and history, our
timeline and achievements pages
have been updated, reflecting all our recent strides and successes.

NFTs and Community Engagement

Congratulations to all the winners of our

NFT competition
- the prizes have been sent! NFTs have been an exciting avenue for us, and we anticipate many more engaging contests and distributions in the future.

Keeping Our Narratives Clear

We've been active on multiple platforms, ensuring that our narrative, updates, and educational content are reaching as many eyes and ears as possible. This includes
two articles on CoinMarketCap
,
two fresh Medium publications
, and
three new blogs
on our website, apart from a vibrant flurry of social media posts keeping the conversations going!

Swap Update on the HODL App

We listened to your feedback and have
rebuilt the swap function on the HODL app
to address and ameliorate issues encountered with third-party interfaces. The update is now live on the HODL Android App, with the iPhone version on the brink of being rolled out with these enhancements. A few minor bug fixes are underway to ensure that the app integrates seamlessly with

HODLX.exchange
.

What’s Coming Up?

From refining the
'user account' designs
to simplifying the
website menu
, and ensuring that our
staking pool rewards
are dished out, it's been a week of both external and internal improvements.

Support & Spread the HODL Word

Our community is our strength, and every single member contributes to the force that propels us forward. Your engagement, feedback, and evangelism of HODL are immensely valued.

In Conclusion

Week after week, your belief and participation in HODL enable us to push boundaries, implement improvements, and drive toward our shared aspirations. As we proceed, every update and modification is steered towards making HODL more robust, usable, and enjoyable for all of you.

HODL Weekly Roundup - Sep 25 to Oct 1, 2023

Share:

Major Updates:

A substantial addition of 1.8 trillion $HODL was made to the sell bot, signifying a crucial development in HODL’s trading mechanism.

Reflections to the marketing wallet have been removed to optimize the transaction process.

The HODL tax has been reduced to 5% from the previous rate of 10%. The official website content has been updated accordingly to reflect the new tax rate.

The whitepaper has been updated with the latest contract details and the CoinMarketCap listing has also been refreshed, offering users the most current and accurate information available.

Website and Content Development:

Several updates were made to the website, including a revamped menu and the addition of DollarBot to website content. These adjustments aim to enhance user navigation and accessibility to pertinent information.

Project addresses on the dashboard were updated, providing more precise and reliable data to the users.

A total of three blogs were published on the HODL website along with two new Medium articles, offering insights and valuable information on HODL’s progression and industry trends.

Promotions and Marketing:

The marketing team successfully ran the HODL Hands NFT promotion and launched a new NFT/$HODL promotion to engage with the community and offer more value to the users.

An exciting gemstone teaser and update were released, keeping the community informed and engaged with the latest developments.

A significant volume of social media posts was published, keeping the community connected and informed about the latest news, updates, and developments.

Last week’s roundup was also published along with two articles on CoinMarketCap, offering a comprehensive overview of the past week's activities and advancements.

NFTs and Gaming:

Initiatives have started on game NFTs, a forward step in diversifying HODL’s product offerings and engaging gaming communities.

HODL Hands NFTs are also now available, providing more options for users interested in expanding their NFT collections.

HODL App Update:

Paul has been instrumental this week, working meticulously on the upcoming app update, which is poised to be another significant step towards its launch. Users can anticipate improved functionality and enhanced features in the upcoming version of the app.

How to Buy:

For those interested in purchasing HODL tokens and products, please visit the following links:

This week has been crucial for HODL, witnessing numerous updates, enhancements, and developments. These changes reflect HODL’s continuous commitment to transparency, user engagement, and the provision of up-to-date and accurate information. From tax adjustments to the launch of various promotions and the ongoing developments in the HODL app's functionality, HODL is unwavering in its dedication to its community and the broader crypto ecosystem.

Stay tuned for more updates and developments as HODL continues to evolve and expand its reach in the world of DeFi, Crypto, and NFTs, establishing its presence in the Binance Smart Chain, and contributing to the growing HODLing community.

Inside HODL Fighter: The Next Big Leap in Blockchain Gaming

Share:

A seamless fusion of innovation, entertainment, and revenue generation

HODL Fighter is not just another game in the blockchain arena; it is a visionary project setting unprecedented standards in the blockchain gaming landscape. With the infusion of $25,000 additional investment, the development of the game and its accompanying NFT range is surging forward, promising a gaming experience that’s out of this world.

Dynamic Gaming Experience

HODL Fighter is a distinctive side-scrolling shooter that utilizes state-of-the-art technology to create unique worlds every time it’s played. The game is accessible to all, launching with four exhilarating levels, with a new one added each month, and is free to play directly from a web browser.

Every gaming session generates a unique version of each level, providing diverse and refreshing experiences each time. Players navigate their spacecraft through perilous environments, battling enemies and bosses, while clinging to survival—literally HODLing on for their lives!

Enriching Gameplay with NFTs

In HODL Fighter, the synergy between gaming and NFTs is profound. The spacecraft comes with attack, defense, and spell power-ups that can be unlocked either in-game or with spectacular 3D NFTs. These NFTs, intertwined with attractive artwork and brand design, not only offer enhanced gameplay but also pave the way for thrilling trade possibilities.

Economic Ecosystem and Revenue Streams

Funds from in-game purchases and NFT sales are strategically funneled to support buybacks, reward pools, and the overarching project. The ultimate vision is to generate substantial revenue and create one of the most accessible and riveting games in DeFi, positioning HODL as a groundbreaking project in the blockchain gaming space.

Extensive Accessibility & Platforms

The roadmap for HODL Fighter includes expanding its reach to various gaming platforms including Xbox, PC, and Nintendo Switch. The commitment to making the game universally accessible reaffirms the project's ambition to elevate the standards of blockchain gaming.

Interactive Demo & Future Developments

An early-stage demo of HODL Fighter is already available, allowing enthusiasts to get a taste of the diverse environments and gameplay mechanics. The game's future looks promising with more developments, including the app launch and the introduction of play-to-earn poker, setting HODL on a trajectory toward the stars.

HODL Fighter is sculpting a new paradigm in blockchain gaming, intertwining cutting-edge technology, engaging gameplay, and a robust economic model. It is a manifestation of innovative thinking, aiming to create a unique, enriching, and economically rewarding experience for the gaming and blockchain community. As HODL Fighter continues to evolve, it holds the potential to redefine the boundaries of gaming in the decentralized finance space and beyond.

Discover More & Experience the Revolution

Embark on the journey and experience the revolution in blockchain gaming with HODL Fighter. Dive into the early-stage demo and explore the myriad of opportunities at

HODL Fighter
, and learn more about the expansive world of HODL at
hodltoken.net

Innovation and Rewards: Understanding the $HODL DollarBot

Share:

Since its launch on the Binance Smart Chain (BSC) in May 2021, $HODL token has been at the forefront of innovation and value delivery, distributing over 20,000 BNB in rewards to its holders. The incorporation of DollarBot marks another revolutionary stride, enhancing precision and consistency in reward pool contributions.

A Journey of Innovation: $HODL’s Inception
$HODL was introduced with the mission to offer an unprecedented blend of passive income and transaction efficiency to investors. Through its unique transaction taxing system, $HODL ensures earnings for those who hold their tokens, applying a 5% tax on every buy, sell, and transfer. This tax is intelligently allocated, with 4% directed to a reward pool for investors and 1% distributed as reflections of $HODL to the investors and the burn wallet to reduce the supply.

Passive Income with $HODL
$HODL stands out by allowing investors to earn passive income simply by holding the tokens. The taxed tokens are converted into BNB and directed into a reward pool, which investors can access every 7 days. This system is particularly advantageous for smaller investors, offering reward stacking to build up rewards, ensuring the amount claimed surpasses the network costs (gas fees).

Introducing Precision: DollarBot

In its continual pursuit of innovation, $HODL has introduced DollarBot, a feature engineered to optimize reward pool contributions with perfect accuracy. DollarBot automates token sales based on a predetermined dollar value—$50, allowing for adaptive and precise allocations to the reward pool, regardless of market fluctuations in the value of $HODL. This eliminates the need for frequent recalibrations, ensuring optimal and reliable contributions and maintaining economic equilibrium within the ecosystem.

Enhanced Reliability in Varied Market Conditions

DollarBot’s embodiment of automated precision is a game-changer for the $HODL ecosystem. Its capacity to ensure consistent and optimal allocations to the reward pool in diverse market scenarios fortifies the ecosystem’s resilience and reliability. This innovative mechanism underscores $HODL’s commitment to pioneering advancements in the crypto realm, enriching the investor experience with steadiness and value.

WEEKLY HODL ROUNDUP: SEPTEMBER 18TH - 24TH, 2023

Share:

The $HODL team has been at the forefront of innovation, and we’re thrilled to share a roundup of our accomplishments and advancements for the week. Our passion to elevate the user experience and deliver outstanding value has driven significant progress across various facets of our project.
1. Introduction of New Staking Pools

This week marked the successful launch of four new staking pools, offering our users diversified options to maximize their investments and earn rewards.
2. Informative Video AMA

We conducted an insightful Video AMA, addressing queries and providing a clearer understanding of our ongoing projects and future endeavors. The session was recorded and shared to ensure accessibility for all community members.
3. Completion of Play-to-Earn NFT Design Plans

Our creative team finalized the design plans for our Play-to-Earn NFTs. These plans reflect our commitment to providing innovative and engaging solutions within the gaming and NFT space.
4. Optimization and Updates

Several enhancements were implemented, including the removal of reflections from the marketing wallet and a significant reduction in $HODL tax from 10% to 5%, aimed at optimizing user benefits.
5. Dashboard & UI/UX Enhancements

We introduced an updated and user-friendly dashboard for the new pools, and substantial progress was made on the poker UI/UX work to enhance user interaction and experience.
6. Developments in Studio-Scale Game

The specifications for our studio-scale game were completed, and further development is underway, marking a crucial step in our journey to redefine gaming in the blockchain space.
7. Publications & Community Engagement

Our presence expanded with a feature in a CoinMarketCap article, the publication of a new Medium article, a blog on our website, and numerous social media posts to keep our community informed and engaged.

App Development Update:

Our tech maestro, Paul, is on the brink of concluding the app’s updates, and we are excitedly gearing up for the launch. This update is crucial in realizing our vision and bringing a seamless experience to our users.

Conclusion

As we reflect on the week’s achievements, our resolve to push boundaries and create value is stronger than ever. We deeply value our community’s support and engagement and are committed to continuous innovation and excellence in the crypto space. Your feedback is essential, and we encourage you to share your thoughts, suggestions, and inquiries about our latest developments.

Thank you for being an integral part of our journey, and let’s continue building a revolutionary blockchain ecosystem together.

Exciting Revamp of $HODL Tax Structure!

Share:

We are pleased to announce a transformative revamp of $HODL's tax model, designed to drive volume and elevate value for all!

Current Tax Model:
10% Tax on all transactions (buys, sells, and transfers):
5% BNB reward pool
2% Reflections
1.5% Liquidity
0.5% Lottery
1% Company

Revolutionized Tax Model:
5% Tax on all transactions:
4% BNB reward pool
1% Reflections

Why The Enhancement?

The streamlined 5% tax is designed to boost trading volumes and entice a broader investor base by lowering the investment threshold.

Simplified and focused tax allocation reduces transaction costs and operational complexities, fostering increased tradability and on-chain activity.

Key Modifications:

Revenue Alternatives: Innovations like NFTs and Play to Earn will help sustain the liquidity pool's robustness, compensating for the reduced liquidity tax and making the contract more efficient, bringing down transaction and claim fees.

Company Allocation Overhaul: The 1% company tax is being phased out. Instead, 40 trillion $HODL, equating to 5% of the total supply, from the deployer will be transferred to the company wallet. This allows for discretionary BNB reward claims to finance company initiatives, ensuring operational discretion and simplifying the contract. These tokens will be owned by the company, not individuals, meaning that their use would only be if it was felt to be an advantage to the company and project - for example claiming BNB rewards in a bull run to fund marketing, etc.

Strategic Advantages:

This refined tax structure is projected to diminish investment barriers, offering enhanced and efficient returns to our community, while maintaining compelling reward mechanisms. We also plan to deliver HODL Pay allowing investors to convert their $HODL and $HODLX into purchases, however, this becomes far more effective for $HODL at 5% tax instead of 10%.

Deployment:

We are swiftly working on these innovative enhancements and will be deploying them as soon as we can!

We are confident this advanced model will propel $HODL to new levels, especially in a bull run, creating a trajectory of growth, simplicity, and unparalleled value for our community!

Our Week in Review - Project Updates (Sep 11 - 17, 2023)

Share:

It's that time again when we round up everything that's been happening over the past week. From significant strides to the smaller yet impactful moments, here's a glimpse into our journey from September 11th to 17th, 2023.

Key Takeaways:

Trademark Progress:

We’re excited to announce that we've embarked on the journey to trademark "Texas HODLem" in the US with the application having been submitted. This is an integral step in solidifying our brand's identity.

Twitter Traction:

Our new Twitter accounts are not so new anymore, thanks to the incredible growth we've experienced this past week. Thank you for the follows and interactions!

A Leap for "HODL Fighter":

We've locked in an investment for our very own "HODL Fighter" game. We're delighted about the upcoming developments and enhancements we are planning to make.

Content Spotlight:

Our YouTube channel now boasts a brand-new video that delves into our HODL Fighter game's features. If you haven't checked it out yet, now’s your chance!

A Fresh Look:

Our collaboration with our design team delivered vibrant and updated graphics for us to use across social media. It’s all about refreshing our look while maintaining our essence.

Website Updates:

Keeping in line with our promise of transparency, we've updated fund details on our site, ensuring you're always in the know.

Navigating the NFT Space:

Our budding partnership with NFTSniper saw the debut of the "HODL Hands" series. It's our initial foray into the dynamic NFT market.

Amplifying Our Voice:

Teaming up with NFTSniper, we spearheaded a targeted marketing campaign. The results? A broader reach and heightened brand visibility.

Engaging the Community:

With revamped artwork, new video content, and a variety of posts, our commitment to consistent engagement shines through.

Behind-the-Scenes Moves:

We sought the expertise of an on-chain specialist for an old CEX review, drew the curtain on the HODL/HODLX farm, and began gearing up for an enlightening AMA session.

On the Horizon:

Our app, the talk of the community, is inching closer to completion. Paul and the rest of our hard-working team are putting on the final touches. Stay tuned for a special announcement!

Wrapping Up:

Each week, our journey continues to be enriched by new experiences, challenges, and achievements. As always, your support fuels our passion and dedication. Keep checking back on our blog for more weekly insights and the latest news on our project's evolution.
